name: Orzhov Cluestone
text: A symbol of power and wealth, the only commodities that matter to the Orzhov.

name: Zof Consumption // Zof Bloodbog
text:
"Look at this place. What more evidence do you require that existence is bleak and meaningless?"
—Voshk, oblivion priest

name: Etali, Primal Storm
text: The storm rages and the earth breaks.

name: Dark Ritual
text:
"The ceremony ended with a voice from the shadows, a voice with vast, ominous power."
—Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

name: Ezuri's Archers
text: Eyes and arrows trained ever skyward.

name: Festering Mummy
text: As its parched flesh withers away, its malignant hunger grows.

name: Skulking Ghost
text:
"They exist only so long as the living take no notice."
—Kifimbo, Shadow guildmage

name: Nacatl Outlander
text: Survival in the wilds of Naya left Tiyan well equipped to win the civilized battles of Bant.

name: Pillage
text:
"Burn their homes. Salt their lands. Nothing survives."
—The Western Paladin

name: Infuse
text:
"The potential for change lies in all things. Know a thing's nature, know its possibilities, and know it anew."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

name: Weldfast Wingsmith
text: "Airships are too confining. If I'm in the sky, I want to feel the wind in my hair and taste the aether."

name: Vastwood Gorger
text: The gorger's insect-like eyes pick up the slightest movement in any direction. Its body then whips toward its prey with startling speed, swallowing it in one engulfing gulp.

name: Nomads en-Kor
text: The kor forsake roots for the winding of the path, forsake voices for the silence of the mind, forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

name: Drumhunter
text: "I feel the vine-rhythm as my friends drive the beast to me. I will not miss my mark."

name: Gray Ogre
text: The Ogre philosopher Gnerdel believed the purpose of life was to live as high on the food chain as possible. She refused to eat vegetarians, preferring to live entirely on creatures that preyed on sentient beings.

name: Harmonize
text:
"The bloody din of invasion faded
And silent song rang through the woods again."
—"Song of Freyalise"

name: Netcaster Spider
text: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

name: Rust Scarab
text:
"Behold nature's answer to the problem of society."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Spikeshot Elder
text: Now that he knows a thousand ways of hurting people, his next shamanic quest is to discover a thousand more.

name: Inner Calm, Outer Strength
text: The ghostly objects around the kami circled faster and faster, creating a dizzying cyclone of motion. When it opened its eyes, it struck.

name: Holy Day
text:
"The day of spirits; my soul's calm retreat/ Which none disturb!"
—Henry Vaughan, "Silex Scintillans"

name: Ghastbark Twins
text: They grow closer with every passing season.

name: Word of Blasting
text:
"Walls? What walls?"
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Natural Order
text: . . . but the price of Mangara's freedom was Asmira's life.

name: Fissure
text:
"Must not all things at the last be swallowed up in death?"
—Plato, Phædo, trans. Jowett

name: Vault of Whispers
text: Ish Sah, den of the warlord Geth, commander of countless nim.

name: Overflowing Insight
text: The truth came to Kumena like the Great River's torrent: the only way to keep his enemies away from the hidden city was to claim its power for himself.

name: Lantern Scout
text: Hedron lanterns fend off more than just the darkness.

name: Wall of Resistance
text: Telim'Tor could no longer recall the exact number of assaults—but his troops could.

name: Choke
text:
"One day we shall walk where once was water."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Black Sun's Twilight
text:
"Where once there was complacence, Sheoldred brought ambition, and soon the will of Yawgmoth reigned."
—Monument inscription

name: Archivist of Oghma
text: "Knowledge is the greatest tool of the mortal mind, outweighing anything made by mortal hands. Before anything else can exist, the idea must exist."

name: Naomi, Pillar of Order
text: "Progress comes only when we rise above our petty quarrels."

name: Plains
text: Lady Bormul claims an owlbear has been trampling her fields, but there's something unnatural about the tracks it left behind.

name: Standstill
text: "Take your time."

name: Fyndhorn Elves
text:
"Living side by side with the elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess."
—Kolbjorn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Thrilling Discovery
text:
"This must be the lost city of Zantafar, where my people lived before becoming nomads. Think of the history we'll learn here!"
—Quintorius, Lorehold mage-student

name: Animate Object
text: Tap beverages with extreme caution.

name: Sacred Mesa
text:
"Do not go there, do not go / unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves."
—"Song to the Sun," Femeref song

name: Wake of Destruction
text: Land charred black, rivers boiled, Crops and wells alike despoiled, Mountains leveled, forests felled— Footprints of the beasts of Keld.

name: Smite the Monstrous
text:
"Darkness always flees from the light, and I am the breaking dawn."
—Kordain, luminarch of Kabira

name: Lifeforce
text:
"Every fallen tree nourishes a thousand seedlings."
—Autumn Willow to Baron Sengir

name: Armored Ascension
text: With skill and strength honed upon the prairie, Naxtil won his battles high above it.

name: Stormbind
text:
"Once, our people could call down the storm itself to do our bidding."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Polluted Bonds
text: The mystic bond between spellcasters and the land is just as vulnerable to attack as the casters themselves.

name: Traumatize
text: Dreads had half a mind to leave.

name: Anodet Lurker
text: These machines build fearsome visages out of scrap metal to scare off predators who would otherwise be eager to consume them.

name: Glory
text:
"תהילה נﬠלמה; תהילה הייתה בכל מקום."
—מגילת ההיווצרות והמקור

name: Instill Infection
text:
"The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread."
—Vedalken research notes

name: Orochi Sustainer
text: "Nothing is the same anymore. The forests are not as lush, the waters not as pure, the air not as clear. Without the kami to direct and sustain the forces of nature, it's only a matter of time before we feel their neglect."

name: Aladdin's Ring
text:
"After these words the magician drew a ring off his finger, and put it on one of Aladdin's, saying: 'It is a talisman against all evil, so long as you obey me.'"
—The Arabian Nights, Junior Classics trans.

name: Icehide Troll
text: A troll's greatest weapon is its ability to emerge unexpectedly from the landscape.

name: Shivan Wumpus
text: It's easier to move the village than to divert the wumpus.

name: Jwar Isle Avenger
text: Though solitary by nature, the sphinxes did not hesitate to join in the fight against the Eldrazi.

name: Quag Sickness
text: The dread gases didn't kill Farbid. But as he lay in the muck, miserable and helpless, watching ghouls and rats advance on him, he wished they had.

name: Ambition's Cost
text:
"When you give offense to heaven, to whom can you pray?"
—Cao Cao, quoting Confucius

name: Adarkar Unicorn
text:
"There is no nobler creature in all of Terisiare."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Furnace Punisher
text: She marks her favorite creations with a searing brand, leaving all others to be consumed by the furnace.

name: Treva's Attendant
text: "Treva is the voice of the ur-dragon, demanding cries of worship."

name: Keral Keep Disciples
text: "You're not setting foot in here. Not on our watch!"

name: Flowstone Crusher
text:
"What's better than smashing things with a rock? A rock that gets up and smashes things for you."
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

name: Caprichrome
text: It is what it eats.

name: Prosperity
text: "Life can never be *too* good."

name: Ondu Inversion // Ondu Skyruins
text:
"It always seems so quiet in the aftermath of wrenching violence."
—Nys Dal, Sea Gate trapfinder

name: Golgari Germination
text: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

name: Kitesail Corsair
text: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"

name: Mana Breach
text: The mana that binds the world together can also tear it apart.

name: Carrier Pigeons
text:
"Birds know no borders! Why, then, should we?"
—General Varchild, in a missive to King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Gavony Trapper
text: The elite cathars of the Parish-Blades train in all manner of techniques designed to delay and frustrate the beasts that hunt the crossways.

name: Veteran's Voice
text:
"Good soldiers rely first upon their training, then upon their instincts."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Kokusho, the Evening Star
text: The fall of the evening star never heralds a gentle dawn.

name: Tomakul Honor Guard
text: In the Great Desert, one law is enforced over all others: water belongs to all.

name: Saber Ants
text: They stay on the battlefield only long enough to consume the losers.

name: Park Map
text: It's always up-to-date, so visitors know what rides are open, how long the lines are, and which areas are closed due to gremlins.

name: Oko's Hospitality
text:
"My advisors recommend I let them eat you."
—Oko

name: Glacial Wall
text:
"As we neared, Belfar proclaimed the wall to be made of glass and went forward to prove it. We had no choice but to pull his hands free from where he had touched it, leaving flesh palmprints on the icy wall."
—Tross, Vainus Expedition leader

name: Gore Vassal
text:
"Rid them of their unfaithful organs. Bring new hearts to the unbelievers."
—*Tome of Machines*, verse 1703

name: Winds of Change
text:
"'Tis the set of sails and not the gales Which tells us the way to go."
—Ella Wheeler Wilcox, "Winds of Fate"

name: Improvised Weaponry
text: Anything can be a weapon if you swing it hard enough.

name: Traveler's Amulet
text:
"Why wander in search of a new home when the path is laid out before you?"
—Pytamun, former Nef-crop initiate

name: Selenia, Dark Angel
text:
"I am light. I am dark. I must give my life to serve; not even death can release me."
—Selenia, dark angel

name: Tusked Colossodon
text: A band of Temur hunters, fleeing the Mardu, dug a hideout beneath such a creature as it slept. The horde found them and attacked. For three days the Temur held them at bay, and all the while the great beast slumbered.

name: Monk Realist
text: "We plant the seeds of doubt to harvest the crop of wisdom."

name: Sensor Splicer
text: With clarity of vision comes clarity of function.

name: Stampeding Horncrest
text: When the golden city opened, the dinosaurs inside were eager to greet the new visitors.

name: Falthis, Shadowcat Familiar
text: She sticks to her chosen master closer than their own shadow.

name: Soulmender
text: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."

name: Guise of Fire
text:
"Fire will eventually destroy a zombie, but a fiery zombie destroys a lot of other things first."
—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

name: Volcanic Island
text: 2018 North America Legacy Championship

name: Marble Chalice
text: The cup was a gift from the sphinx Tameron, who hoped that those who drank from it would live long enough to decrypt the sphinxes' wisdom.

name: Sewn-Eye Drake
text:
"Too wary to charge, too prudent to serve. Not anymore."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Zombie Master
text: He controlled the zombies even before his own death; now nothing can make them betray him.

name: Slate of Ancestry
text: The pattern of life can be studied like a book, if you know how to read it.

name: Moderation
text:
"Good things come to those who are judicious in their appetites."
—*The Book of Bruna*

name: The Abyss
text:
"An immense river of oblivion is sweeping us away into a nameless abyss."
—Ernest Renan, Souvenirs d'Enfance et de Jeunesse

name: Collector Protector
text: "Here—have a Mudhole."

name: Prismatic Lens
text: A capable mage can tune its focus, refracting mana through each disk in turn to cast any spell they desire.

name: Mogg Alarm
text: They make mountains into mogg holes.

name: Stormfist Crusader
text:
"As she reached the pinnacle, lightning flashed and her eyes blazed with newfound power."
—Legend of the Gilded Knights

name: Standard Bearer
text: The standard was a rallying point for the army and a target for the enemy.

name: Goblin Firebomb
text:
"And if this works, Tawnos is gonna let us build the full-sized version!"
—Tergel, goblin explosioneer

name: Lightning Strike
text: To wield lightning is to tame chaos.

name: Breaching Leviathan
text: These waters remain uncharted, but not for lack of trying.

name: Dauntless River Marshal
text: "Thieves and squid squirm the same way when you capture them."

name: Gixian Puppeteer
text: To some, desecration. To Gix, decoration.

name: Purphoros's Intervention
text: "I bring a fire to recast all the world."

name: Forge Boss
text: "Big furnace like this can reduce anything to ash. You got something you need reduced to ash?"

name: Shapeshifter
text:
Born like a Phoenix from the Flame, But neither Bulk nor Shape the same.
—Jonathan Swift, "Vanbrug's House"

name: Air Servant
text: Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered.

name: Nyx-Fleece Ram
text: The gods are fascinated by innocence, perhaps because it's a quality they themselves lack.

name: Cooperation
text:
"The Elves train our healers, and we keep the Orcs at bay. Most Elvish bargains aren't as fair."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Toolcraft Exemplar
text: "If you wish to produce the finest work, you must start with the finest tools."

name: Act of Treason
text: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.

name: Island of Wak-Wak
text: The Isle of Wak-Wak, home to a tribe of winged folk, is named for a peculiar fruit that grows there. The fruit looks like a woman's head, and when ripe speaks the word "Wak."

name: Kindly Ancestor // Ancestor's Embrace
text: "Thank you, Grandmother. I love you too."

name: Siege Zombie
text: A barricade only buys time. So the wealthy buy more barricades.

name: Bloodfell Caves
text: Having learned of New Capenna's Halo supply, Elesh Norn dispatched Atraxa herself to bring the world to heel.

name: Darkheart Sliver
text:
"At first we thought we were in some haunted wood. Then the branches twisted and scuttled toward us."
—Merrik Aidar, Benalish patrol

name: Roc Egg
text: A thin shell lies between the roc and a world of bite-sized treats.

name: Minamo Sightbender
text: Woven from threads of the spirit world, the mistcloak rendered its wearer invisible, but quickly fell to tatters.

name: Drannith Ruins
text: Like Orn before it, Drannith was reduced to a playground for Ikoria's monsters.

name: River Merfolk
text:
"Dwelling in icy mountain streams near goblin and orcish foes, the river merfolk were known for their stoicism."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. V*

name: Tortoise Formation
text: At sea, the Jhessian fleet strikes swiftly and decisively. On land, facing the elite cavalry of Valeron, its marines must rely on more cautious strategies.

name: Feast of Blood
text:
"The vampires of this world don't know the pleasures of hunger. They gorge themselves without savoring the kill."
—Sorin Markov

name: A-Goma Fada Vanguard
text:
"Her weapon's impressive, sure. But you should see her wield it."
—Gred, expedition warrior

name: Chromatic Star
text:
"This item is not from ... now. It reflects a sky no longer ours and gleams with hope that does not exist."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Agonizing Remorse
text:
"Guilt is not absolution. Regret is not justice. But it is right that you suffer."
—Extus Narr

name: Wild Aesthir
text:
"What Barbarian secrets do they spy from their lofty perch?"
—General Varchild

name: Falconer Adept
text: "My falcons are family, as much as any other member of my clan."

name: Ceta Disciple
text: "The sea holds all that you need. You simply must know how to ask for it."

name: Grim Feast
text: "Hmmm—midnight snack."

name: Hair-Strung Koto
text:
"The Kami War drove many members of Konda's court insane. As their spiritual world turned against them, so too did their minds turn from reality."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Sustainer of the Realm
text:
"The harder you push, the stronger we become."
—Radiant, to Urza

name: Knight of the Reliquary
text:
"Knowledge of Bant's landscape and ruins is a weapon that the invaders can't comprehend."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Razorverge Thicket
text: Where the Razor Fields beat back the Tangle, the crowded thicket yields to bright scimitars of grass.

name: Slash of Talons
text:
"The amber sun smokes with fury, gazing on foes that gather like ants invading our home. We are ready! Blade and claw strike as one."
—Huatli

name: Zhuge Jin, Wu Strategist
text: When Zhuge Jin proposed the marriage of Guan Yu's daugher and Sun Quan's heir, Guan Yu's arrogant refusal led to disaster.

name: Kayla's Music Box
text: Kayla wondered if Urza's repair of the music box was a display of affection, or just of skill.

name: Aphetto Alchemist
text: He brews trouble.

name: Eldrazi Aggressor
text:
"They employ a foul sort of teamwork."
—General Tazri, allied commander

name: Vampire Hounds
text: The hounds' barks are a horrifying chorus of screams, moans, and whispers.

name: Strands of Night
text: When the strands call, only the dead answer.

name: Clever Combo
text: At Crossbreed Labs, "heads or tails" has nothing to do with coins.

name: Desert Twister
text: The magical dust clouds Mercadian mages use to traverse the plane generate storms that devastate the surrounding terrain. But as long as the storms don't touch the mountain, the nobles simply don't care.

name: Delver of Secrets // Insectile Aberration
text: "Aha! Yes! Now I hear it, the beautiful poetry of the lights in the sky. I must reach the moon and ask what it all means!"

name: Rageblood Shaman
text:
"I see a spark of pure rage. Soon that spark will spread from the depths of Kragma. Soon its fire will engulf the polis."
—Hira, street oracle

name: Royal Assassin
text: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force..

name: Huatli's Raptor
text: The essence of Ixalan was never far from Huatli's heart.

name: Beckon Apparition
text: The foyer is littered with the coins it demands but can no longer hold.

name: Ancestral Recall
text: 2022 Europe Vintage Championship

name: Death Baron
text: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

name: Dreamstalker Manticore
text: Purphoros forged the manticore's tail from bronze, its teeth from silver, and its heart from hate.

name: Volcanic Dragon
text: Sometimes an eruption in Shiv produces something more dangerous than a mere river of molten rock.

name: Vigilance
text:
"Put a spear in a peasant's hands, and you have an expendable troop. Put a purpose in his heart, and you win a warrior."
—Sensei Golden-Tail

name: Duneblast
text: The Abzan turn to this spell only as a last resort, for its inevitable result is what they most dread: to be alone.

name: Aetherwind Basker
text: Its frill inspired the design of efficient aether collectors.

name: Goblin Lookout
text: "Throw rocks at 'em! Throw spears at 'em! Throw Furt at 'em!"

name: Ramosian Captain
text: The Cho-Arrim believe in leading by example.

name: Jund Hackblade
text: The knights were halfway through their precombat rites before they realized the foul brute meant to start without them.

name: Beast Within
text:
"Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them."
—Euphemia, Nexus watcher

name: Black Hole
text:
"Code Dark Donut! Code Dark Donut! All available fun specialists, please report to the Roil Coaster immediately!"
—Truss, chief engineer

name: Pain Kami
text:
"All kami are our enemies now, A very tough lesson to learn. But it's one that's taken quickly, When you feel what it's like to burn!"
—Ku-Ku, akki poet

name: Sprouting Thrinax
text: The vast network of predation on Jund has actually caused some strange creatures to adapt to being eaten.

name: Quiet Purity
text:
"When the Kami of Utter Silence passes, walls lose their secrets. Scrolls lose their lessons. Tapestries lose their beauty. Where there was meaning, there is only stillness."
—Sensei Hisoka

name: Rob the Archives
text: "Well, I guess stealth's out of the question."

name: Electrolyze
text:
「水圧式パワーグリップは失敗だったが、その電手は大きな成功だった。」
—-首席イズマグナスの日誌

name: Defiant Ogre
text: "I have no clan, but I still have purpose."

name: Dreamroot Cascade
text: Soothing whispers invite travelers to step closer, closer, closer . . . until they vanish soundlessly beneath the surface.

name: Cut Short
text: With one swift, merciful stroke, Tamiyo's story came to an end.

name: Vaporous Djinn
text:
"What is taking them so long to fill the waterskins?"
—Mwani, Mtenda goatherd

name: Aphetto Grifter
text: Aphetto con artists started working in pairs to make it less likely they'd be the victims of con artists.

name: Rakshasa's Secret
text: The voice of a rakshasa is soft, its breath sweet. But every word is the murmur of madness.

name: Aven Mindcensor
text: "The only question we need to ask is how best to fulfill the will of the God-Pharaoh."

name: Chimeric Idol
text: After a chimeric idol attacked them, the Keldons smashed all unfamiliar statues.

name: Heat Shimmer
text:
"Better to flare out than to gutter."
—Flamekin expression

name: Path of the Enigma
text: "We were caught unprepared once. I won't let it happen again.

name: Tobias Andrion
text: Administrator of the military state of Sheoltun, Tobias Andrion is the military right arm of the empire and the figurehead of its freedom.

name: Groundling Pouncer
text: Endry was determined to teach his groundlings a few winged-faerie tricks.

name: Coming Attraction
text: The Astrotorium adds new attractions almost as fast as Captain Nebula can crash them into asteroids.

name: Bloodgift Demon
text: He relishes the devotion of his Skirsdag puppets and their belief that it will earn them immortality.

name: Time to Reflect
text:
"Occasionally, there are those who refuse to appreciate all that the God-Pharaoh provides for us."
—Temmet, vizier of Naktamun

name: Pacifism
text: Frozen by conscience, Karn did not resist as the moggs carried him to the Predator.

name: Seizan, Perverter of Truth
text:
"If you would taste the wisdom of the oni, be prepared to salt it with your blood."
—Kiku, Night's Flower

name: Silent Gravestone
text: Made to ward off the Grim Captain and silence the lure of undeath.

name: Xira Arien
text: Her wits are sharp, but her blades are sharper.

name: Loaming Shaman
text: His work determines who is remembered and who feeds the worms.

name: Timberwatch Elf
text: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

name: Clone
text: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.

name: Reminisce
text: "Leave the door to the past even slightly ajar and it could be blown off its hinges."

name: Reign of Chaos
text:
"The Burning Isles are the home to a dozen lords who claim dominion. Jamuraa will look to only one leader: me."
—Kaervek

name: Fountain of Youth
text: The Fountain had stood in the town square for centuries, but only the pigeons knew its secret.

name: Giant Ox
text:
"How strong is he? Well, I once lost control of the plow, and he carved a furrow right through my house! Didn't even slow down."
—Guldir, Beskir farmer

name: Carnassid
text: The hunter would never forget the time or place where he first met the carnassid, for they buried him there.

name: Rakdos Charm
text:
"Let all feel joy in pain."
—Rakdos

name: Cancel
text:
"It is forbidden. Asking why is irrelevant."
—Sergiu, Opal Lake magistrate

name: Muse Drake
text: A composer wrote a symphony based on the drakes screeching outside her window. Reviews were mixed—except among the drakes.

name: Utopia Tree
text: The fruit of this fabled tree takes on the flavor of whatever food you love most.

name: Dramatist's Puppet
text:
"Who cares if the story's true as long as people are entertained?"
—Shin, Towashi street performer

name: Elven Fortress
text:
"Thallids are not ordinary enemies of flesh and bone and reason. They attack with no thought for our strength or of their own losses. I fear our Fortresses shall be overwhelmed."
—Kyliki of Havenwood

name: Merchant of the Vale // Haggle
text: "Buying old, worn out junk. Selling marvels of real value."

name: Deicide
text:
"It is done."
—Elspeth

name: Powerleech
text: The Forest of Argoth has developed a resistance to mechanical intrusion.

name: Carrion Beetles
text: It's all fun and games until someone loses an eye.

name: For Each of You, a Gift
text: "My generosity blesses you all, even the undeserving."

name: Weight of Spires
text:
"Finally, a good use for an Azorius courthouse."
—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

name: Volrath's Stronghold
text: The seed of a world's evil.

name: Strip Bare
text:
"All glamers lifted, all lies revealed, all flesh exposed."
—Awylla, elvish safewright

name: Kindled Fury
text:
"Rage is a dangerous weapon. Your enemies will try to use your anger against you. Use it against them first."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Great Hart
text:
The great hart stood like a statue, its hide painted gold by the dawn. The Champion laid down her weapons and stepped forward within an arm's length of the beast. The hart, sacred to Heliod and bathed in the god's own light, bowed to the Champion, marking her as the Chosen of the Sun God.
—*The Theriad*

name: Grovetender Druids
text: "The seedlings scream for us to loose them upon the Eldrazi, and we shall oblige."

name: Drownyard Explorers
text: "Angels and inquisitors terrorize villages, but no one seems to notice the stirring out at sea."

name: Pouncing Cheetah
text: Rhonas's monument is home to a wider variety of creatures than anywhere else in the city of Naktamun—a feature most initiates fail to appreciate.

name: Tail Slash
text:
"Kneel before a dragon and you will be spared when it turns to leave."
—Yikaro, Atarka warrior

name: Ragefire Hellkite
text:
"Well, the good news is that sound wasn't the volcano erupting . . ."
—George, Coalition scout

name: Fertile Ground
text: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil—almost.

name: Little Girl
text: In the future, she may be a distinguished leader, a great scholar, or a decorated hero. These days all she does is pee the bed.

name: Falter
text: Like a sleeping dragon, Shiv stirs and groans at times.

name: Squelch
text: Oku-Doku had gone through all the motions: the same akki cursewords, the same ingredients with their horrid stink, the same rude gestures. Yet not a person died.

name: Prismwake Merrow
text: "Seeing is believing" is a fact the merrows ruthlessly exploit in their dealings with the other residents of Shadowmoor.

name: Kiddie Coaster
text:
"The coaster was so gentle, I was able to write my review while I was still on it."
—*Salzon's Ride Review*

name: Hall of Heliod's Generosity
text: The stronghold of Theros's light.

name: Amphin Cutthroat
text:
"The amphin have long built their society in secret. While surface dwellers squabbled over trivial borders, they patiently expanded, building their ammonite temple-caves. Now amphin priests eye the shore, and amphin hunters gird for war."
—Gor Muldrak, *Cryptohistories*

name: Revenge of the Drowned
text: A heavy net doesn't always mean a good catch.

name: Cloud Elemental
text:
"The sky teems with just as much life as the forest or the deep seas."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Hero of Goma Fada
text: "They seek to break us. Let us show them our strength!"

name: Invasion of Zendikar // Awakened Skyclave
text: Nahiri tried to bend Zendikar to Phyrexia's will. In response, the world rose against her.

name: Aggression
text: The star that burns twice as bright burns half as long.

name: Colossus of Sardia
text: Buried under a thin layer of dirt, it was known for centuries as Mount Sardia.

name: Leaf Arrow
text:
"Those who think the trees shall remain bystanders throughout this conflict shall be sorely mistaken."
—Sutina, Speaker of the Tajuru

name: Tilonalli's Knight
text: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Tilonalli is the Burning Sun, associated with ferocity, fire, and passion.

name: Ettercap // Web Shot
text:
"Filthy, sticky, vile, noxious—and I haven't even started describing the webs."
—Erinis, gloom stalker

name: Diregraf Scavenger
text: It can barely feel the sword anymore.

name: Xun Yu, Wei Advisor
text: "A splendid talent, admired of all men! His folly lay in serving Cao Cao's power."

name: Crux of Fate
text:
"One brother fought for the sake of the Multiverse. The other for himself."
—*The Elderspell Parable*

name: Phantom Warrior
text:
"There are as many pillows of illusion as flakes in a snow-storm. We wake from one dream into another dream."
—Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Illusions"

name: Deafening Silence
text:
"They have forsaken their vows. The edict of the Circle demands their voices be silenced."
—Syr Tasdale, knight of Ardenvale

name: Erdwal Ripper
text: Savage vampires lurk in the Erdwal's network of passageways where prey is plentiful and easy to catch.

name: Soldier of the Pantheon
text: "I hear the gods' voices in my dreams each night, and I offer bloody trophies on their altars each day."

name: Prosthetic Injector
text: Why carry a subject to a surgical lab when you can bring the surgical lab to them?

name: Inferno
text:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Pikemen
text:
"As the cavalry bore down, we faced them with swords drawn and pikes hidden in the grass at our feet. 'Don't lift your pikes 'til I give the word,' I said."
—Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*

name: Naturalize
text: The idols of old are rich in minerals and magic. They are torn apart when nature aims to eat well.

name: Swift Response
text:
"There's nothing quite as satisfying as delivering a good kick to the face."
—Adrasteia, Akroan captain

name: Skyfire Kirin
text: Its fiery visitation burns away the fog of war and dissipates the ties of loyalty.

name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
text: "From up here we can drop rocks and arrows and more rocks!" "Uh, yeah boss, but how do we get down?"

name: Flow of Knowledge
text:
"Focus your mind. Do you hold a piece of the ocean or a thousand drops of rain?"
—Hurkyl

name: Python
text: What could it have swallowed to grow so large?

name: Pikemen
text:
"As the cavalry bore down, we faced them with swords drawn and pikes hidden in the grass at our feet. 'Don't lift your pikes 'til I give the word,' I said."
—Maeveen O'Donagh,
*Memoirs of a Soldier*

name: Zarichi Tiger
text:
"The taming and consecration of these creatures is evidence of our faith."
—Resimir, Zarichi Temple priest

name: Deepwood Denizen
text: "You didn't come all this way just to bother me, did you? Say your piece and be gone."

name: Enduring Victory
text:
"My dragonlord is immortal. Most dragons are not."
—Kadri, Dromoka warrior

name: Alpha Brawl
text: Being an alpha means proving it every full moon.

name: Catapult Fodder // Catapult Captain
text: And they're more than happy to share the wealth.

name: Seafloor Oracle
text: Where the light falls dim and blue on broken ships, secrets lie unclaimed.

name: Stone Giant
text: What goes up, must come down.

name: Savage Surge
text: Gruul warriors never need to be stirred to battle. They need only to be shown where the battle is.

name: Vault Robber
text: The dwarves believe works of art should be passed down the generations, not buried with the dead.

name: Repel the Abominable
text:
"Fight for a better future, even if you may not live to see it."
—Grete, Order of Saint Traft

name: Honor of the Pure
text: Together the soldiers were like a golden blade, cutting down their enemies and scarring the darkness.

name: Spawnbinder Mage
text: "Follow me. Step lightly. And resist the urge to kick them."

name: Spitebellows
text: Disaster stalks with gaping jaws across unready lands.

name: The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale
text: 2022 Europe Legacy Championship

name: Isolated Chapel
text: Not every church is a place of faith.

name: New Blood
text:
"Now isn't that better?"
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Protective Bubble
text: Skilled merrow rudders ensure their charges arrive on time and without incident.

name: Broken Concentration
text: Some minds bend under pressure. Others break.

name: Thrill of Possibility
text:
"The most delicious ingredients are often the most dangerous to obtain."
—Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar, *The Underworld Cookbook*

name: Anthousa, Setessan Hero
text: The warriors she leads can rarely keep pace with her, and neither can the tales.

name: Unmarked Grave
text:
"I'm sure they were once someone important, but I couldn't tell you who they were."
—Doros, expedition guide

name: Marchesa's Decree
text:
"Those who seize power must have the means to hold it."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Wojek Siren
text: It is the call to arms, the call to fury, the call to blood.

name: Edric, Spymaster of Trest
text: "I am not at liberty to reveal my sources, but I can assure you, the price on your head is high."

name: Argivian Blacksmith
text: Through years of study and training, the Blacksmiths of Argive became adept at reassembling the mangled remains of the strange, mechanical creatures abounding in their native land.

name: Encroaching Mycosynth
text:
"Careful—however they might look, they're not human. A step too close and they'll drag you in."
—Kara Vrist, resistance spymaster

name: Tooth, Claw, and Tail
text: "Silence your wailing. This is but a taste of the destruction my pets have in store."

name: Emmara, Soul of the Accord
text: "Whatever hatred destroys, a single act of trust can revive."

name: Waterlogged Grove
text: The trees pull water from deep underground, filling the forest for miles.

name: Unstable Frontier
text: The goblins went to sleep in Jund and awoke in Grixis. They'd never seen a zombie before. They would never see one again.

name: Knight of Dusk
text: "Challenge me with your strongest. I will paint my sword with their blood."

name: Diabolic Machine
text: "The bolts of our ballistae smashed into the monstrous thing, but our hopes died in our chests as its gears continued turning." —Sevti Mukul, *The Fall of Alsoor*

name: Squall
text: The air that holds them aloft can just as easily put them down.

name: Kiddie Coaster
text: There's something truly thrilling about moving so slowly.

name: Essence Filter
text:
"Freyalise has cleansed our bodies and minds of the plagues of Kjeldor; all she asks in return is that we keep pure our newly given home in Fyndhorn."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Deadshot
text:
"Carrion! Keep your distance. My blade will come to you!"
—Crovax

name: Sanguine Indulgence
text:
"Drink from the vein? How provincial."
—Lord Duchorvin

name: Undercity Scavenger
text:
"We grow strong by feasting on failure."
—Izoni

name: Skizzik
text: It skitters across Shiv, each tendril hitting the ground with a sharp snap.

name: Mortality Spear
text: "Death is my life's work."

name: Rod of Spanking
text: Minutes before the campus watch busted pledge week at the Alpha Beta Unlimited house . . .

name: Mental Misstep
text:
"Your first mistake was thinking I would let you live long enough to make a second."
—Sarnvax, Gitaxian sective

name: Cut the Earthly Bond
text:
"The more kami that passed through the veil that separated them from our world, the weaker that veil became, threatening to tear into tatters at the slightest pressure."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Concerted Defense
text: "You mess with one of us, you mess with all of us!"

name: The Ultimate Nightmare of Wizards of the Coast® Customer Service
text: The number printed on the card is no longer in service. For help, go to wizards.custhelp.com or find us on Twitter @Wizards_Help.

name: Shielded Aether Thief
text: Conflict breeds opportunity.

name: Lost Soul
text: Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name—but those who go with her are never the same.

name: Nightwind Glider
text: Once you learn to float on the shadows, you'll never fear them again.

name: Amrou Kithkin
text: Quick and agile, Amrou Kithkin can usually escape from even the most fearsome opponents.

name: Arlinn's Wolf
text:
"If you don't speak wolf, allow me to translate: 'One step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'"
—Arlinn Kord

name: Shardless Agent
text: "The left blade for a swift, painless death. The right blade for a long, lingering one. The choice is mine."

name: Reverse Damage
text:
"My enemy's hatred is his weakness. My enemy's anger is my strength."
—Remin, venerable monk

name: Electrolyze
text:
"The hydraulic power grip was a failure, but the gauntlets were a shocking success."
—Journal of the Prime Izmagnus

name: Wurm's Tooth
text: A wurm knows nothing of deception. If it opens its mouth, it plans to eat you.

name: Flesh Reaver
text: Though the reaver is horrifyingly effective, its dorsal vents spit a highly corrosive cloud of filth.

name: Kinscaer Harpoonist
text: The suspicious kithkin of Kinscaer patrol the skies, their eyes attuned to the shapes of outsiders.

name: Umara Mystic
text: "We tolerate the North Hada thieves' den, but cutthroats who wander downriver earn a skymanta ride out to sea."

name: Magma Spray
text: A stone hurled at an enemy is deadlier in liquid form.

name: Strict Proctor
text: "You might believe being dead for centuries has made me more lenient. I think you'll find the opposite is true."

name: Dakkon Blackblade
text:
"My power is as vast as the plains, my strength is that of mountains. Each wave that crashes upon the shore thunders like blood in my veins."
—Dakkon Blackblade, Memoirs

name: Reverse Damage
text: "Weapons usually bring death. Today, mine will bring life."

name: Carnophage
text: Eating is all it knows.

name: Holy Strength
text: Such power protects the body with the strength of the soul.

name: Lightning Greaves
text: This matched set incorporates aetheric accelerators and deflection matrices in an elegant, wearable design.

name: Stone Retrieval Unit
text: Automatons could be rebuilt. Powerstones could not.

name: Lithophage
text: It's viciously territorial, destroying every creature on the mountain it has chosen to consume.

name: Hill Giant
text: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot.

name: Sunbond
text:
"I was not chosen for my faith in the gods. Sometimes the gods must put their faith in us."
—Elspeth

name: Raging Goblin
text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Lotleth Troll
text: He lurks in the undercity, eager for the corpse haulers to unload their rotting cargo.

name: Cast Down
text:
"Your life is finished, your name lost, and your work forgotten. It is as though Mazeura never existed."
—*Chainer's Torment*

name: Vicious Kavu
text: As battle raged in Shiv, a strange new ally appeared from below the ravaged ground.

name: Vessel of Paramnesia
text:
"Write everything down. Trust me."
—Vallon, Thraben inspector

name: Zodiac Pig
text: ". . . Zhong Hui and Deng Ai next led armies west: / And to the Cao, Han's hills and streams now passed. . . ."

name: Bone Splinters
text:
"I will make your bones into a weapon that will lay even the mighty low."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Ardenn, Intrepid Archaeologist
text: "With the right tools, even the sky is within reach."

name: Band Together
text: "Boo, let's see how this miscreant handles a furry missile of justice!"

name: Lightning Bolt
text:
「最初の魔術師は荒れ狂う嵐の怒りを目撃し、それに応えようとした。」
—-嵐大工の文書

name: Pharika's Mender
text: "The direst venom becomes a panacea under Pharika's guidance. I bring it to the worthy, clinging at the edge of the abyss."

name: Tawnos's Weaponry
text: When war machines became too costly, Tawnos's weaponry replaced them.

name: Hate Mirage
text: Each monstrosity that fails to kill him expands his conjured arsenal.

name: Ashen-Skin Zubera
text: When the Honden of Night's Reach began to crumble, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to haunt mortal dreams.

name: Glacial Stalker
text:
"Have you spent a winter high in the mountains, where the ice walks and speaks to the wind? It is not a place for those who have not learned respect."
—Ulnok, Temur shaman

name: Rhonas's Stalwart
text: "Give me some room."

name: Natural End
text: The haunted blade shattered, and the geist drifted gratefully to the Blessed Sleep.

name: Unflinching Courage
text: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.

name: Gorilla Titan
text: "I want a banana *this* big!"

name: Loyal Sentry
text: "My cause is simple: To stop you, at any cost, from ever seeing the inside of this keep."

name: Oath of the Ancient Wood
text: "Some gaze upon the forest and see trees. I see true power."

name: Magmatic Force
text:
"Granted, it's the pinnacle of utter destructiveness. So what would you call *two* of them?"
—Riku of Two Reflections

name: Guard Duty
text: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"

name: Rune Snag
text:
"Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Grand Warlord Radha
text: "The future is my gift to Keld."

name: Tall as a Beanstalk
text: He realized a bit late that he was supposed to *plant* the magic beans.

name: Promise of Bunrei
text: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

name: Architect of the Untamed
text: Next to her designs, life seems like a pale imitation.

name: Wrap in Flames
text:
"Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Markov Patrician
text: Vampires of the Markov bloodline pride themselves on their exquisite taste in fashion, art, and "wine of the vein."

name: Pursue Glory
text:
"Combat is a form of worship, the clash of steel a solemn prayer."
—Pytamun, initiate of Nef crop

name: Samite Sanctuary
text:
Our war is against suffering, not against those who cause it.
—Samite creed

name: Living Armor
text: Though it affords excellent protection, few don this armor. The process is uncomfortable and not easily reversed.

name: Lightning Angel
text: Sudden vengeance, echoing fury.

name: Shimmerscale Drake
text: They are drawn by the brilliant blue glint of the mineral lazotep from the mines below.

name: Butcher of Malakir
text: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

name: Shrivel
text:
"Do not weep for the frail. Their time couldn't have been that far off."
—Nathrac, plaguesower

name: Healing Hands
text: The ethereal touch brings relief. The physical touch brings peace.

name: Friendly Fire
text:
"Never tell goblins to 'fire at will.'"
—Urut Barzeel, Mardu hordechief

name: Lurking Green Dragon
text:
"Territorial. Scary. No further notes."
—Volo's field notes

name: Body Double
text: Where the dead outnumbered the living, mimics scavenged faces from the fallen.

name: Voice of the Woods
text: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

name: Revered Elder
text: The Cho-Arrim worship life and revere those who've experienced it longest.

name: Kragma Butcher
text: Minotaurs go into battle hungry. The first sight of their enemies' blood sends them into a flesh-eating rage.

name: Flowstone Sculpture
text: The sculptor, weary of his work, created art that would finish itself.

name: Feral Instinct
text:
"If a rhino's head is lower than its shoulders, trust me—it is *not* praying."
—Mwani, Mtenda herder

name: Longbow Archer
text:
"If it bears wings, I will pin it to the skies over Tefemburu."
—Ruya, Zhalfirin archer

name: Spectral Searchlight
text: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.

name: Containment Breach
text: For pest keepers, there's no sound more disheartening than breaking glass.

name: Volcanic Geyser
text: My thunder comes before the lightning; my lightning comes before the clouds; my rain dries all the land it touches. What am I? -Femeref riddle

name: Recover
text:
"No more fear of death's oblivion—is this not the greatest treasure of all?"
—Gurezan, Legion resurrectionist

name: Nessian Courser
text:
Khestes the Adamant, the Champion's closest ally among the centaurs, took one stone to his shoulder and another to his flank. He held his stride and his aim, and let fly the arrow that killed the giant Grinthax.
—*The Theriad*

name: Thornado
text: Every bough, branch, and bramble lashed out in defense of the forest.

name: Guan Yu's 1,000-Li March
text: "He Guan Yu covered the ground on a thousand-li horse;/ With dragon blade he took each pass by force."

name: Ichorspit Basilisk
text: Warm forges and tasty goblins lured it from the Hunter Maze to the Quiet Furnace.

name: Armament Master
text: "We prepare for the known with daggers, rations, rope, and pitons. But we also prepare for the unknown with billycat tails, pikku roots, hedron chips . . ."

name: Dark Privilege
text:
"As you breathe your last, understand why I accept such forbidden gifts."
—Purraj of Urborg

name: Goldwarden's Helm
text: "My mother wore this into battle against the first Phyrexians. Now I wear it in her honor."

name: Phyrexian Altar
text:
"Unskin these impure bodies, Great Yawgmoth, that the flesh may welcome your blessings."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

name: Krovikan Sorcerer
text:
"These Sorcerers always seem to have another surprise up their sleeves."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Victory's Herald
text: The corruption stirred the heavens above, awaking a shining champion.

name: Ilysian Caryatid
text: Those who die as heroes are permitted to dwell in Ilysia, a protected realm of the Underworld as tranquil and vibrant as the rest is bleak.

name: Jaded Response
text:
"Calm down everyone; it's nothing we haven't seen before."
—Sisay

name: Druid Lyrist
text: The druids and the forest are in perfect harmony. They sing the same songs.

name: Independent Troops
text: "The empire, long united, must divide, and long divided, must unite."

name: Neonate's Rush
text:
"We spend our entire existence pursuing the joy of our first night's feast."
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Trostani, Selesnya's Voice
text: There are no soloists in the chorus of Selesnya.

name: Healer's Hawk
text: The wounded see the glow of its vials long before they see its wings diving out of the clouds.

name: Glint
text: Rakshasa waste no opportunity to display their wealth and power, even in the midst of a sorcerous duel.

name: Cloudchaser Eagle
text:
When the eagle catches a cloud, it tears it into strips that fall to earth.
—Vec myth of the rains

name: Auratog
text: The auratog enjoys eating its wards.

name: Cephalid Looter
text: "Amazing, isn't it, what humans will throw away when they're drowning?"

name: Reforge the Soul
text: In a wave of spells called the Cursemute, Avacyn cleansed the world with divine fire.

name: Archivist
text: Some do. Some teach. The rest look it up.

name: Street Wraith
text: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

name: Zelyon Sword
text: No sheath shall hold what finds its home in flesh.

name: Treasure Vault
text: There is wealth enough inside to cause the rise and the ruin of dynasties.

name: Scarred Vinebreeder
text: For disfigured elves, there are few choices beyond death or nettlevine.

name: Viashino Grappler
text:
"They've returned for the mana rig, but it no longer belongs to them."
—Viashino bey

name: Courier Bat
text: Swarms of bats poured from Lurenbraum Fortress carrying wedding invitations to vampires of every bloodline.

name: Goblin Brigand
text: After the Skirk Ridge collapsed, the goblins erected a system of ropes and pulleys to hold up what was left.

name: Barrage Ogre
text: The elves had devised countless strategies to combat Memnarch's war machines, but they had no idea what to do when one was *thrown* at them.

name: Reverberate
text: For every action, there is a swifter and more violent reaction.

name: Forced Adaptation
text:
"We're planting the seeds of change. Sometimes, we plant them in people."
—Vorel of the Hull Clade

name: Grim Guardian
text: Occasionally the living wander to the Rivers, but the wardens of Athreos ensure that only the dead pass.

name: Ballyrush Banneret
text: Only wool from the side of the springjack turned most often to the sun can be woven into kithkin battle standards. Jackherds record every movement of their woolly-jacks until shearing.

name: Unnerve
text:
"If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."
—Xantcha, to Gix

name: Revelation of Power
text: As Ob Nixilis closed in, Halo swept through Giada like an electrical current, and inside her, something long dormant unfurled its wings.

name: Mortify
text:
"Your debt is erased."
—Hilgur, Orzhov euthanist

name: Warmonger
text: Funny how money and war travel so well together.

name: Cataclysm
text: The *Weatherlight* dragged the Predator behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.

name: Nissa's Chosen
text: "Nissa will save the elves, but only the ones who have proved their worth."

name: Fallen Askari
text: In troubled times, there are few greater sorrows than a wayward savior.

name: Hidden Spider
text: It wants only to dress you in silk.

name: Tectonic Instability
text:
"Think of the problems we'll face if you uproot entire continents," said Urza.
"I have," replied Teferi, "but the alternative is worse."

name: Song of the Dryads
text: Few who encounter the strange, human-like grove leave once the lilting chorus of the dryads reaches their ears.

name: Cage of Hands
text:
"Our own actions built the prisons that now hold us. Our hands reached too far and tried to hold too much."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Goblin Piledriver
text: Throw enough goblins at any problem and it should go away. At the very least, there'll be fewer goblins.

name: Imposter Mech
text: The best way to fight evil is with its own weapons.

name: Bounce Chamber
text: Anti-gravity. Pro-fun.

name: Pithing Needle
text: It disables with pinpoint accuracy.

name: Gustcloak Savior
text:
"Our death-arrows flew in high arcs towards the aven. And then . . . nothing."
—Coliseum guard

name: Charging Paladin
text: A true warrior's thoughts are of victory, not death.

name: Skull Storm
text: A rapid and catastrophic decline.

name: Fathom Fleet Captain
text: "Join me, and take the world for yourself!"

name: Drelnoch
text: Adarkar's blank wastes make the mind wander—and stray thoughts are quickly caught and devoured.

name: Raging Goblin
text: Charging alone takes uncommon daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

name: Frenzied Tilling
text:
"Beneath her scars, Dominaria's beauty yet shines."
—Multani, maro-sorcerer

name: Akiri, Line-Slinger
text: Her bold movements are anchored in the careful precision of each rope.

name: Strength-Testing Hammer
text: "I don't know you, but that hammer rings a bell."

name: Illuminor Szeras
text: "Immortality is not quite the same as invulnerability, but it is close enough."

name: Mana Drain
text:
"Power is wasted on the weak. They never keep it for long."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Brainstorm
text:
「無限の考えが多元宇宙を流れ、開かれた心を待っている。」
—-ビブリオプレックス：序論

name: Mass Mutiny
text: "You too, Squib?"

name: Void Shatter
text: Eldrazi break concentration like glass.

name: Legion Conquistador
text: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.

name: Rogue Refiner
text: "It's natural, it's all around us, and it's there for the taking. Just try and tell me what I'm doing is wrong."

name: Bone Picker
text: They are the first to greet dissenters on their journey into exile.

name: Samut, Voice of Dissent
text: "I'll fight no more just for the honor of dying. The afterlife will have to wait."

name: Ripjaw Raptor
text: Raptors are clever enough to tear away a hard metal shell to get at the tasty morsel inside.

name: Reliquary Tower
text: The most holy treasures are kept far from unclean soil.

name: Ridgescale Tusker
text:
"Each creature holds a solution to a problem, a lesson to be learned."
—Oviya Pashiri, sage lifecrafter

name: Fires of Yavimaya
text: Yavimaya lights the quickest path to battle.

name: Mistford River Turtle
text: The fae raised the turtle from a tiny hatchling. They taught it whom to ferry—and whom to drown.

name: Warhost's Frenzy
text: Keldons may be outnumbered, but they are never outmatched.

name: Presence of the Master
text:
Peace to all. Peace be all.
—Great Hall floor inscription

name: Endless Ranks of the Dead
text: With Thraben's army recalled to its city walls, outlying villages were left to fend for themselves.

name: Llanowar Visionary
text: The elves of Llanowar look to their past to determine the shape of their future.

name: Ondu Giant
text: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.

name: Hyalopterous Lemure
text:
"The Lemures looked harmless, until they descended on my troops. Within moments, only bones remained."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Mass Diminish
text: Transformed from brute to cute.

name: Domri's Ambush
text: "When civilization teeters on the brink, I'll be there to kick it the rest of the way."

name: Silkenfist Order
text: Hands weave life and death; Intertwining spirits knit Tapestries and shrouds.

name: Universal Surveillance
text: Few outside the Saiba Futurists know the true extent of their data-extraction network.

name: Crimson Manticore
text: Noted neither for their good looks nor their charm, Manticores can be fearsome allies. As dinner companions, however, they are best left alone.

name: Foul Orchard
text: On Amonkhet, death is an ever-present part of life.

name: Halvar, God of Battle // Sword of the Realms
text: It cuts through the Cosmos itself, carving new Omenpaths between the realms.

name: Crackdown
text:
"There is no place for mercy in defense of our lives."
—Ta-Spon, Cho-Arrim executioner

name: Scaled Nurturer
text: "Life always starts small. Only time will tell what heights it may reach."

name: Root Spider
text:
"They're not half as fierce if they don't see you coming."
—Devin, Faerie Noble

name: Brain Pry
text: To the Rakdos, the fun is in the shakedown. The loot is usually discarded.

name: Inspired Ultimatum
text:
"Inner peace is wonderful, and worth striving for. Outer peace is much less important."
—Taelya, Lavabrink pyromage

name: Treefolk Healer
text: Protected by druids for untold centuries, the forest began to return the favor.

name: Sibilant Spirit
text:
"Relax. I'm sure it's just a snake hissing."
—Avram Garrisson, leader of the Knights of Stromgald

name: Nullmage Advocate
text: "Our unity unmasks your deceit."

name: Fiend Binder
text: She had not believed any shred of humanity remained in these writhing monsters until the twisted form of her partner appeared before her.

name: Blightreaper Thallid // Blightsower Thallid
text: Then one day, Mudcreep started to feel funny itself.

name: Angelic Skirmisher
text: "A keen mind wields an army as a deft hand wields a sword."

name: Backwoods Survivalists
text: Paranoia has driven some Kessig communities to hunt down anything—and anyone—that travels through their woods.

name: Tales of Master Seshiro // Seshiro's Living Legacy
text:
"In times of strife, the foolish make a fist while the wise make a friend."
—*First Address of Seshiro the Anointed as Broodmaster of the Orochi Colonies*

name: Ovinize
text:
"You wish for me to cow your enemies? I can do better than that . . . ."
—Teferi, second-level student

name: Noble Panther
text: Unlike many hunters, these panthers have no need for camouflage. They're fast enough to catch any prey.

name: Akroma's Memorial
text:
"No rest. No mercy. No matter what."
—Memorial inscription

name: Vindicate
text:
"Show them the same mercy they showed to Kroog."
—Gyvan, thopter pilot

name: Starstorm
text:
"They're beasts! What are they going to do, bomb us from orbit?"
—Platoon Commander Cyrus Jalili, Prandium Defence Auxilia

name: Torch Courier
text: "Light a torch and deliver this letter" were his instructions, which he unfortunately reversed.

name: Watery Grave
text:
"I fear that as we scurry after phantoms, the Dimir pull nine puppet strings."
—Ral Zarek

name: Meticulous Excavation
text: "Remember, students, if it's glowing, humming, or whirring, don't touch it!"

name: Skeleton Archer
text:
"When it comes to killing with precision, a soul is but a hindrance."
—Isareth the Awakener

name: Cultivate
text: A single spore from a Tyranid Hive Ship can spell doom for a solar system.

name: Shadowstorm
text:
"You've not seen a storm until you've seen the kind that roars between worlds."
—Lyna, soltari emissary

name: Icatian Skirmishers
text: Skirmishers engaged raiders before they could reach the towns. Although these units typically suffered huge losses, they never lacked volunteers.

name: Illusionist's Stratagem
text:
"When everything hangs on a single moment, be sure you choose the right moment."
—Jace Beleren

name: Dimir Locket
text:
"Wear this, and take your place among the shadows—wise, lethal, and unseen."
—Ivrelya, Dimir spymaster

name: Apocalypse Chime
text:
"One day, or another, perhaps I shall ring my pretty chime . . . loudly, so that all may hear."
—Grandmother Sengir

name: Mighty Emergence
text: Why settle for mere enormity?

name: Water Elemental
text: Unpredictable as the sea itself, water elementals shift without warning from tranquility to tempest. Capricious and fickle, they flow restlessly from one shape to another, expressing their moods with their physical forms.

name: Canopy Dragon
text:
"In the Mwonvuli you must divide your attention between what hangs overhead and what lies underfoot."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Summary Dismissal
text: "Let's start fresh, shall we?"

name: Goblin Bombardment
text: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

name: Suspicious Bookcase
text: All the books were dusty with disuse, save the one titled *Camouflage and Its Practical Applications*.

name: Denied!
text: "Don't worry about it. It happens to every mage sooner or later."

name: True Conviction
text: "Heroism is more than a single act; it is hundreds of small decisions, made every day, in pursuit of a heroic cause."

name: Final Parting
text:
"Sleep now, brother. That is the one gift I can give you."
—Liliana Vess

name: Imp's Mischief
text:
"Do the innocent pay for the crimes of the guilty? Of course they do. That's the fate of the weak."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Behold the Power of Destruction
text: "I'd call that a successful first test. Golem! Rearm the Doom Citadel!"

name: Ossuary Rats
text: You know you've ventured too deep when the rats stop running and hold their ground.

name: Ashiok's Forerunner
text: "Every dream is a doorway."

name: Lena, Selfless Champion
text: "Those who do evil and those who do nothing are equally worthy of contempt."

name: Blood Pet
text: No thrull has ever been burdened with a long life.

name: Cloudshredder Sliver
text: Forked tails rustled. Talons clicked. A lone sliver streaked overhead like jagged lightning, and the hive thundered.

name: Extus, Oriq Overlord // Awaken the Blood Avatar
text: "Join me for the dawn of a new age."

name: Sawblade Scamp
text: Sometimes the Great Work requires destruction to allow for more efficient reconstruction.

name: Cabal Conditioning
text:
"Hear only the Cabal's voice.
See only the Cabal's way.
Speak only the Cabal's word."
—Cabal mantra

name: Flowstone Shambler
text: Flowstone troops are notoriously difficult to keep in formation.

name: Spara's Headquarters
text: To most, the Nido Sanctuary is an office complex. To the Brokers, it's a vault of secrets.

name: Wall of Tanglecord
text: Rootlike fibers travel far from Mirrodin's metallic forests, emerging from the crust to drink in the mana-infused sunlight.

name: Sage Owl
text: Some owls house the souls of archmages of ages past.

name: Opposition
text: Exhausting a wizard can be exhausting work.

name: Heavenly Qilin
text: It strides through the universe as though stepping on the stars, crossing freely between the celestial and earthly worlds.

name: Absorb
text: "Your presumption is your downfall."

name: Abrupt Decay
text: The worst part isn't the pain, or the smell, or even the fear of death. It's hearing the clatter of bone on stone and knowing the bones are yours.

name: Tormented Pariah // Rampaging Werewolf
text: "Hey lads, the moon's rising. All the better to watch him beg for mercy."

name: Saddleback Lagac
text:
"A good lagac will carry you through thick and thin. A bad one ... well, it's a tasty dinner."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Steppe Glider
text: It glides over the landscape. It also happens to be one.

name: Pyretic Prankster // Glistening Goremonger
text: It'd played the same prank a hundred times, never noticing the flame's slowly evolving pattern.

name: Aven Redeemer
text: Redeemers rise with the sun, and the spirits of the people rise with them.

name: Lyra Dawnbringer
text: An angel among angels, she carries the hopes of the world skyward.

name: Sudden Death
text: Some mages tapped into the time rifts, forcing upon others alternate timelines in which unimaginable horrors befall them.

name: Master Symmetrist
text: Tondo lost his very first duel and has spent his entire life trying to get even.

name: Deathmark
text: Even the noblest of intentions and strongest of wills inevitably crumble into dust.

name: Gleemox
text:
MOCTODSDR
AZIWTAXAM
EELG

name: Kindly Cognician
text: "What's wrong, dear? Nothing a 44-to-22 bronze spur gear and reducer pairing couldn't fix, I bet."

name: Ethereal Champion
text:
"If I have learned anything as a wizard it is this: never fight your own battles."
—Waffa, sorcerer of Nyomba

name: Evil Twin
text: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.

name: Alabaster Wall
text: Its mortar is mixed with waters straight from the Fountain of Cho.

name: Reclamation
text:
"We shall oppose Lim-Dûl and his forces by any means necessary, even if the very earth be torn asunder."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Black Poplar Shaman
text: It absorbs the pain of other treefolk, which leaves it bitter, yet addicted to the sensation of agony.

name: Blessed Orator
text:
"He spoke with the tongue of Angels; we fought with the strength of lions."
—Handel, infantry soldier

name: Sisay
text: While captain of the *Weatherlight*, Sisay undertook a quest for the Legacy, a collection of artifacts needed to defeat the Lord of the Wastes. She continued this quest even when Gerrard, heir to the Legacy, chose to abandon it. Sisay is devoted to the cause of good at whatever price.

name: Flowstone Crusher
text:
"Someone must have done something very bad to make a rock that angry."
—Rebel scout

name: Devil K. Nevil
text: "Danger is my middle name. Also, I don't know how to spell."

name: Atomwheel Acrobats
text:
"If the acrobatic show doesn't wow the audience, we have no one to blame but our elves."
—Myra the Magnificent

name: Vedalken Orrery
text: The model incorporated the fifth sun effortlessly, as if it had always known.

name: Grisly Ritual
text:
"You can always tell who's new from the screaming."
—Tinua, Skirsdag cultist

name: Drudge Skeletons
text:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
—Nevinyrral,
*Necromancer's Handbook*

name: Wirewood Elf
text: "The land belongs to nature as far as our eyes can see. The higher we climb, the more we can see."

name: Night Market Guard
text:
"One head watches for Consulate enforcers. The other watches for renegade thieves."
—Crime Lord Gonti

name: Koth's Courier
text: Koth sent partisans into the Tangle to bring survivors to the safe haven of the tunnels below Kuldotha.

name: Nephalia Academy
text:
"May knowledge be our sanctuary."
—Yora, academy researcher

name: Messenger's Speed
text:
"He outran arrows. He outran even the archers' insults."
—Bayma, storyteller of Lagonna Band

name: Scrapyard Salvo
text:
"Squealstokers! Build me a glorious pile of Mirran metal. Then add yourselves to the pile."
—Furnace boss, sector 11

name: The Hunter Maze
text: In Vorinclex's domain, only the mightiest survive, and all are prey in his endless hunt.

name: Miara, Thorn of the Glade
text: "Approach from downwind. Tread with care. Aim for the heart."

name: Doublecast
text: First the insult, then the encore.

name: Moriok Reaver
text:
"The Moriok are fools. They try so hard to gain my favor. All I want is for them to die quickly, to join the ranks of the nim."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Structural Distortion
text:
"As Zendikar has bled, so will Innistrad. As I have wept, so will Sorin."
—Nahiri

name: Magma Sliver
text: As malleable as molten steel, but as dangerous as the finished blade.

name: Loran's Escape
text: As Terisia City burned, Feldon pressed the sylex into Loran's hands and urged her to run. Hope ran with her.

name: Teferi's Veil
text:
"I don't like to speak ill of 'walkers . . . but just what did Teferi think he was doing?"
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Flickering Spirit
text: It disappears each time with the hope that it will not return to the same desolation it left behind.

name: Pinpoint Avalanche
text:
"Some solve problems by thinking and talking. Others use rocks."
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

name: Rielle, the Everwise
text: "Being all-knowing is a matter of remembering which things it is crucial to forget."

name: Hesitation
text: Gerrard hesitated, looking up at the enemy ship. The future hesitated with him, changed forever by the pause.

name: Gather Specimens
text:
"It's free to do whatever it wants. I've merely told it what that is."
—Xorin, Architect of Will

name: Spotted Griffin
text: When the cat flies and the bird stalks, guard your horses carefully.

name: Nimbus Swimmer
text: The Simic soon discovered that the sky offered as few constraints on size as the sea.

name: Stone Quarry
text: The Sun Empire's cities are built from the bones of the earth.

name: Natural Obsolescence
text:
"It is folly to believe your precious inventions will endure. All things return to the soil."
—Nirav, Tirahar elder

name: Copper Myr
text: The elves thought of the myr as minor threats, just as the myr thought of the elves.

name: Grave Robbers
text:
"If you don't have your health, you don't have anything."
—Proverb

name: Force Void
text:
"My mind and spirit are one—a barrier not readily passed."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

name: Dictate of Heliod
text:
"In our war Heliod gave mortals some favor, yet other times he withheld aid. Are we still no more than game pieces to him?"
—Polyxene the Doubter

name: Raven's Run Dragoon
text: "I have a gift. The ability to sense encroaching darkness has saved many lives. And yet constantly feeling the force of so much ugliness is a terrible burden."

name: Chainer's Edict
text: "You forfeited any right to mercy the moment you challenged me."

name: Turntimber Ascetic
text: "For so long, this land cried out in pain. Now, as the flow returns to its balance point, a new harmony echoes in the trees."

name: Westvale Abbey // Ormendahl, Profane Prince
text: With Griselbrand gone, the Skirsdag eagerly awaited another demon to claim their devotion. Ormendahl did not make them wait long.

name: Excavation Explosion
text: Urza's engineers could take weeks to dig out a powerstone. The goblins weren't so painstaking.

name: Leyline Phantom
text:
"Is the maze itself a phantom? Or is one as real as the other? Perhaps I am as mad as the dragon."
—Jace Beleren, journal

name: Gainsay
text:
"You dryfolk must take the air for granted. You constantly insist on wasting it."
—Kenessos, priest of Thassa

name: Towering Indrik
text: It chases its airborne prey relentlessly, heedless to what it pulverizes beneath its hooves.

name: False Prophet
text: "You lived for Serra's love. Will you not die for it?"

name: Zodiac Horse
text: ". . . 'First take Jingzhou, next the Riverlands; / On that rich region, base your own royal stand.' . . ."

name: Taunting Kobold
text: Pozo's heart was full of courage, right up until it was full of elven steel.

name: Undermine
text: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

name: Phyrexian Vivisector
text: Before he was the Father of Machines, Yawgmoth was a twisted Thran physician, and his legacy of medical atrocities lives on in New Phyrexia.

name: Trusty Machete
text:
"Until this expedition is done, that blade is your guardian, your liberator, and your best friend all rolled into one."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

name: Lullmage's Familiar
text:
"They store energy in special gastric organs ... but I guess you'd probably rather have me clear the path than ramble about guts."
—Fahar, expedition wizard

name: Hateflayer
text: It has no safe side.

name: Wall of Light
text: As many attackers were dazzled by the wall's beauty as were halted by its force.

name: Drana's Chosen
text: "Drana commands me. I command my nulls. And so her bidding is done."

name: Arc Lightning
text: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

name: Mirrorworks
text: The faces of Geth's corpse-dredgers are disturbingly similar.

name: Goblin Trenches
text:
"Even if we dislodge them, I fear these lands will never again yield crops."
—Kimmick, vanguard knight

name: Ruinous Gremlin
text: City officials once sent twenty gleaming automatons to exterminate a nest of gremlins. They soon saw the error of their ways.

name: Elvish Lyrist
text: Bring the spear of ancient briar; Bring the torch to light the pyre. Bring the one who trod our ground; Bring the spade to dig his mound.

name: Mine Collapse
text: "Good ol' rock," muttered Rhirhok as the shaking began. "Nice ol' rock...."

name: Shadow Prophecy
text: "Lord Windgrace, grant me wisdom."

name: Egon, God of Death // Throne of Death
text: It offers all the warmth and comfort of the grave.

name: Reckless One
text: "Release chaos with me!"

name: Snare Thopter
text:
"I did not think I would understand the cold filigree creatures of this world, but they too are governed by the laws of nature."
—Nissa Revane

name: Sea Monster
text: It's easy to believe the monster is a myth—until you feel three hundred thousand pounds of myth crashing down on your ship.

name: Gaddock Teeg
text: So great is his wisdom and spirit that many who have met him say that they stood before a giant of a man and talked to the wisest of the four winds.

name: Honor Guard
text:
"It is not a choice I make, to have this guard. It is the choice of my people, and my duty to them."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Malakir Rebirth // Malakir Mire
text:
"Getting into Malakir isn't difficult. It's getting out that's the hard part."
—Doros, expedition guide

name: Excavating Anurid
text: Turg's spawn ruled long after he croaked.

name: Pharika's Libation
text: "If you will not pour your drink out for me, I shall pour mine out for you."

name: Curse of Verbosity
text: Idle chatter becons many an attentive ear.

name: Collective Nightmare
text: Night fell all at once. Specifically, on the Phyrexian.

name: Hand of Emrakul
text:
"I believed in a beautiful god. But this is the true face of the divine."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

name: Zhalfirin Lancer
text: The Phyrexians armored themselves against blades, fire, and every conjuration they could think of. She brought a war rhino.

name: Runic Shot
text: "Target acquired."

name: Booster Tutor
text: Make your judgment wisely: The right pack will let you defeat your nemesis, but a poor choice can only end in torment. And *Homelands*.

name: Tidal Visionary
text: Beneath the waves, things appear the way merfolk want them to.

name: Orthodoxy Enforcer
text: The mites sniff out any potential interlopers. He handles the rest.

name: Canyon Drake
text: "These runes are tough enough without the distraction," Ertai muttered, one eye on the drake.

name: Show and Tell
text: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."

name: Cliffhaven Kitesail
text: Made from canvas, wood, and hope.

name: Scaretiller
text: Fields of battle turn to fields of grain.

name: Muddle the Mixture
text:
Whatever you desire—
To MUDDLE
Or MIX...
I'm your fix.

name: Rock Jockey
text: Goblins don't know much about physics, but they know lots about falling and rocks.

name: Stormfront Pegasus
text:
"At summer's end, the pegasus herd stampedes across the sky. Their silent footfalls taunt the clouds and bid the rains to come."
—Stormfront fable

name: Tempting Contract
text:
"Don't think of it as debt. Think of it as an investment in yourself."
—Diriga, demon bursar

name: Muraganda Petroglyphs
text: Some mages forsake their scrolls and libraries to learn at the feet of ancient trees and sacred stones.

name: Lightning-Rig Crew
text: A pirate ship in battle is a storm of activity.

name: Squirrel Nest
text: In the Krosan Forest, you've got to keep an eye out for the squirrels.

name: Old-Fashioned Vampire
text: "Stalking hard or hardly stalking, am I right?"

name: Sunblast Angel
text:
"The light of love shines brightly through even the smallest cracks. All shall be illuminated."
—*Song of All*, canto 903

name: Nezumi Cutthroat
text:
"These nezumi, they disgust me. The things they will do for money no other thinking creature would consider. This, of course, makes them useful beyond words."
—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

name: Thunder Wall
text:
"The lemures had barely taken wing when the sky roared with thunder. The swarm of little beasts wavered, divided, and fell, crashing to the earth."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Biophagus
text:
"We guarantee you that within a week, you will feel like a new man."
—Galaxos Klynesmith, biophagus

name: Sardian Cliffstomper
text: When Urza betrayed the Sardian dwarves, they called upon the might of their neighbors for aid.

name: Spidery Grasp
text: There are no safe paths through the Trial of Strength.

name: Bone Splinters
text:
"Which do you deserve, the heft of a femur or the graceful sharpness of a forearm? Decisions, decisions . . ."
—Gisa the Mad

name: Chandra's Defeat
text:
"Fire? Is that your only trick, Chandra?"
—Nicol Bolas

name: Tragic Lesson
text: Eventually, the school would resort to hiring a kraken to guard the more dangerous tomes in the Biblioplex.

name: Foul Presence
text: The Phyrexians have one word that means both "evolution" and "pain."

name: Memnarch
text: In the blur between metal and flesh, Memnarch found madness.

name: Dispatch
text: Venser wondered if it could still be called a teleportation spell if the destination is oblivion.

name: Sarinth Greatwurm
text: It felt the rumblings of war and uncoiled itself from the depths of the world.

name: Lineprancers
text: Can you do the can-can-can-can?

name: Fourth Bridge Prowler
text: Renegades run the gamut from lofty sages to petty thieves.

name: Roofstalker Wight
text: No heartbeat to hear, no greed to bribe, no fear of death.

name: Vulshok Heartstoker
text: He fashions stirring words with as much passion as a smith fashioning a warhammer.

name: Emeria's Call // Emeria, Shattered Skyclave
text:
"You called it the castle of a god. It is less than that, and so much more."
—Kasla, Emeria shepherd

name: Angel of Despair
text:
"I feel in them a sense of duty and commitment, yet I can feel nothing else. It is as if their duty is to an empty void."
—Razia

name: Revoke Privileges
text: "By order of Consulate Mandate 482, I am required to detain you, citizen."

name: Harvest Season
text: A true reflection of nature: death fostering life.

name: Gang of Elk
text: The elk is Gaea's favorite, who wears the forest on its brow.

name: Grim Affliction
text: Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.

name: Ultimate Price
text:
"The realization that one is dying is far more terrifying than death itself."
—Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

name: Martyr of Spores
text: "Weep not for me. I will rise with the spring's new growth."

name: Dynacharge
text: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.

name: Mindclaw Shaman
text: Nicol Bolas gives power to those who will abuse it most.

name: Crackling Perimeter
text: As the path he sought came into focus, Niv-Mizzet took steps to prevent others from approaching it.

name: Bedlam
text: The generals were dead. The battle plans were forgotten. It was everyone for themselves.

name: Spitting Drake
text: It prefers its meals cooked.

name: Mordenkainen's Polymorph
text: "Your purpose may change along with your shape, but you will serve regardless."

name: Radha, Heir to Keld
text: "Step aside, weakling, or I'll swat you like the bug you are."

name: Hostile Desert
text: Amonkhet's desiccated land thirsts for blood.

name: Spirit of the Hunt
text: The bonds of the pack transcend time and death.

name: Reassembling Skeleton
text: Though you may see the same bones, you'll never see the same skeleton twice.

name: Electropotence
text: Where life and force collide.

name: Tome Scour
text: Genius is overrated, especially when it's someone else's.

name: Masked Admirers
text: "Beauty determines value, and we determine beauty."

name: Robe of Mirrors
text: "Does this make me look fat?"

name: Suffer the Past
text: Ulamog's tentacles, their touch like burning ice, rummaged through his soul and stung his memories one by one.

name: Dwarfhold Champion
text: Courage is neither a shield nor an axe, but the will to wield both in defense of the innocent.

name: Lich's Mirror
text: It shows not what you are but what you were.

name: Runebound Wolf
text: The wolf's captor hid his fear, but he knew someday the runes would fail, the collar would break, and the wolf would remember his face.

name: Cinder Hellion
text: Chandra used jets of flame to lure hellions into the path of oncoming Eldrazi.

name: Gigantomancer
text: "All life is driven by an indomitable will to survive. I simply turn that into something more . . . tangible."

name: Discombobulate
text:
"I said 'pick his brain,' not 'tear off his head.'"
—Riptide Project researcher

name: Slaughter the Strong
text:
"Cut the beasts out from under them and their strength is nothing."
—Vona of Iedo, Butcher of Magan

name: Promise of Tomorrow
text: Death can wait.

name: Ensnaring Bridge
text:
"With a few minor adjustments, we were able to convert sky-dock assisters into a defense system for the Aether Spire."
—Consulate engineer's log

name: Amateur Auteur
text:
And thus at Maze's End
the runners end their strife.
Our saving grace, that hooded kid,
is now Guildpact for life.
—*RAVNICA! The Musical*

name: Befriending the Moths // Imperial Moth
text:
"The moths of Eiganjo were once no different from any other great beast of Kamigawa's wilds. It took years of patience and dedication to convince them to bear riders."
—*History of the Empire*

name: Fabled Hero
text: "You. Poet. Be sure to write this down."

name: Awakening Zone
text: The ground erupted in time with the hedron's thrum, a dirge of the last days.

name: Vampire Cutthroat
text: Not all monsters have tentacles.

name: Iname, Life Aspect
