text: In Gavony wishing is taken as a sign of weakness, yet the wells usually brim with silver.

name: Molten Rebuke
text: "Perhaps this will show the Orthodoxy what we think of their attempts at indoctrination."

name: Scarwood Goblins
text: Larger and more cunning than most Goblins, Scarwood Goblins are thankfully found only in isolated pockets.

name: Makeshift Munitions
text: "Grease up a firecannon good and proper with dinosaur-liver oil, and it'll shoot just about anything."

name: Sophina, Spearsage Deserter
text: "Track the rot. See how far it goes."

name: Miming Slime
text:
"We paid the Simic very well for this capability, but we should quickly recoup our expenses in saved wages."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Marisi, Breaker of the Coil
text: "Cast off the law! Awaken your rage!"

name: Stone Quarry
text: The Inventors' Renaissance came on the heels of the Great Aether Boom, hiking demand for raw materials of every kind.

name: Sage of Lat-Nam
text: Within each device is a spark of its creator's soul. Within each sage is a lamp that awaits that spark.

name: Aven Envoy
text: Their grieving faces tell far more than a list of casualties ever could.

name: Highland Game
text:
"Bring down a stag and fix its horns upon her head. This one hears the whispers."
—Chianul, at the weaving of Arel

name: Leashling
text: Constructed of leather and irony.

name: Skaab Goliath
text:
"Three heads, six arms, and some armor grafts are better than . . . the normal numbers of those things."
—Stitcher Geralf

name: Drooling Groodion
text:
"The Golgari expand, yes, but I refuse to call their tainted creations 'growth.'"
—Niszka, Selesnya evangel

name: Feral Invocation
text: Nylea's sacred lynx guards those who honor the Nessian Wood and hunts those who don't.

name: Cabal Trainee
text:
"Ah, a faceshredder. Very rare. Nearly unstoppable. Good luck!"
—Cabal instructor

name: Smite
text:
"Sure, today of all days, he asked to borrow my boots!"
—Darijo, Ivy Street ruffian

name: Sundering Titan
text:
"Even if we defeat it, what remains to be saved?"
—Glissa Sunseeker

name: Spellwild Ouphe
text:
"You'd think that their big glowing eyes would be almost hypnotic to look at. In fact, it's the other way around—they are entranced by nearly everything they see."
—Balecki, Spellwild druid

name: Box of Free-Range Goblins
text: Skrab tried to warn his fellow goblins that the hammer was bait for a trap, but they stopped listening at "hammer."

name: Grime Gorger
text: Sometimes the trash throws you out.

name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
text: Avacyn lives on in the hearts and minds of Innistrad's people.

name: Chosen of Markov // Markov's Servant
text: ". . . and for that I shall be eternally grateful."

name: Sadistic Hypnotist
text: "Victory in the pits is almost as rewarding as the methods I use to achieve it."

name: Fynn, the Fangbearer
text: "Come, Koma, and reclaim what you lost! Or does the great serpent fear a rematch?"

name: Angelheart Protector
text: "We shall persevere."

name: Survivors' Encampment
text: "What will happen to us?" they asked. The vizier paused. "I think . . . I think that's up to us now."

name: Mind Stone
text:
"Pain is an ally. Pain is a friend. Pain is truth."
—Sister Erynia N'botu, Order of the Valorous Heart

name: Unexpected Fangs
text:
"With the frequent mutations, predator-prey relationships seem to change every moment. I already like it here."
—Vivien Reid

name: Akiri, Fearless Voyager
text: "No angel bars our ascent. Emeria waits above!"

name: Vraska's Finisher
text: "You might have pleaded your case with my queen earlier. Now I am here, and it is far too late."

name: Eliminate the Competition
text: Open hostilities are strictly forbidden at the Inventors' Fair, but "accidents" still happen.

name: Counterintelligence
text: Before the battle of Red Cliffs, a supposedly sleeping Zhou Yu allowed his old friend, a Wei advisor, to steal a planted letter forged as if from Wei's two best admirals.

name: Light of Day
text:
"I do not miss sunlight. The very memory of it burns my eyes."
—Volrath

name: Wasteland
text: The land was left depleted and empty, an unsettling taste of things to come.

name: Jor Kadeen, the Prevailer
text: "As long as my hand holds a blade, there's hope for a pure Mirrodin once again."

name: Zimone, Quandrix Prodigy
text: "What are they complaining about? It's not like axiomatic leyline paratrigonometrics is hard."

name: Robo-Piñata
text: "I AM FILLED WITH DELICIOUS CANDY. I AM NOT A TRICK."

name: Ahn-Crop Invader
text:
"Give me a crew like this one and I'd rule any sea I sailed."
—Angrath

name: Birds of Paradise
text: Each feather in its tail is a souvenir of an exotic land, a memory condensed in hue.

name: Sanctuary Lockdown
text:
"Drannith gives no quarter to traitors."
—General Kudro

name: Kraken of the Straits
text: Thassa felt no need to punish the sailors for their folly in crossing the straits. The kraken would do it for her.

name: Lore Broker
text: Lies are sold as often as truths—and used just as effectively.

name: Goblin Shortcutter
text:
"Goblins are cheap, but be careful. It's a lot easier to steal from a corpse than a customer."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Pestilent Wolf
text: Wolves that feast on zombie flesh and survive carry the foul diseases of the dead wherever they roam.

name: Rally Maneuver
text: "Don't give up! You are steel and fire, and victory is yours to seize."

name: Frost Augur
text: From the barest crack in the ice, she teases forth a swirling, living map of the Cosmos.

name: Seek the Horizon
text:
"I've seen this great land from every angle. I know its every tree, stone, and river bend. Yet I have come to realize that knowing a thing is not the same as healing it."
—Diary of Azusa

name: Mardu Warshrieker
text:
"No body can contain so much fury. It reminds me of another battle, long past."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Prophetic Prism
text: To understand Baldur's Gate, one must first understand how wealth and commerce shape every facet of life.

name: Shattered Crypt
text:
"You must be mad to want one such as I aboard the *Weatherlight*. But I would be mad to remain here with my rotting family. I accept."
—Crovax

name: Pillar Tombs of Aku
text:
"Aku, City of Hidden Graves / Aku, City of Lost Kings / Aku, welcome me."
—Pillar tomb inscription

name: Spectral Bears
text:
"I hear there are Bears—or spirits—that guard caravans passing through the forest."
—Gulsen, Abbey Matron

name: Silburlind Snapper
text: Nephalia is home to many hard-shelled creatures of unusual size, the largest of which are either avoided or worshipped.

name: Rakdos Drake
text: Rakdos rioters paint their faces to resemble the drakes' bloodied muzzles.

name: Prodigal Sorcerer
text: "You can't learn to enjoy life's amusements in the pages of books. You must seek them out in earnest."

name: Master of Death
text: Coming back from the dead, like most things, gets easier with practice.

name: Divine Presence
text:
"Serra's light isn't easily extinguished."
—Reya Dawnbringer

name: Scathe Zombies
text:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Welkin Tern
text:
"The sky hedrons are covered with tern nests. It's as though the birds have given up on the land altogether."
—Ilori, merfolk falconer

name: Titanic Brawl
text: Whoever wins, the neighborhood loses.

name: Kavu Monarch
text: Kavu emerged all across Dominaria, but the first and the strongest came from Yavimaya.

name: Daring Saboteur
text: "They'll never see me coming."

name: Shadow of Mortality
text:
"Build your towers as tall as you want. The shadow always reaches higher."
—Message scrawled on an alley wall

name: Hunted Witness
text: He ferried weapons, spells, exotic animals—but his most dangerous cargo was the truth.

name: Herald of Hoofbeats
text: Most dismissed her love of horses as a passing childhood fancy. Years later it saved their lives.

name: Viscerid Armor
text: One Viscerid's death is often another's gain.

name: Revoke Existence
text:
"No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all."
—Ganedor, loxodon mystic

name: Oswald Fiddlebender
text: "Can't see this airship crashing in the near future. Sturdy as a rock."

name: Scorned Villager // Moonscarred Werewolf
text: "My village's fear drove me into the wild . . ."

name: Aether Adept
text: "The universe is my instrument, and the song I play upon it is one you are forbidden to hear."

name: Pitchstone Wall
text: Its material may not be precious, but the minds it protects are.

name: Elvish Branchbender
text: "How do the vinebred feel? Fah! We do not ask the puppet how it feels when the puppeteer bids it dance."

name: Molten Monstrosity
text: The cold snap killed off most of the heat-loving hellions . . . leaving only the strongest alive to breed.

name: Leonin Lightscribe
text: All who hear his inspiring words are filled with hope and pride.

name: It That Betrays
text: Your pleas for death shall go unheard.

name: Cradle of the Accursed
text: Many such monuments dot the wasteland known as Ifnir.

name: Subtle Strike
text: Renegades do some of their best work right under the Consulate's nose.

name: Devoted Hero
text: The heart's courage is the soul's guardian.

name: False Memories
text:
"My enemies will forget everything but their anguish."
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Suntail Hawk
text: Its eye the glaring sun, its cry the keening wind.

name: Hydrolash
text:
"I don't need your mage-rings or your mana equations. I call, and the sea answers."
—Keyta, rebel hydromancer

name: Foul Orchard
text:
"Such a beautiful place for a stroll."
—Liliana Vess

name: Divine Sacrament
text: "My wings shall be your shield. My sword shall be your vengeance."

name: Ancient Crab
text: After the fall of Sea Gate and the draining of the Halimar basin, the crab set off to find a new home.

name: Spiteful Prankster
text: The devil appreciated the irony of using doves for ammunition. The townsfolk, not so much.

name: Dungeon Crawler
text:
"I think of it as giving them another chance to achieve their potential."
—Nestus Wrasse, necromancer

name: Crystal Carapace
text:
"Why won't you die, wretched flesh-beast?"
—Lukka

name: Wicked Guardian
text: "Some are born to greatness. You were born to scrub greatness's floors."

name: Fumigate
text:
"Ghirapur's gremlin population poses a threat to the infrastructure of the fairgrounds. Threats must be eliminated."
—Sram, senior edificer

name: Baloth Pup
text: A young baloth channels its energy into playful destructiveness. Over time, it becomes less playful but no less destructive.

name: Syphon Life
text: Leeches never tire of feeding.

name: Drekavac
text: Like a vulture's scalp, the face of a drekavac is oily and hairless. The filth and disease of its carrion diet slip off its blood-slick skin.

name: Stinging Study
text: Silverquill first-years welcome discomfort in the classroom, knowing it will prepare them for the years ahead.

name: Knight of Sorrows
text: The helmet reveals no eyes to witness your penance, no mouth to offer absolution.

name: Icatian Scout
text:
"Because the orc hordes attacked along the entire border, Scouts were essential to Icatia's defense."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI*

name: Kor Hookmaster
text: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

name: Salvage
text:
"What was taken shall be restored."
—Arathel, elvish queen

name: Ruination Rioter
text: "Those urbanist cobble-roaches won't know what hit them!"

name: Hungry Flames
text: In the hold of the *Heart of Kiran*, Chandra answered Dovin Baan's sabotage with an explosive retort.

name: Nomads en-Kor
text: The Kor forsake roots for the winding of the path; forsake voices for the silence of the mind; forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

name: Mercenaries
text:
"Blasted amateurs! Doesn't the queen think we can fight well enough on our own?"
—Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

name: Colorful Feiyi Sparrow
text: These nimble sparrows, not often seen, delight in tricking the pangolins that wander the forest.

name: Zof Consumption // Zof Bloodbog
text:
"Annihilation surrounds us. Our call is to embrace its ceaseless hunger."
—Voshk, oblivion priest

name: Fortune Teller
text: TODAY'S FORTUNE: YOU WILL HAVE A CHANCE ENCOUNTER WITH A HANDSOME ROBOT.

name: Channel
text: To some mages, the meaning of life is less important than how much is left.

name: Foam Weapons Kiosk
text: Nothing is safe in the hands of an eight-year-old.

name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
text: Blessed by the gods. Coveted by mortals. Beholden to neither.

name: Ballynock Cohort
text: A kithkin's worst enemy is solitude.

name: Gaseous Form
text:
". . . [A]nd gives to airy nothing A local habitation and a name."
—William Shakespeare,
*A Midsummer-Night's Dream*

name: Spirit Link
text: The noble paladins draw strength from the courage of others.

name: Monomania
text:
"What do vermin cling to when all hope is lost?"
—Sorin Markov

name: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
text: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."

name: Wormhole Serpent
text: After drownings, devourings, and one highly unpleasant algae infestation, unsupervised portal use on campus was banned.

name: Bastion Protector
text: "As long as I stand, so will your cause."

name: Wayward Soul
text:
"no home no heart no hope"
—Stronghold graffito

name: Grizzly Bears
text: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

name: Leap
text: Mirri leapt quickly and silently. The guard died likewise.

name: Gorilla Shaman
text:
"Frankly, destruction is best left to professionals."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Titan of Eternal Fire
text: There is no gift more precious or more perilous than fire.

name: Paradox Engine
text:
"This device was submitted to the Fair anonymously. It is imperative that its maker be found. We must understand it."
—Confiscation directive

name: Ashen Rider
text: One offering to appease her on her arrival. Another to celebrate her departure.

name: Genesis
text:
"First through the Riftstone was Genesis—and the world was lifeless no more."
—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Grayscaled Gharial
text: Each tooth carries enough bacteria to kill a person in a day or two. But then, gharials do have 138 teeth.

name: Carapace
text:
"The tougher to crack, the sweeter the snack."
—Kakra, Sea Troll

name: Persist
text: Action: Show a kithkin (see pg. 28) emerging from under the ground where he was buried.

name: Sun-Collared Raptor
text:
"With Tilonalli's gifts, even the smallest of us can become great."
—Huatli

name: Locust Miser
text: "They're numerous, attack in swarms, and are always hungry. No wonder we rats hold such a kinship with them."

name: Intrepid Provisioner
text: "How do I know where aid is needed? Look around you."

name: Guildscorn Ward
text:
"The Gateless have risen. The Ten shall fall."
—Ninth District graffiti

name: Carrion Locust
text: No honor. No glory. No leftovers.

name: Heroic Charge
text: "For Keld! For Benalia! For Dominaria!"

name: Blood Burglar
text:
"You've heard that a vampire can't enter a home without an invitation? A lie meant to help you sleep at night."
—Kerin, watch sergeant

name: Throne of the High City
text: A shining symbol of Paliano's true ruler—ambition.

name: Retraction Helix
text: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the Æther can harvest power beyond comprehending.

name: Timid Drake
text: It flees from anything that isn't shaped like a cloud.

name: Colossal Majesty
text: "Wow, it's even *bigger* than I thought! Awesome!"

name: Perish the Thought
text: It removed only one idea from her mind: defiance.

name: Boros Challenger
text: "Send your champion. I could use a light workout."

name: Iridescent Hornbeetle
text: The hatchlings will fill the jungles of Murasa in a glittering tide.

name: Tideforce Elemental
text: Ebb and flow, high tide and low, quick as sand and just as slow.

name: Future Sight
text:
"My past holds only pain and loss. I will conquer it by creating the perfect future."
—Ixidor, reality sculptor

name: Shatterstorm
text: From a marvel of magical mechanization to a smoking stack of scrap in one easy step.

name: Resuscitate
text:
"It is the art of convincing someone to live."
—Orim, Samite healer

name: Rootwater Hunter
text:
"Bitter water vicious wave
Shadow-cold shallows root-made maze
Home's angry embrace."
—*Rootwater Saga*

name: Exultant Cultist
text: Amid the gibbering chorus that rose from the drownyard temple, Jace recognized a single word: "Emrakul."

name: Armor Sliver
text:
Hanna: "We must learn how they protect each other."
Mirri: "After they've done trying to kill us, all right?"

name: Hobgoblin Dragoon
text: The faeries snickered at first. A common hob in Oona's skies? But his lance ended their mockery, and now the sound of a cicada's wings brings a shudder to the faerie heart.

name: Memory Erosion
text:
"The Filigree Texts do not compel you to act in accordance with their precepts. They only specify the consequences should you fail."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn

name: Frost Giant
text: The frost giants have been out in the cold a long, long time, but they have their rage to keep them warm.

name: Vampire's Zeal
text: The Feast of Blood sends new life essence flowing through the vampire who partakes, manifesting as even greater strength and speed.

name: Ancestor's Prophet
text: "We have faced horrors of war and terrors beyond imagining. We will overcome the uncertainties of this new life."

name: Elvish Herder
text: Before Urza and Mishra came to Argoth, the herders prevented their creatures from stampeding. During the war, they encouraged it.

name: Ironsoul Enforcer
text: "You break it, you buy it. You steal it, I find it."

name: Hazoret's Monument
text:
"The worthy shall rush to the God-Pharaoh's side with relentless zeal, rising to overcome every obstacle."
—Monument inscription

name: Expedition Map
text:
"Let's see. I've been here, here, here, here, and here. Where next?"
—Olenn, tireless traveler

name: Relic Barrier
text: Its transmissions are the word of Memnarch. It speaks, and metal bows.

name: Gorilla Shaman
text:
"Each generation teaches the next that artifice is the enemy of natural order."
—Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Sylvan Awakening
text:
"Yavimaya is aware, but not always awake. You will know the difference when you see it."
—Karn

name: Go-Shintai of Shared Purpose
text: It seeks those who act with kindness and offers friendship.

name: Flamekin Spitfire
text: Some flamekin warriors explore the art of coherence, an ancient discipline that harnesses the chaos of fire and focuses it with pinpoint precision.

name: Think Twice
text:
"Great books are meant to be read, then read again backwards or upside down!"
—Ettovard, Tolarian archivist

name: Niblis of Dusk
text: It fuels its lanterns by leaching the warmth from its surroundings.

name: Corpse Augur
text: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.

name: Pithing Needle
text: The fearful want the procedure before a blood festival. The guilty seek it afterward.

name: Deadly Riposte
text:
"Automatons are fast, precise, and tireless, but they all share one weakness: predictability. Learn their patterns. Strike when they're vulnerable."
—Horance, Urzan general

name: Moonlight Hunt
text: Courage alone won't keep you alive.

name: Etherium Abomination
text: It was given life by the etherium of a hundred slain Esperites.

name: Swift Kick
text: Shintan sensed the malice in his opponent, but he did not strike until the orc's muscles tensed in preparation to throw the first punch.

name: Cephalid Broker
text: Cephalids value the free exchange of ideas—except for the "free" part.

name: Stensia Uprising
text: "Vampires have done nothing but take from us. Tonight, we reclaim what's ours!"

name: Frantic Salvage
text: "We will mourn when there is time. For now, we survive."

name: Soul's Might
text: An avatar he sculpts of instinct and force.

name: Submerged Boneyard
text: Aether currents in the sky mirror water currents below, including the deadly rapids.

name: Elixir of Vitality
text:
"Eternal life or your money back."
—Unnamed Suq'Ata merchant, deceased

name: Zombie Apocalypse
text:
"There will come a day so dark you will pray for death. On that day your prayers will be answered."
—Minaldra, the Vizag Atum

name: Curse of Oblivion
text: The first step to peace is to learn how to forget.

name: Adamaro, First to Desire
text:
"Beware Adamaro! In him all pain and anger is perfected."
—Isao, Enlightened Bushi

name: Infernal Reckoning
text: "When these intruders are gone, Zendikar will be my throne, my palace, my playground."

name: Sol'kanar the Swamp King
text:
"All the power of a maro-sorcerer, all the mindless fury of a pitlord. He is a perfect servant.
—Geyadrone Dihada

name: Matca Rioters
text: When outsiders interrupted the matca championship, things got ugly.

name: Skyshroud Ranger
text: Not even the elves truly know the Skyshroud Forest. The rangers are merely the best equipped to handle its uncertainty.

name: Icy Manipulator
text:
"The scavengers who first found it called it the 'Bone Crank.' Not a bad name, I'd say."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Join the Maestros
text: "We're family now, big guy."

name: Pariah
text:
"Why would I consider penance for my actions when I have so many subjects willing to do it for me?"
—Lord Konda

name: Dwarven Miner
text:
"Fetch the pestridder, Paka—we've got dwarves in the rutabagas!"
—Jamul, Femeref farmer

name: Double Play
text: The wizard exclaimed, "I'm no chicken . . . ."

name: Armory Veteran
text: "This one is for goblins, this one is for owlbears, this one is for toast, this one is for . . ."

name: Jack-o'-Lantern
text: By the end of the festival, it was the only thing still grinning.

name: Zndrsplt's Judgment
text: Zndrsplt retired from officiating when she teamed up with Okaun, but she still knows the penalties better than anyone else.

name: Cabal Surgeon
text: "Clerics give up when their patients die. Can I help it if I'm more compassionate?"

name: Stabilizer
text:
"Hold that thought."
—Pemmin, Riptide survivor

name: Exalted Angel
text:
"She is a theme of honor and renown, . . . Whose present courage may beat down our foes."
—William Shakespeare, *Troilus and Cressida*

name: Piston-Fist Cyclops
text: Its hyperpneumatics can punch through a wall and the spy on the other side.

name: Dread Return
text: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.

name: Gobsmacked
text: You haven't seen it until you see it in 6-D.

name: Extinguish the Light
text: Jaya did not want to die, but of all the things to die for, Dominaria felt right.

name: Harness the Storm
text:
"There is no place like a rooftop laboratory in a lightning storm. It's where genius strikes."
—Renna, Selhoff alchemist

name: Treasure Hunter
text:
"What separates junk from treasure is imagination."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Ass Whuppin'
text: Asses to ashes, Donkeys to dust.

name: Aven Eternal
text:
"I've never seen the firemane angels so anxious."
—Tajic

name: Scoria Cat
text: Like a volcano, it too can erupt without warning.

name: Panic Attack
text: Sometimes everyone decides to go for help at the same time.

name: Sorceress Queen
text:
"We have always counted time with sand; this pinch is your meaningless life."
—Nailah, self-proclaimed Queen of Rabiah

name: Arrogant Poet
text: "I would be kinder to my peers, Professor, but I simply don't have any."

name: Thundering Spineback
text:
"It appears that nature has risen against us."
—Captain Brinely Rage

name: Drogskol Captain
text: Dead or alive, true leaders can inspire an entire army.

name: Ahn-Crop Champion
text: "The Second Sun nears its destination! Let it light the way to ours!"

name: Hunt Down
text: "Springjacks and faeries can be difficult to hunt, but my favorite prey are the flamekin. They never fail to put up a worthy fight when cornered."

name: Testament of Faith
text:
"Belief in the Ancestor is admirable, but our enemies often demand something more . . . tangible."
—Pianna, nomad captain

name: Initiate's Companion
text:
"I'd like to say that it's our pet, but the reverse may be closer to the truth."
—Ixor, initiate of Rhet crop

name: Ruthless Disposal
text:
"Do try to pull your weight, Geralf. I feel like I'm doing everything."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

name: The Brute
text: "Union may be strength, but it is mere blind brute strength unless wisely directed." —Samuel Butler

name: Leonin Warleader
text:
"Troops, kitten formation! This mouse won't catch itself!"
—Whiskers

name: Venomthrope
text:
"See that cloud that hangs around it? More than a minute in there and you'll be bleeding out of places you didn't even know you had."
—Captain Ascote

name: Shape Stealer
text:
"Stand back. I know just what to do."
—Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker

name: Barging Sergeant
text: "Don't stop till your horns come out their back."

name: Glimmerpost
text: What once spied upon Mirrodin from above now waits below for another to assume control.

name: Selesnya Locket
text:
"Think of the locket as a seed you bear, spreading life from Vitu-Ghazi across all of Ravnica."
—Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

name: Solemnity
text: The arrival of the God-Pharaoh marked a betrayal of both gods and mortals.

name: Gigantosaurus
text:
"Each tooth is the length of a horse, and new ones grow in every sixteen days. Let's get a closer look!"
—Vivien Reid

name: Ogre Shaman
text: Ogre shamans must be bright enough to learn their invocations and dim enough to use them.

name: Broken Wings
text: Getting airborne with a kitesail is easy. It's everything afterward that takes focus, skill, and luck.

name: Necrite
text: Necrites killed Jherana Rure, ending the counterinsurgency.

name: Built to Last
text: Consulate-built automatons have a lifetime warranty.

name: Dwarven Armory
text:
"Few of us left, now. Confounded Yeti have opened all the vents. We'd best hide here with the weapons."
—Perena Deepcutter, Dwarven Armorer

name: Frillscare Mentor
text: Fortune favors the ferocious.

name: Reflexes
text:
"Here's how ya win. Don't let the other guy hit back first."
—Jula, goblin raider

name: Willow Dryad
text: Some think that dryads are the dreams of trees.

name: Smiting Helix
text: Malice is appropriate when vengeance is called for.

name: Black Knight
text: Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight.

name: Faithless Looting
text: "Avacyn has abandoned us! We have nothing left except what we can take!"

name: Hungering Yeti
text: No clan is as adept at saying "go away" as the Temur.

name: Anointed Procession
text:
"The gods here may walk among the people, but they are not with them."
—Gideon Jura

name: Fiery Justice
text:
"The fire of justice burns like nothing else."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Maralen of the Mornsong
text: Maralen sent Veesa, Endry, and Iliona—the Vendilion clique—on the gravest of tasks.

name: Erithizon
text: Unlike scorpions, the erithizon isn't immune to its own weaponry.

name: Vindictive Vampire
text: In theory, the Guildpact keeps guild feuds from spiraling out of control. Personal feuds, however, are not covered.

name: Angelic Observer
text: Still and solemn as the statues of her kind that decorated the Park Heights rooftops, she gazed in sorrow on the city below.

name: Hollowhenge Beast
text: In a world of monsters, it's the stuff of nightmares.

name: Goblin Gardener
text: Years of attempts have brought the goblins no closer to growing a sausage tree.

name: Skullclamp
text: The mind is a beautiful bounty encased in an annoying bone container.

name: The Cheese Stands Alone
text: The meat, on the other hand, has frequent visitors.

name: Dictate of Kruphix
text: "Knowledge is cruel. It will break your heart and test your allegiances. Are you certain you want this curse?"

name: Vineshaper Mystic
text: She has never touched a loom, yet the tapestries she weaves are vast and beautiful.

name: Silent Departure
text: The same magic that lets geists pass through our realm can force them out of it.

name: Moat
text: The purpose of any moat is to impede attack. Some are filled with water, some with thistles. Some are filled with things best left unseen.

name: Stormclaw Rager
text: No amount of spilled oil and crushed metal could slake her bloodlust.

name: Alhammarret's Archive
text: It contains the totality of Alhammarret's notes, theories, and ponderings.

name: Kitsune Palliator
text: "Who am I to judge who is deserving and who is not? That is a question for lords, not healers."

name: Bonds of Quicksilver
text: The sea's reach extends beyond its shores.

name: Repentant Blacksmith
text:
"For my confession they burned me with fire / And found that I was for endurance made."
—*The Arabian Nights*,
trans. Haddawy

name: Pilfer
text: To the merchant, it was nothing more than a few missing trinkets. To Tinybones, it was the greatest heist of all time.

name: Holy Strength
text:
"Born under the sun, the first child will seek the foundation of honor and be fortified by its righteousness."
—Codex of the Constellari

name: Necrogen Mists
text: Mephidross filled with roars of fury and wails of despair as the leonin fought to keep their memories from being pulled into the mists.

name: Abzan Advantage
text:
"To survive, you must seize every opportunity."
—Daghatar the Adamant

name: Viseling
text: "This may hurt a lot."

name: Cackling Fiend
text: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

name: Frondland Felidar
text:
"Fear not the behemoth heard from miles away. Fear the stalking felidar, which reveals itself only for the kill."
—Rielle, the Everwise

name: Contagious Nim
text:
"This species has grown to be my preferred receptacle for our divine message."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
text: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

name: Trusty Packbeast
text:
"Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back."
—Hewen Frit, merchant

name: Avacyn's Memorial
text: They had no marble, so the faithful repaired her likeness with wood, straw, twine, and clay.

name: Dawnglade Regent
text:
"Every creature in the glade paused and stared. Overcome, I bowed to the beast."
—Endril, Kalonian naturalist

name: Springleaf Drum
text: "The music is in the drum. I simply coax it out to be heard."

name: Renounce
text: Gerrard offered no defense to Orim's condemnation; the mission was under his command, and he was responsible.

name: Vulshok Battlemaster
text: "I could demonstrate how the leonin sunsplicer works, but then you'd be too dead to buy one."

name: Monastery Swiftspear
text: The calligraphy of combat is written with strokes of sudden blood.

name: Gilded Lotus
text: Over such beauty, wars are fought. With such power, wars are won.

name: Noxious Dragon
text: Dragons of Silumgar's brood begin to digest their prey even before consuming it, letting their caustic breath do much of the work.

name: Border Guard
text: "Join the army, see foreign countries!" they'd said.

name: Birds of Paradise
text: Its diet consists of the rare everyberry, which tastes different every time. It loves the surprise!

name: Reanimate
text:
"Death is a small price to pay for immortality."
—Baron Sengir

name: Caustic Wasps
text: Even the wasp knows how to pay the magistrate his due respect.

name: Summit Prowler
text:
"Do you not hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? Their meat is as tender as a bear's and their blood as warming as fire. They are prey that will please Atarka."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

name: Pillage
text:
"Were they to reduce us to ash, we would clog their throats and sting their eyes in payment."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Cemetery Gate
text:
"It keeps some out, yes. It also keeps others in!"
—Grandmother Sengir

name: Stromkirk Bloodthief
text: With House Voldaren ascendant, some members of the Stromkirk line took it upon themselves to "borrow" from the blood tithes.

name: Tome Scour
text: "I hope none of those were important!"

name: Wu Admiral
text: The Wu kingdom's well-trained admirals were integral to the Southlands' victory at Red Cliffs as well as the kingdom's defense.

name: Growing Ranks
text:
"We will grow an army large enough to withstand the Izzet's madness."
—Trostani

name: Icatian Phalanx
text: Even after the wall was breached in half a dozen places, the phalanxes fought on, standing solidly against the onrushing raiders. Disciplined and dedicated, they held their ranks to the end, even in the face of tremendous losses.

name: Thousand-Year Storm
text: Cloudy with a chance of chaos.

name: Where Ancients Tread
text:
"Never subtle nor cryptic is the reckoning of the mighty."
—Mayael the Anima

name: Geth's Verdict
text:
"Everyone should owe you something."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Sky Diamond
text: Every facet a window into Oghma's divine insight.

name: Cinder Pyromancer
text: "If the whole world burns, I'll never grow cold."

name: Harrow
text: The Roil redraws the world as it passes, leaving only the hedrons unchanged.

name: Tarmogoyf
text: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.

name: Rustspore Ram
text: Where herds have passed, the dented ground is lined with piles of rust.

name: Shunt
text: "You might want to work on your aim."

name: Thalisse, Reverent Medium
text: She hears every voice from the swirling, whispering mist and swears to tell their stories.

name: Dross Ripper
text:
"Such a creation serves no purpose other than exterminating every one of us."
—Sadra Alic, Neurok strategist

name: Kitesail
text: Kitesailing is a way of life—and without practice, the end of it.

name: Bloodfire Enforcers
text: Bloodfire practitioners train to focus their rage, building it deep inside themselves until they are ready to release it as a devastating attack.

name: Reverberate
text:
"That which was, will be. That which will be, was."
—Kairos Fateweaver

name: Slaughter Drone
text: It kills what is, making way for what should not be.

name: Basilica Screecher
text: A screech in the night is all it takes for Orzhov debtors to clutch at their coin purses.

name: Stone Giant
text: A typical day for a giant. A momentous event for a goat.

name: Miner's Bane
text: There are certain stones even dwarves know to leave in the earth.

name: Twilight Mire
text: As their roots soaked in a weak tea of bogwater and decay, the trees absorbed the essence of death into their living tissue.

name: Warren-Scourge Elf
text:
"If one can associate any virtue with the eyeblights, it is the talent some achieve in disposing of them. I have seen the slaying of boggarts raised nearly to an art form."
—Fiala, Gilt-Leaf winnower

name: Idyllic Tutor
text: "You are loved, child."

name: Gryff Rider
text:
"Keep your heels down and bend at the hips as your mount takes flight. She'll do the rest."
—Anders, cathar drillmaster

name: Wallop
text: In Yavimaya, flying low to join a battle can be a costly mistake.

name: Scourgemark
text: To members of the cult of Erebos, gold-infused tattoos symbolize the inevitable grasp of the god of death.

name: Oak Street Innkeeper
text: The city is vast and perilous, but there are places where a weary traveler can feel very much at home.

name: Essence Drain
text: Mephidross claims all life within it. What cannot be twisted is absorbed.

name: Rise of Extus
text: With one lethal strike, Extus took control of the Oriq and took his first step towards vengeance.

name: Soldevi Simulacrum
text: They look human—until they bleed.

name: Terra Ravager
text: It lives in the mountaintops, feeds at the mountains' feet, and kills anything it finds on the path between.

name: Shadewing Laureate
text: "Would you prefer I destroy you using prose or verse?"

name: Hulking Ogre
text:
"The Keldons' ogre campaign provided more body parts than my meager facility could properly use."
—Gatha, Tolarian renegade

name: Azusa's Many Journeys // Likeness of the Seeker
text:
"I ask for nothing more than a new journey and a fresh path to greet my feet when I wake each morning."
—Azusa

name: Adult Gold Dragon
text: Gold dragons are the greatest of the metallic dragons in size, power, and wisdom, and often take it upon themselves to safeguard mortal communities from evils that might threaten them.

name: Sea Eagle
text: Where air meets water, fish meets talon.

name: Uninvited Geist // Unimpeded Trespasser
text: A slow knock at midnight is best left unanswered.

name: Traumatic Revelation
text: "My new form must be hard to understand."

name: Skyclave Squid
text: An ancient sea monster dragged the Murasa Skyclave under the waves, then smaller sea monsters moved in.

name: "Brims" Barone, Midway Mobster
text: The capo of caps, the hitman of hats, the don of donning fashionable headwear.

name: Order of the Ebon Hand
text: Dedicated to the principles of Tourach, members of the Order of the Ebon Hand demonstrated their devotion with grisly rituals.

name: Updraft
text:
"Come one, come all! this rock shall fly From its firm base as soon as I."
—Sir Walter Scott, "The Lady of the Lake"

name: Flameblade Angel
text: "You must pay for your sin in blood."

name: Order of the Sacred Torch
text: A blazing light to drive out the shadows.

name: Act of Treason
text: Each day uncertainty and rumors spread, and each night attendance at the Juri Revue increases.

name: Yellow Scarves Troops
text: Over 500,000 commoners followed Zhang Jue, General of Heaven, in his attempt to overthrow the corrupt Han dynasty.

name: Adventure Awaits
text: "Good, we're all here. Let's get started!"

name: Turntimber Ranger
text: The lone wolf dies alone.

name: Spore Crawler
text:
"Remember to come back in a few years when that fungus has died off. Then we'll see what's in the chest."
—Old Rutstein

name: Sacred Prey
text: To see one is a good omen to the Cho-Arrim.

name: Presence of Gond
text: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

name: A-Falcon Abomination
text: The foulest of fowl.

name: Strionic Resonator
text: Its tines cannot be rung by mere physical force. Only magic of great power can start its eldritch resonance.

name: Dreamstone Hedron
text: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

name: Waterfront Bouncer
text: Closing time comes earlier to some than to others.

name: Tanglepool Bridge
text: The path to change is forged in insight.

name: Brass's Bounty
text:
"Why squabble for trinkets when we could be living large off all this gold?"
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Sudden Edict
text:
"In one future, I see glory. In the other . . . well, that's another story."
—Whisper, blood liturgist

name: Disfigure
text: With a snap of metal like a strike of lightning, the tide of war shifted in Mishra's favor.

name: Flowstone Surge
text: The army was never at a loss for weapons; Crovax was their forge.

name: Jhessian Infiltrator
text: The Jhessian navy makes successful raids on Valeron's coastal towns thanks to their spies planted during peacetime.

name: Tear Asunder
text: No one knew why the spiritmongers were so enraged by Phyrexian technology, but it was a stroke of good luck for the Coalition.

name: Thought Vessel
text: Infinite possibilities contained in a finite space.

name: Savai Sabertooth
text: The giant tigers of Savai prefer to hunt at daybreak, when the crystals' warning glow is masked by the light of dawn.

name: Inferno Elemental
text:
"Those who wish to invade our monastery, please take it up with my servant."
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Inferno Project
text: Art born from such raw emotion often takes on a life of its own.

name: Slitherhead
text:
"It makes better use of Uncle Dragi's head than he ever did."
—Pesha, retired blacksmith

name: Viashino Sandscout
text: A viashino's overlapping scales form a buffer against Shiv's ash-flecked winds and a slippery target for goblin pikes.

name: Loaming Shaman
text:
"The living don't ever stay living, and the dead don't always stay dead."
—Jeddeg, philosopher of graves

name: King Crab
text:
"I'm allergic to shellfish—not only did it kill my entire village, it also gave me this nasty rash."
—Olivia, fisher

name: Schismotivate
text:
"I ran the experiment through the brain of a schizophrenic lab-goblin. My burners' flames fell asleep while the beakers jumped about and shattered. Success!"
—Myznar, Izzet psychomancer

name: Cathar's Shield
text:
"A leader can inspire courage, but it is the smiths and healers who truly keep hope alive."
—Thalia, heretic cathar

name: Piper of the Swarm
text: "If it has ears, it will dance to my tune."

name: Moonfolk Puzzlemaker
text: "Research is hardly the dry, serious pastime outsiders make it out to be."

name: Eater of Days
text: When Mirrodin's varied civilizations developed ways to fight the levelers, Memnarch upped the stakes.

name: Frost Giant
text: The Frost Giants have been out in the cold a long, long time, but they have their rage to keep them warm.

name: Kjeldoran Dead
text:
"They shall drink sorrow's dregs. They shall kill those whom once they loved."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Consuming Aetherborn
text: Doji found the Phyrexian's essence foul, but every drop added an hour to their life.

name: Feral Krushok
text: In a stunning act of diplomacy, Yasova Dragonclaw ceded a portion of Temur lands to the Sultai. Her clan protested until they saw she had given the Sultai the breeding grounds of the krushoks. They hadn't realized she had a sense of humor.

name: Soltari Trooper
text:
"Dauthi blood is Soltari wine."
—Soltari *Tales of Life*

name: Reclusive Wight
text: There are places so horrible that even the dead hide their faces.

name: Minamo, School at Water's Edge
text: Its students graduate the school and enter history.

name: Gloomhunter
text: Scavengers both mundane and magical follow in its wake, feeding on the scraps of flesh and spirit it leaves behind.

name: Zoologist
text: "With friends like these, who needs people?"

name: Fearful Villager // Fearsome Werewolf
text: When Harold ran from the wolves, the others called him a coward.

name: Nature's Lore
text:
"Fyndhorn is our home."
—Kolbjörn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Claire D'Loon, Joy Sculptor
text: She'll sculpt goblins, saprolings, Marit Lage . . . though that one takes a *lot* of balloons.

name: Alabaster Potion
text: "Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity." —D'Avenant proverb

name: Shanodin Dryads
text: Where dryads dance, seeds sprout and flowers bloom.

name: Blex, Vexing Pest // Search for Blex
text: Pests are typically harvested before they outgrow their enclosures. Blex is far from typical.

name: Breeding Pool
text:
"One beginning, many paths."
—Vannifar

name: Phyrexian Monitor
text: Being one would be an honor, if the word "honor" had any meaning in Phyrexia.

name: Spark Spray
text: "You see this rock-grinder? One step closer and it'll be a face-grinder!"

name: Domesticated Hydra
text: "Sit. Fetch. Devastate."

name: Shapers' Sanctuary
text: Protection is woven into every vine and branch.

name: Order of the Sacred Bell
text: "Our bodies are weak compared to those of the kami, our knowledge limited, and our magic poor. Yet we draw breath. That alone is reason to hope."

name: Dawn of Hope
text:
"To wage war, secure peace within yourself."
—Emmara

name: Crosis's Charm
text: A pretty bauble of persecution.

name: Folk Hero
text: Tales of your great deeds follow you no matter how far you travel from your hometown.

name: Alert Heedbonder
text: Considering the zealous armies, vile poachers, and titanic monsters, it's always wise to keep one eye on the horizon.

name: Essence Scatter
text:
"What you attempt to pull from the aether, I can spread onto the wind."
—Jace Beleren

name: Essence Filter
text:
"Freyalise has cleansed our bodies and minds of the plagues of Kjeldor; all she asks in return is that we keep pure our newly given home in Fyndhorn."
—Kolbjörn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Call the Coppercoats
text: When the alarm crystals flash, Drannith's finest answer the call.

name: Regent's Authority
text: Before her spark pulled her away again, the Emperor appointed the wise Light-Paws to guide Kamigawa in her absence.

name: Dogged Hunter
text: The relationship between hunter and hunted knows nothing of alliances.

name: Redwood Treefolk
text: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.

name: Surge Mare
text: When it passes, waves touch the sky.

name: Dragon's Presence
text:
"The Ancestor Dragon appeared atop the clouds, amid shattering mountains and sundering earth."
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Quicksilver Fisher
text: It no longer needs to eat, but old instincts are put to use ridding the Surgical Bay of spies.

name: Shipwreck Sifters
text: A loyal crew sticks together, even after death.

name: Whitemane Lion
text: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

name: Rockslide Sorcerer
text: "You can cower from the crushing shards or embrace the danger of Akoum. I've made my choice."

name: Frenzied Raptor
text: Sun Empire warriors are taught to emulate the fearless raptors that fling themselves against towers of horn and muscle a hundred times their size.

name: Electryte
text: Shivan inhabitants are hardened to fire, so their predators have developed alternative weaponry.

name: Roterothopter
text:
"The roterothoper is as insidious as it is ingenious. It is one of the few creations of our school that I take no pride in."
—Baki, wizard attendant

name: Wall of Bone
text:
"Graveyards are sacrilege! A waste of perfectly good bones."
—Keren-Dur, necromancer lord

name: Trusty Retriever
text: Wipe away the slobber and it's as good as new, give or take a few bite marks.

name: The Rack
text: Invented in Mishra's earlier days, the rack was once his most feared creation.

name: Sun-Blessed Guardian // Furnace-Blessed Conqueror
text: Light glinted off the raised weapons of the Sun Empire, filling her with an unbreakable hope . . .

name: Vault of Whispers
text: Heretic cultures came to planet Sovereign in search of resources and precious artifacts. They found something else.

name: Sai of the Shinobi
text: The passing of the sai presages the end of the old clan and the ascent of the new.

name: Forest Bear
text:
Fish and bear paws—one can't have both.
—Chinese idiom meaning "you can't have it both ways"

name: Meekstone
text: The bigger they are, the stronger its pull.

name: Silverbeak Griffin
text: A pair of domesticated griffins escaped from captivity a century ago. Now the skies are filled with the songs of their descendants.

name: High Tide
text:
"May Svyelun and her tides favor you."
—Traditional Merfolk blessing

name: Mana Chains
text:
"The Lord of the Wastes must be destroyed; I am bound to this destiny by the chains of fate. If only Gerrard would see his part."
—Sisay, journal

name: Stormrider Spirit
text: The weary travelers mistook the flickering lights for a candleguilde pointing the way to Harvesttide. Their relief turned to terror as lightning lit the sky.

name: Grim Contest
text: The invader hoped he could survive the beast's jaws and emerge through its rotting skin.

name: Unlicensed Disintegration
text: "I'd stand back if I were you."

name: Crystal Ball
text: It glints with arcane truths to those who know how to glimpse them.

name: Golgari Signet
text: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

name: Oxidda Finisher
text: Popular wisdom says that Phyrexians don't feel fear. But popular wisdom has never tried to hold a bridge against an angry ogre.

name: Crash the Ramparts
text: The Legion's conquistadors could endure Ixalan's sun. Their forts could withstand a charging ceratops. But nothing can stop a ceratops strengthened by the sun.

name: Etherium Sculptor
text: Don't worry, they want you to smash them.

name: Humble the Brute
text: "The element of surprise only works when it's backed up by a bolt between the eyes."

name: Hanweir Militia Captain // Westvale Cult Leader
text: Her reputation inspires both loyalty and adoration.

name: Whisper Agent
text: He has a job to finish, and it's you.

name: Mantis Rider
text: Mantis riders know their mounts owe them no allegiance. Even a mantis ridden for years would consume a rider who loses focus for only a moment.

name: Storm King's Thunder
text:
"I alone am worthy to decide where lighting strikes."
—Hekaton, storm giant king

name: Battery Bearer
text: She always leads the charge.

name: Morphic Pool
text: Ancient magic reshapes the stage into a variety of landscapes.

name: Kotori, Pilot Prodigy
text: "Some people test limits. I prefer to demolish them."

name: Pact of Negation
text: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

name: Trail of Evidence
text:
"Every answer seems to lead to a more terrifying question."
—Jace Beleren

name: Eyes Everywhere
text: "They've got eyes inside my head!"

name: Need for Speed
text: His feet buckled the ground, his hands cut the wind to ribbons, and he was gone.

name: Crafty Pathmage
text: The most valuable commodity in the pits is a way out.

name: Abbey Gargoyles
text:
"Though Serra has not been seen for twenty years, her Gargoyles still watch over our city and punish the guilty."
—Gulsen, Abbey Matron

name: Muldrotha, the Gravetide
text: Yargle hadn't bargained on her showing up.

name: Arrest
text: Fayden didn't know if the giant had created the spehere's magic—only that he had to escape it to find Sifa.

name: Wall of Torches
text: The foolish try to leap through the unlit spaces. The arrogant believe the fires harmless. The wise find a different door.

name: Bear Cub
text:
Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it.
—Elvish saying

name: Hollowsage
text: Dreams of dark nights to come are said to stir in the minds of scheming hollowsages.

name: Venom
text:
"I told him it was just a flesh wound, but the next time I looked at him, poor Tadhg was dead and gone."
—Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*

name: Flailing Drake
text: Too many choices will always distract a greedy beast.

name: Yoked Plowbeast
text:
"It is sacrilege to confine a gargantuan to the grinding of straight lines. I will pray that it remembers who is the master of this land."
—Syeena, elvish godtoucher

name: Shambling Attendants
text:
"Let the world behold what becomes of those who defy us."
—Taigam, Sidisi's Hand

name: Command Tower
text:
"It's a bit much, I know, but it reminds my visitors who really holds the power here."
—Davriel Cane

name: Renegade Rallier
text: "This fight belongs to us all."

name: Grid Monitor
text: The vedalken protect the Knowledge Pool at any cost.

name: Footsteps of the Goryo
text: In the case of violent deaths, kami offered a chance for revenge if the deceased offered up its corpse as a host to the invading kami.

name: Ral's Outburst
text:
"Time to find the melting point of lazotep."
—Ral Zarek

name: Gerrard's Wisdom
text: "You'll lose a duel if your enemy comes expecting a war."

name: Rotfeaster Maggot
text: Is it at the top of the food chain or the bottom?

name: Gisa's Bidding
text: "Soft dirt makes for light work."

name: Pilgrim's Eye
text: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.

name: Dukhara Scavenger
text: The teeth marks add character.

name: Cyclops of Eternal Fury
text:
"The anger that festers inside this one is contagious."
—Anthousa of Setessa

name: Thieving Magpie
text: Rayne once made several unkind comparisons between the bird's naked opportunism and Urza's.

name: Magus of the Order
text: "Life for life. The cost is always the same."

name: Windreader Sphinx
text: "Your mind is too filled with foolish concerns to hear the subtle whispers that the breeze brings."

name: Charging Rhino
text: A rhino rarely uses its horn to announce its charge, only to end it.

name: Sailor of Means
text: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.

name: Valakut Fireboar
text:
"Just move very slowly, and for the love of Ula, do not get it mad."
—Chadir the Navigator

name: Harmonic Convergence
text: When the eternal stars align, can mere mortals resist?

name: Pincher Beetles
text:
"No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on *me*?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Merfolk Sovereign
text: "The sharks envy our ferocity. The eels envy our cunning."

name: Flamecore Elemental
text: To a fire elemental, fools and fuels are one and the same.

name: Ogre Enforcer
text:
"Ate up all of his siblings in the first week. A good beginning for one destined to command."
—Suka, ogre matron

name: Osai Vultures
text: A sign of battle, the Vultures circle and wait for the victorious to depart.

name: Saving Grasp
text: Nothing's more valuable than perfect timing.

name: Cackling Imp
text: Its laughter drives needles through your mind.

name: Electrostatic Bolt
text: It's hard to avoid electric shock when the entire plane is metallic.

name: Dread Return
text: The will to return can overpower the will to survive.

name: Stampede Driver
text: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."

name: Brine Shaman
text:
"The Shamans of Marit Lage do her bidding in secret, but they do it gladly."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Cutthroat Contender
text: The fights may sometimes be rigged, but the front-row spectators know the wounds are real.

name: Wild Wurm
text:
Wurm heads appear
Wild wurm near
Wurm tails you see
Wild wurm flee

name: Sautekh Immortal
text:
"Nothing clears a battlefield like a Deathstrike missile. Wait. Is something moving out there?"
—Commander Zander At'lan, Tallarn 115th Armoured Regiment

name: Death Wish
text: He wished for power, but not for the longevity to abuse it.

name: Yarok's Fenlurker
text:
"Yarok's nightmares lurk and wait
Where dark despair is near at hand."
—*Lament for Bala Ged*, stanza 3

name: Concession Stand
text: The Astrotorium offers fine dining at establishments such as Time Wok and Grilliana's.

name: Cruel Edict
text:
"Such a fragile organ, the brain."
—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Starstorm
text: Pardic barbarians didn't complain when the Order started blaming every crisis on the Cabal.

name: Diamond Kaleidoscope
text:
"A pretty toy. Now show me its tactical applications."
—Telim'Tor

name: Helbrute
text:
"No. No! Not the sarcophagus . . . Khorne damn you, you disloyal curs. JUST KILL ME!"
—Kalos the Ravager

name: Walking Atlas
text: Crafted by lullmages and bound to the land, it alters itself to match the tumultuous terrain.

name: Energy Flux
text:
"Nothing endures but change."
—Heraclitus

name: Court of Ire
text: Hold your tongue, lest you burn it.

name: Lifespark Spellbomb
text:
"Awaken that which was never asleep."
—Spellbomb inscription

name: Silent Artisan
text:
On the fourth day they passed through a forest of immense stacked stones. Althemone, youngest of the companions, called these pillars the work of a god, but the Champion knew better. She quickened her pace.
—*The Theriad*

name: Clone Legion
text: Their lust for battle was so great that they didn't care their enemies wore their own faces.

name: Teferi's Realm
text:
"Fire is dead. Water has killed him."
—From *The Stories of Nature*

name: Magma Spray
text:
"Ashes can't be embalmed."
—Neheb, initiate of Ahn crop

name: Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful
text: Day after day he sat there, knowing that the Wanderer would soon be back for him.

name: Cunning Geysermage
text: "Come on, Skitch, we'll lose them in the geyserfield."

name: Providence
text: There is power in prayer, regardless of who is listening.

name: Despotic Scepter
text:
"We were not meant to have such terrible things. They should be left where we found them, if not destroyed!"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Saruli Gatekeepers
text: In Ravnica's wilder districts, nature still stirs, and its protectors still mind their posts.

name: Wakedancer
text: Hers is an ancient form of necromancy, steeped in shamanic trance and ritual that few skaberen or ghoulcallers comprehend.

name: An-Havva Township
text: Folk of good heart will always find a home.

name: Rare-B-Gone
text: The only rare you'll ever need. Okay, not really.

name: Chandra's Ignition
text: In the moment before her execution, she realized what it meant to be a pyromancer, to be alive, to be Chandra.

name: Mourning Patrol // Morning Apparition
text: "You could see the spirits all along, couldn't you? Well, now I can too."

name: Krark-Clan Ironworks
text: All the junk, refuse, and offal of the Krark Clan is diligently collected, melted down, and made into more junk, refuse, and offal.

name: Glowering Rogon
text: A herd of one.

name: Plague Rats
text: During the dark times, the rats seemed to grow ever stronger.

name: Ornithopter
text:
"Without Urza's ingenuity, the wings
would never have borne weight. Without
Mishra's courage, we would never have
known the machine's true potential. I hope this persuades them to work together more."
—Tocasia, journal entry

name: Svyelunite Priest
text:
"Early Vodalians worshipped Svyelun, goddess of the Pearl Moon. Later she became a more abstract figure."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. V*

name: Snapback
text:
"If it returns years hence, our knowledge of how to combat it will be that much greater."
—Andorel, Tolarian sentinel

name: Converter Beast
text: Slowly, the distinct screams of the trapped faded into muffled gurgles of glistening oil.

name: Sphinx's Insight
text: "Do not think me blind to your true mission...or your true master, Grand Arbiter."

name: Invigorating Falls
text: Krosan druids do not fear death, for they know that nature will only prosper from their passing.

name: Headless Horseman
text:
". . . [T]he ghost rides forth to the scene of battle in nightly quest of his head . . . he sometimes passes along the Hollow, like a midnight blast . . ."
—Washington Irving, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow

name: Didn't Say Please
text: "If you're in our home, we expect you to mind your manners."

name: Invasion of Kaladesh // Aetherwing, Golden-Scale Flagship
text: Inspired by the grace of Ixalan's pterodons, Saheeli built one of her own.

name: Rootwater Hunter
text:
"Bitter water, vicious wave;
Shadow-cold shallows, root-made maze.
Home's angry embrace."
—Rootwater Saga

name: Hero of the Games
text: Winners of the Iroan Games are forever remembered as heroes of their people.

name: Broken Wings
text:
"Serra guides our shots true. Also, I just tuned the cannons."
—Tiana

name: Fog of Gnats
text: You can swat a thousand gnats, but a thousand more will assail you.

name: Planar Guide
text: "Every moment has its own savior."

name: Frenzied Goblin
text: What he lacks in stature, he makes up for with enthusiasm.

name: Spawn of Thraxes
text: Sparks from Purphoros's forge fill the belly of every dragon.

name: Skyline Scout
text: "Sometimes an angel passes by and gives me a little nod, like, 'You're a daring one!' That always makes my day."

name: Ob Nixilis, Captive Kingpin
text: Stranded on New Capenna without a spark, he faced five families out for blood.

name: Valiant Endeavor
text: "Only victory shall stop our charge!"

name: Plains
text: After spending all day trying to track down a rare tome, you're about to give up when you hear your name whispered from a dark alley.

name: Patrol Hound
text: To the camp, it was a fierce and loyal protector. To the sentry's youngest daughter, it would always be her "Wuv Muffin."

name: Laquatus's Disdain
text: "The first time was amusing, but now you're getting tiresome."

name: Suit Up
text: With a reckless leap into the pilot's seat, Hirori went from smallest kid on the block to biggest hero in the city.

name: Stonybrook Schoolmaster
text: Merrow schools rarely form by design. They come together naturally as eager learners surround the wisest teachers.

name: Flame Jab
text:
"Fire's out. Should be safe now."
—Gnarltrunk

name: Unlikely Aid
text:
"No one will ever ride me again, Gideon. Expect no further favors."
—Rakdos

name: Ghost Tactician
text: Its ethereal hand confers a lifetime of experience with combat and steel.

name: Futurist Operative
text: "The Imperials can't arrest you for illegal tech if you never even existed."

name: Goblin Piker
text: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

name: Decisions, Decisions
text: To B, or not to B.

name: Armageddon
text:
"'O miserable of happy! Is this the end
Of this new glorious world... ?'"
—John Milton, *Paradise Lost*

name: Hunted Dragon
text: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

name: Mind Shatter
text: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

name: Look Skyward and Despair
text: "Today I take the reins of destiny itself. Today the Draconic Apocalypse is upon you."

name: Assassin's Ink
text: A Reckoner always has another trick up their sleeve—or as their sleeve.

name: Evolving Wilds
text:
"Our world is vast, but Thraben is its heart. The cathedral must stand even if the hinterlands are lost."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Hoar Shade
text:
"The creature we fought in the western waste was doubly dangerous: mortally wounded, it rebounded and attacked again."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Victimize
text: The priest cast Xantcha to the ground. "It is defective. We must scrap it."

name: Kurkesh, Onakke Ancient
text: The Onakke were masters of dark arts and artifice. Their creations continue to spread foul magic, paving the way for their return.

name: Ember Hauler
text: Flurk's crude goblin language didn't differentiate between "I *bring* the flame" and "I *am* the flame."

name: Windcaller Aven
text: Every cry lifts her allies toward the thunder.

name: Cunning Evasion
text:
"Begin with your escape and work backward."
—*Way of Secrets*

name: Blindblast
text:
"Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."
—Jaya Ballard

name: Talisman of Dominance
text:
"My Master is the Beginning and he is the End. He is the Master of Mortals, and the core of our Dead Hearts."
—*The Saga of Khorne*

name: Invasion of Kamigawa // Rooftop Saboteurs
text: The pace of Kamigawa's development meant that Jin-Gitaxias's intel was already outdated when the invaders arrived.

name: Shrieking Drake
text:
"Kaervek believes the drakes' cries herald his victory; in truth, they mourn aloud for his impending demise."
—Teferi

name: Brinebarrow Intruder
text: Locked in the ice of Karfell, the treasures of ancient nobles await in ruins guarded by the dead.

name: Land Leeches
text: "The standard cure for leeches requires the application of burning embers. Alternative methods must be devised should an ember of sufficient size prove more harmful than the leech." —Vervamon the Elder

name: Chosen of Markov // Markov's Servant
text: "I have been found worthy by this great house . . ."

name: Call the Scions
text: Ulamog's progeny swarm the land, draining Zendikar's mana to feed the titan's insatiable hunger.

name: Hand of Honor
text: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that brings it to life."

name: Hydroid Krasis
text: Havoc is a small price to pay for data.

name: Multani's Harmony
text: "Welcome to paradise."

name: Drowner of Secrets
text: Merrows consider themselves the keepers of Lorwyn's past—and consider it their duty to edit when necessary.

name: Mindwhip Sliver
text:
"They share more than their thoughts. We must shatter their link quickly!"
—Hanna, to Orim

name: Field Marshal
text: He is the only one who sees the patterns in the overlapping maps and conflicting reports.

name: Prosperity
text:
"True riches are found in the mazes of the mind."
—Tamiyo, the Moon Sage

name: Thermopod
text: Slicking the ice with its heated underside, the thermopod skates at great speed to overtake its prey.

name: Finale of Glory
text: The sky boiled over the citadel, dire and dark. Then the angels brought the dawn.

name: Relic Crush
text: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

name: Shield of the Ages
text:
"This shield is a true rarity: an artifact whose purpose is obvious."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Pilgrim of Virtue
text: "A life is measured by the lives it saves."

name: Expanded Anatomy
text: "Changing the equation from incremental to exponential was a stroke of genius on my part."

name: Snapping Drake
text: The irritable drakes are solitary nesters. Even brooding females barely contain the urge to attack their own young.

name: Teferi's Time Twist
text: "The safest place for you is not now."

name: Reverse the Sands
text: Worse than the years of aging was the burden of memory. The young monk lost his youth and gained a vicarious lifetime of hardship and woe.

name: Servo Exhibition
text:
"The judges really put them through their paces, but they prevailed. I think they even impressed Head Judge Tezzeret."
—Ritika, artificer

name: Elderfang Disciple
text: "One day, the great serpent will rejoin us on Skemfar, and those who've wronged us will taste of our venom."

name: Nearby Planet
text:
"Here's a nice place we haven't hit yet."
—Captain Rex Nebula

name: Ajani's Mantra
text:
"He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence."
—Zaliki of Naya

name: Manic Vandal
text: It's fun. He doesn't need another reason.

name: Necropolis Regent
text: "Jarad fancies himself king of the undercity, but he's merely king of rot."

name: Diviner Spirit
text: Sentience is its natural habitat.

name: Hill Giant
text: Fortunately, hill giants have large blind spots in which a human can easily hide. Unfortunately, these blind spots are beneath the bottoms of their feet.

name: Dire Tactics
text:
"I will preserve human life at all costs. I will stand alone against behemoths before I let them touch my city. I will hold the wall."
—Oath of the Coppercoats

name: Honed Khopesh
text: Blades and bravery go hand in hand.

name: Thermo-Alchemist
text: "Bow before the power of *science*!"

name: Open the Vaults
text: When the vaults are empty, everyone is rich.

name: Soaring Drake
text: The already spectacular views from the towers of the College at Lat-Nam are sometimes enhanced by glimpses of drakes diving into the ocean to devour small sharks.

name: Ow
text: Have you ever noticed how some flavor text has no relevance whatsoever to the card it's on?

name: Atraxa's Fall
text:
"Fallen angels should stay fallen."
—Henzie "Toolbox" Torre

name: Run Afoul
text:
"What did you catch today, my pet? Ah, it looks like a bit of vampire stuck between your teeth."
—Atla Palani, nest tender

name: Time Ebb
text: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

name: Firestorm
text:
"Glok loved storms! He'd sit an' watch an' laugh through the whole thing. I miss him."
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Wily Bandar
text: Part feline, part primate, all trouble.

name: Monk Idealist
text: "Belief is the strongest mortar."

name: Biorhythm
text:
"I have seen life's purpose, and now it is my own."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

name: Witch Hunt
text: The accusations spread like hungry flames.

name: Backlash
text: Darigaaz decided his foe would be more useful as a weapon.

name: Pale Moon
text: Denizens of Rath had never seen the moon before. It was a symbol of change, not constancy.

name: Outland Liberator // Frenzied Trapbreaker
text: "Just hold still. I'll help you."

name: Dangerous Wager
text:
"C'mon friend, take a turn tossing the knucklebones. What've you got to lose?"
—Tobias, trader of Erdwal

name: Plasmancer
text: Masters of dimensional dissonance, singularity manipulation, and countless other technologies, plasmancers are terrifying to behold.

name: Thorn of Amethyst
text:
"The geode must be mined in moonlight and broken open by a silver hammer."
—*Tome of Obstructions*

name: Festergloom
text: The death of a scout can be as informative as a safe return.

name: Quirion Ranger
text:
"I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately."
—Henry David Thoreau, *Walden*

name: Anafenza, Kin-Tree Spirit
text: The Machine Legion coveted her strength, but a spirit of sand, sun, and memory could never be *compleated*.

name: Fyndhorn Elves
text:
"Living side by side with the Elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess."
—Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Assembled Alphas
text: There is always a toll to pay for passage.

name: Crossbow Infantry
text: Twang. You're dead.

name: Kindslaver
text: "Just relax—I brought in a substitute."

name: Sacred Foundry
text:
"You will not be trained here. You will be forged."
—Commander Yaszen

name: Alpha Status
text: The best leaders are made by their followers.

name: Dovin's Veto
text: "It must be infuriating, to pour so much rage into your assault and see it wasted. Perhaps you'll learn something from this."

name: Phantom Monster
text:
"While, like a ghastly rapid river, Through the pale door, A hideous throng rush out forever, And laugh—but smile no more."
—Edgar Allan Poe, "The Haunted Palace"

name: Shard Volley
text: "Let the mountain's teeth pierce our oppressors."

name: Snow Devil
text:
"Give me wings to fly and speed to strike. In return, the glory I earn shall be yours."
—Steinar Icefist, Balduvian Shaman

name: Granite Shard
text: It's a piece of a world the goblins have never seen but would dearly like to blow up.

name: Nyxborn Shieldmate
text: In Meletis, the walls have ears. In Akros, they have blades.

name: Bulette
text: Capable of moving swiftly through even tightly-packed earth and leaping surprising distances above ground, bulettes are difficult to escape once they've caught scent of prey.

name: Rathi Trapper
text: Tangling vines, fetid murk, paralyzing poisons, and crawling dead. The swamp is nature's trap waiting to be exploited by unnatural minds.

name: Squad Captain
text: The strength of the one is the strength of the many.

name: Zombie Assassin
text:
"Zombies don't kill. They recruit."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Tidal Wave
text: When mountains ride the sea, waves live upon the fields.

name: Foundry Street Denizen
text: After the Foundry Street riot, Arrester Hulbein tried to ban bludgeons. Which, inevitably, resulted in another riot.

name: Stormfront Pegasus
text: Its hooves touch the earth only when a hero must rise.

name: Knight of Dawn
text:
Flash like daybreak to the fray.
—Motto of the Knights of Dawn

name: Impostor of the Sixth Pride
text: The tribe was as strong as his longing, their territory as vast as his isolation. The changeling knew he had found a home, and a form.

name: Identity Crisis
text:
"To join our ranks, one must be pure. To be pure, one must be blessed by etherium. To be blessed, one must forget oneself."
—Ethersworn prayer

name: Brainstorm
text:
"In all my years of research, I have yet to accurately quantify that baffling mental process known as 'inspiration.'"
—Elmora, mage-analyst

name: Eldrazi Devastator
text:
"No matter how big your champion, theirs is bigger. No matter how great your numbers, theirs are greater. No matter how voracious your appetite, they are hungrier. That is why the Eldrazi will win."
—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog

name: Hapless Researcher
text: Scholars possess such lofty knowledge that it shouldn't be surprising when they fall.

name: Basic Conjuration
text: "I made that! It's mine! Did you see that?"

name: Excavation
text:
"There are secrets out there begging to be rediscovered. We just need to look in the right places."
—Teferi, planeswalker

name: Prism Ring
text: Wear it on your dominant hand and it will follow your lead.

name: Suntail Hawk
text:
"Our forebears once flew like this—carefree, needing nothing but a warm nest and a full belly. Our intellect may be more burden than blessing."
—Commander Eesha

name: Dauntless Cathar
text: "The harder they try to extinguish my faith, the brighter it burns in the darkness."

name: Nulltread Gargantuan
text: It crushes all underfoot, yet leaves no trace of its passage—no trampled debris, no flattened souls, not even a hoofprint.

name: Jhessian Lookout
text: She stands ready, always watchful, knowing that weeks of peace and serenity can be overturned by a single distant sail.

name: Furnace Spirit
text: If it can survive the Furnace, you don't want it near you.

name: Essence Warden
text:
"The more our numbers grow, the more I gain hope that Volrath and his cursed stronghold will one day fall."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Nimble Mongoose
text: Faster than a cobra's bite.

name: Watchwolf
text: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

name: Vastwood Animist
text: He calls on the forests for counsel and summons the earth to his cause.

name: Tempered Veteran
text: "I've been carrying a sword since before you were born. I wouldn't give up my oath for all the peace and comfort in the world."

name: Temporal Adept
text:
"If yesterday was two days ago tomorrow, will the day after tomorrow be today or yesterday?"
—Temporal Manipulation 101 final exam, Tolarian Academy

name: Haze of Pollen
text: Few can overcome an assault of such aggressive serenity.

name: Verdant Rebirth
text: The dryads of the forest have no stake in Ixalan's conflict, but they hate to see any living being suffer.

name: Witness of Tomorrows
text: "As the future slips its way into the present, it ceases to be my concern."

name: Heartstone
text:
"Finding a true heartstone is even harder than finding a true heart."
—Hanna

name: Somberwald Dryad
text: The Somberwald is her domain, and she has yet to hear an acceptable excuse for trespassing.

name: Crook of Condemnation
text: The God-Pharaoh's angels stripped former initiates of their cartouches and the fortifying magic they provided.

name: Kami's Flare
text: "The flames are a gift from my companion. They won't hurt me. You, on the other hand..."

name: Dragon Hatchling
text:
"Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth."
—Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

name: Requiem Angel
text: When angels despair, what hope can remain for mortals?

name: Savage Gorger
text: "I have no patience for sipping blood from crystal goblets. I want to bite and tear."

name: Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper
text: Karplusan legend told of an orc so cruel that he burned his own followers in rage—yet so revered that they rose from their pyres to serve him.

name: Nadier's Nightblade
text: Checking around every corner doesn't help if you forget to look up.

name: Counterlash
text: "Pathetic. Let me show you how it's done."

name: Tribute to the Wild
text:
"You may enter, but leave those lifeless things of your world behind."
—Modruni, maro-sorcerer

name: Spore Swarm
text: As the irrepressible power of a dormant Multani courses through Yavimaya, the forest passes judgment on travelers and natives alike. Only the fungus prospers.

name: Gilded Lotus
text: The mage entered into a contract with the golden flower. She could wield its considerable power, but all would be lost should a single petal fall.

name: Mycosynth Wellspring
text: The oil created the mycosynth. The mycosynth created New Phyrexia.

name: Seizures
text:
"Sheathe your sword, warrior, lest ye fall on it when stricken."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Silhana Wayfinder
text: "Stay close! It's just a little farther."

name: Witch's Clinic
text: Students from other colleges are invited to visit Witherbloom's medical facilities. Not many do.

name: Fire Elemental
text: You are drawn to your death as a moth to the flame.

name: Gorger Wurm
text: In war-torn Alara, sometimes a wurm's gullet is the safest place to be.

name: Hagi Mob
text: "Graarg!"

name: Quirion Druid
text:
"The land has been gracious enough to let you tread upon her for years. That privilege is about to end."
—Liefellen, Quirion exarch

name: Daemogoth Woe-Eater
text: "Your pain for my wisdom. You'll get no better deal."

name: Rainbow Vale
text: In the feudal days of Icatia, finding the Rainbow Vale was often the goal of Knights' quests.

name: Trained Orgg
text: All orggs know how to kill; training teaches them *what* to kill.

name: Howling Mine
text:
"The Sardian dwarves have let superstition override common sense. There's plenty of ore left in the mountain, and we mustn't let it go to waste."
—Last dispatch of Bolgon, Argivian surveyor

name: Blighted Steppe
text:
"When a limb is gangrenous, you cut it off. This is no different."
—Greenweaver Mina

name: Iroas's Champion
text: Accustomed to battling before an audience in the arena, Iroas's champions know how to put on a good show.

name: Pride Guardian
text: "Any hotheaded cub can raise a sword in anger."

name: Veteran Adventurer
text: "How can I be of assistance?"

name: Etherium Spinner
text: "Thopters from a foundry always lack that personal touch."

name: Horned Sliver
text: A bristling wave of slivers broke against the Weatherlight's timbers.

name: Endless Atlas
text: Guarded by cartographers, disdained by warlords, coveted by adventurers.

name: Nath of the Gilt-Leaf
text: A savage hunter with a prince's bearing.

name: Sequence Engine
text:
"Reality, when broken down, is just math."
—Deekah, professor of fractal theory

name: Excommunicate
text:
"Our law prohibits capital punishment. We believe even the gravest offenders have the chance to redeem themselves."
—Torian Sha, soul warden

name: Redeem
text:
"Let me redeem my brothers both from death."
—William Shakespeare, *Titus Andronicus*

name: Heir of Falkenrath // Heir to the Night
text: Among vampires, there has long been the belief that the urge to feed must be balanced by the poise of nobility.

name: Pillar of Flame
text: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

name: Boggart Arsonists
text: The Aurora transformed Nibb and Gyik from mischief-makers into feral marauders. They still don't know much about tool safety.

name: Jace's Ingenuity
text: "Brute force can sometimes kick down a locked door, but knowledge is a skeleton key."

name: Holdout Settlement
text: Even in areas of profound devastation, the hedrons remained intact.

name: Compleat Devotion
text: "Elspeth, my friend, the Multiverse has answered my prayers to bring you here so that I may gather you into my pride and forever protect you."

name: Infernal Grasp
text: Ancient evils dwell within the burning chasm called the Ashmouth, ever ready to devour those foolish enough to travel alone.

name: Slight Malfunction
text:
"Attention, valued patrons. The Tilt-o-Squirrel is now closed."
—Astrotorium public address system

name: Tine Shrike
text: A new bird of prey—one that hunts sentience.

name: Renegade Warlord
text:
"His tongue must be honey, the way he gathers ants to fight with him."
—Volrath

name: Prosperous Pirates
text: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.

name: Distorting Wake
text: Gerrard savored a grim smile as the Phyrexian portals disappeared behind the *Weatherlight*.

name: High-Rise Sawjack
text: Slicing girders, rescuing trapped workers, killing gigantic rust flies—one tool does it all!

name: Magmatic Force
