name: Coastal Tower
text: The Capashen built the highest towers in Benalia to afford themselves the best view.

name: A-Public Enemy
text: Every Halo smuggler walks a razor's edge between untold riches and sudden disaster.

name: You Cannot Pass!
text: It raised the whip, and the thongs whined and cracked. Fire came from its nostrils. But Gandalf stood firm.

name: Arachnoform
text: Deep within the endless webs of cloning silk, the weaver awaits.

name: Reflections of Littjara
text: The masks float downstream toward the Mirrorlake, where faces arise to wear them.

name: Ensnare
text: Rootwater has become as dangerous to its denizens as to its enemies.

name: Gravetiller Wurm
text: As the creatures of the night closed in on humanity, Innistrad's primeval forces stirred, as though waking to watch the slaughter.

name: Murmurs from Beyond
text: Like pools of fog that hid treacherous rocks from sailors' eyes, so too were the hands of the kami.

name: Dreadmalkin
text: The feline Eternal felt Liliana's command, looked at her disdainfully, flicked its paw, and scampered away across the rooftops.

name: Crucible of Worlds
text:
"From dust and light She coaxed forth an uncorrupted world. By Her grace we dwell here, free from suffering."
—*Song of All*, canto 11

name: Cosmos Elixir
text: The Skoti owe their immortality to the elixir, and the manner of its creation is their most closely guarded secret.

name: Warpath
text: Cho-Manno had never seen Mercadia City's forces fight so well. The magistrate must have hired a new hero.

name: Greenwood Sentinel
text: Within a mile of the woodland, you will feel her eyes upon you. Within its borders, you will feel her blade.

name: Brigid, Hero of Kinsbaile
text: Thanks to one champion archer, the true borders of Kinsbaile extend an arrow's flight beyond the buildings.

name: Misthollow Griffin
text: For some creatures, existing is only a whim.

name: Delver's Torch
text: "Not all of us have darkvision, okay?"

name: Vestige of Emrakul
text: Emrakul has not been seen in months. Though her brood's numbers have dwindled in her absence, each drone is still a deadly threat.

name: Go Blank
text: The only feeling worse than not knowing the answer is the certainty that you once did.

name: Chamber of Manipulation
text: Politics is just a subtle form of mind control—and cephalids are master politicians.

name: Hindering Light
text: Centuries of careful practice have elevated the casting of protective spells to an art form. What little offensive magic remains on Bant stands little chance of breaching them.

name: Mad Auntie
text: One part cunning, one part wise, and many, many parts demented.

name: Realm Razer
text: The behemoth roared, and the world was blasted free of empires and tyrants.

name: Goblin Diplomats
text: When you need to convey that special kind of message.

name: Disruption Aura
text: Vedalken weapons sold to outsiders are as dependable as the vedalken themselves.

name: Arbor Elf
text: "The forest will surround you with its life if you are still and calm."

name: Coalborn Entity
text: The blacksmith forgot to feed the forge, so the forge fed itself.

name: Exterminatus
text:
"Some may question your right to destroy ten billion people. Those who understand know that you have no right to let them live."
—Exterminatus Extremis

name: Vedalken Outlander
text: The Seekers of Carmot searched across the unknown lands for the mystical red stone that could reforge Esper in ethereal perfection.

name: Celestial Ancient
text:
"We thought the clouds had moved from the night sky. Then the night sky moved, and the horizon grew wings."
—Josuri

name: Faerie Macabre
text: The line between dream and death is gauzy and fragile. She leads those too near it from one side to the other.

name: Abiding Grace
text:
"Into the smothering dark, Serra spoke a single word: 'Hope.'"
—*Song of All*, canto 2

name: Ebony Owl Netsuke
text:
"Owls filled the skies during the Kami War, harbingers of darker times to come."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Defiling Tears
text: Serra's living warriors looked on in horror. "Where is our Lady now?" they cried.

name: Voldaren Stinger
text: A duel to first blood means something very different when a vampire is involved.

name: Opal Lake Gatekeepers
text: Sentries guard Ravnica's landmarks and outlying districts, unaware of these places' import to the maze.

name: Hurkyl's Recall
text: This spell, like many attributed to Drafna, was actually the work of his wife and former student, Hurkyl.

name: Minion of Tevesh Szat
text:
"A minion given over to Tevesh Szat is a stronger minion gained."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Folk Medicine
text: Sometimes the healers need healing.

name: Papercraft Decoy
text:
"And what, precisely, was so important that you left the entrance unguarded?"
—Fumika, Imperial enforcer

name: Arnjlot's Ascent
text:
"The dreams of a child fulfilled:
the wind on my brow,
the air 'neath my feet."
—Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

name: Deathsprout
text:
"They say nothing lasts forever. I say everything lasts forever, just not in the form you may be accustomed to."
—Vraska

name: Alexi, Zephyr Mage
text: The Keldons didn't know her name, but they still cursed her in battle.

name: Stone Rain
text: I cast a thousand tiny suns— Beware my many dawns.

name: Dragon Whelp
text: Dragon whelps face few threats besides their own enthusiasm.

name: Of One Mind
text:
"The *eludha* is total communication, total understanding. It makes regular human speech feel like garbled grunting."
—Winota, heartbonder

name: Ogre Berserker
text: The machine does the growling, so the ogre's free to smile.

name: Voldaren Epicure
text: "If you're not refining your tastes, what's the point of living forever?"

name: Viashino Sandstalker
text:
"Some believe Sandstalkers to be illusions; those with scars know better."
—*Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert*

name: Failed Inspection
text: The most dangerous thing an artificer can do is believe an invention is perfect.

name: Zenith Seeker
text: Only from the sky can one fully understand the horrors of the wastes and the wonder of the Hekma's protection.

name: Cosmic Larva
text: For millennia they wandered from plane to plane, devouring all metal. Finally, their wanderings are over.

name: Molder Slug
text: Fortunately for it, Mirrodin is a plane without salt.

name: Poison-Tip Archer
text: "One more step and you're mine."

name: Veteran's Sidearm
text: "I've broken three swords, eighteen lances, and countless shields, but this little blade has survived every battle, just like I have."

name: Piracy
text: The sea gives, and the sea takes. Some just help with the taking.

name: Resistance Skywarden
text: When the Vulshok taught him the word for "home," he knew it was what he had been fighting for.

name: Lathiel, the Bounteous Dawn
text: Weeping, the hunter cast aside her bow, struck by the majesty of the creature before her.

name: Treachery
text:
"The academy educates; I employ. It's a perfect arrangement."
—Gatha, Tolarian renegade

name: Lava Spike
text: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

name: Reshape the Earth
text:
"The land is not dead, merely dormant. It will awaken if you know how to ask."
—Gilanra, Caller of Wirewood

name: Nausea
text: Any mogg will tell you there's nothing more nauseating than the smell of cute.

name: Nightveil Sprite
text:
"We're on the fortieth floor, with one window, no balcony. No one could possibly get in."
—Minosz, Orzhov chief of security

name: Millstone
text: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

name: Aura Fracture
text: Jamuraa's rhystic mages treat magic as their garden, uprooting unwanted spells as bothersome weeds.

name: Taste of Blood
text:
"How blessed are some people, whose lives have no fears, no dreads, to whom sleep is a blessing that comes nightly, and brings nothing but sweet dreams."
—Bram Stoker, *Dracula*

name: Alms Beast
text: Alms-coins are only redeemable at Orzhov businesses.

name: Sudden Impact
text:
"Some say it's better to think before you act. While those people are considering all the options, that's usually when I kill them."
—Dravus, lava mage

name: Kresh the Bloodbraided
text: Each of his twenty-two braids is bound with bone and leather from a foe.

name: Jukai Preserver
text: "The kami grant you this boon, not I."

name: Gor Muldrak, Amphinologist
text: "The day of reckoning is coming. Knowledge of the amphin may be our only refuge."

name: Ketria Crystal
text: The dark of night never truly falls on Ketria, where abundant crystals bathe the land in their glow.

name: Mountain Titan
text:
"The Titans claimed to draw strength from the rocks, but I suspect them of some darker allegiance."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Fervent Strike
text:
"The flame paints a bright wheel on the sky, then shifts into a stabbing spark. The enemy falls; the smoke of victory rises."
—"Legends of the Firedancer"

name: Femeref Archers
text:
"They say a Zhalfirin archer can split the eye of a griffin. Nonsense, of course; they have no faith to guide their darts."
—Nuru, Femeref archer

name: Pit Imp
text: The moans of the Death Pits were underscored by the chattering of imps, for whom the ship was cause for much discussion.

name: Faeburrow Elder
text: Its wide-reaching roots draw more than water.

name: Supreme Verdict
text: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.

name: Wind Sail
text: It pays to be at home both on the sea and in the sky.

name: Shaile, Dean of Radiance // Embrose, Dean of Shadow
text: "You are so much stronger than you know."

name: Caregiver
text: "The guilds each believe its way is right, but their ways only bring blood to Ravnica's streets and tears to Ravnica's families."

name: Steel Leaf Champion
text: One eye open to see the truth of the world. One eye covered to gaze at the goddess within.

name: Firefly
text:
"If they don't pinch, they burn. Can't ya eat any of da bugs here?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Despise
text:
"You have returned from fire, traitor. This time I will see you leave as ashes."
—Zurgo, to Sarkhan Vol

name: Castle Ardenvale
text: Without Ardenvale's loyalty, the realm would greedily devour itself.

name: Fire Prophecy
text:
"Water and bone tell many tales, but fire is fickle. It would rather consume than reveal."
—Rielle, the Everwise

name: Drag to the Bottom
text: Windgrace's gladehunters hibernate in the quagmires of Urborg until the scent of Phyrexian technology awakens their hunger.

name: Staff of the Wild Magus
text: A symbol of ferocity in oppressive times.

name: Bamboozling Beeble
text: Myra bought beetles because they were cheaper than rubber ducks. Now the infestation is her largest expense.

name: Maestros Theater
text: Only extraordinary performers are invited to grace the grandest stage in New Capenna.

name: Lazotep Behemoth
text:
"I know I should be more concerned. But a big, blue zombie-potamus from beyond the stars? This is what they're invading us with?"
—Mileva, Boros legionnaire

name: Docent of Perfection // Final Iteration
text: The time had come for him to share his findings.

name: Compulsive Research
text: "Four parts molten bronze, yes ... one part frozen mercury, yes, yes ... but then what?"

name: Rousing Read
text: Great literature can transport the reader.

name: Pacifism
text:
"If only they'd all act this docile. I could do something relaxing for a living. I've always wanted to bake biscuits."
—Ethuk, Coppercoat mage

name: Midvast Protector
text: "I cultivated my faith in Avacyn despite meager returns. Now my faith is repaid."

name: Molten Rain
text: When the molten rains fall, entire landscapes melt and flow away in rivulets of fire.

name: Righteous Blow
text:
"Monsters will no longer find safety under the mists of Morkrut!"
—Bruna, Light of Alabaster

name: Ravenous Intruder
text:
"I've made some fine acquisitions of late, so I'm planning to make commensurate improvements to my security systems. I have a consultant coming tomorrow."
—Kurna Majan, Luminary League

name: Haunted Fengraf
text: A ghoulcaller's playground.

name: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
text: "My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Though I must admit I could get used to this."

name: Cinder Giant
text:
"The giant wept tears of embers for the deaths of his allies."
—Azeworai, "The Lonely Giant"

name: Devoted Retainer
text: Deep within Eiganjo Castle lay the Palace of Infinite Halls, a seemingly endless network of corridors once guarded by a seemingly endless legion of samurai.

name: Deadly Derision
text: Daretti looked down disdainfully. "You call yourself machines? Where's the elegance? Nothing but ugly piles of scrap."

name: Bazaar of Baghdad
text: 2022 Asia Vintage Championship

name: Blitz Automaton
text: While Urza's machines favored defense, Mishra built his to end the war quickly.

name: Stone Rain
text:
"The kami struck with gouts of fire, showers of rock, and the combined rage of the spirit world. Only Eiganjo Castle remained standing, glistening untouched in the sun."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Dwarven Blastminer
text: "Life is too short for something like a hunk of rock to get in my way."

name: Nature's Panoply
text: Nature protects its own.

name: Divergent Growth
text: Nature has forgotten its own rules.

name: Frostwind Invoker
text:
"We thought Zendikar's rage was kindled by its explorers and plunderers. But the world had sensed the stirrings of the Eldrazi."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Grenzo's Cutthroat
text: "Their guards are soft, ready to welcome a sharp dagger."

name: Talruum Champion
text: In the Talruum language, there is no word for "surprised."

name: Purify
text:
"Our Mother! The sky was Her hair; the sun, Her face. She danced on the grass and in the hills."
—*Song of All*, canto 23

name: Hitchclaw Recluse
text: Not all spiders need webs to catch their prey.

name: Gravelgill Axeshark
text:
"Their sharp scales would make good armor, if they'd just stay dead."
—Taeryn, cinder armorkeep

name: Bond Beetle
text:
A beetle on your shoulder
—Elvish expression meaning "a blessing of luck"

name: Ashes to Ashes
text: "All rivers eventually run to the sea. My job is to sort out who goes first." —Maeveen O'Donagh, Memoirs of a Soldier

name: Urborg Uprising
text: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

name: Indrik Stomphowler
text:
"An indrik's howl has destructive power much subtler than that of its crushing foot. The sound is mundane, but inaudible vibrations scatter and sunder magical contrivances."
—Simic research notes

name: Reliquary Tower
text: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

name: Greenweaver Druid
text: The other tribes call them fanatics, but none deny that the Mul Daya elves have an iron-strong bond to some force greater than themselves.

name: Magistrate's Veto
text: The magistrate had been the goblins' puppet for so long that he made the right decisions with little prompting.

name: Whirling Strike
text:
"I will trust desert steel in Fallaji hands over a soulless machine any day."
—Hajar, Mishra's bodyguard

name: Psychic Spear
text:
"The wizards of Takenuma Swamp faced the horrors of humanity every day. It's no wonder they fared so well against the kami."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Artifact Mutation
text:
"There's nothing technology can build that nature can't eventually reclaim."
—Vivien Reid

name: Divination
text:
"Half of your studies will be learning the laws of magic. The other half will be bending them."
—Naru Meha, master wizard

name: Hell Swarm
text: The brightness of day turned in an instant to dusk as the swarm descended upon the battlefield.

name: Sylvan Bounty
text: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

name: Plains
text: You arrive at Baldur's Gate with instructions to head straight to the heart of the rumor mill: the bakery.

name: Caves of Koilos
text: After years of silence, the caves once again echo with the grisly sounds of Phyrexians preparing for war.

name: Crosis's Attendant
text: "Crosis is the eye of the ur-dragon, piercing illusion and darkness."

name: Ravenous Baloth
text:
"All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive."
—Elvish refugee

name: Devoted Caretaker
text: Her eyes blaze with the strength of twenty shields. Every glance is a salvation.

name: Luminous Angel
text: "The spread of evil's destruction shall always be matched by the rise of the noble fallen."

name: Gavony Unhallowed
text:
"We entered the church in search of solace, but it became clear we wouldn't find it there."
—Grete, Order of Saint Traft

name: Cryptwailing
text:
"Piece the tragic notes together and is it not a melody?"
—Teysa

name: Take Up Arms
text:
"Many scales make the skin of a dragon."
—Abzan wisdom

name: Crimson Honor Guard
text: The finest soldiers aren't worth a whit without a set of hands to lead them and a set of eyes to guide them.

name: Xerex Strobe-Knight
text: Phyrexia broke the laws of reality to invade the planes. On Xerex, reality merely bent around the invaders.

name: Ivorytusk Fortress
text: Abzan soldiers march to war confident that their Houses march with them.

name: Even the Odds
text:
"They who fall singing the battle hymn of Benalia go not unavenged."
—Adom Capashen, Benalish commander

name: Fold into Aether
text: Æther portals drift across Mirrodin's surface, dragging creatures across time and space.

name: Fissure
text: "Must not all things at the last be swallowed up in death?" —Plato

name: Champion Lancer
text: The flash of his lance projects the pure radiance of his honor.

name: Lifeblood
text:
"Foolish wizard! As you tap the power of your lofty keep, so grows my strength."
—Malvern Xelionos, *Letters*

name: Righteous Charge
text: Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul.

name: Celestial Messenger
text:
"It soars on the winds of dreams."
—Mu Yanling

name: Terra Eternal
text:
"If this world could make a wish, it would be to survive the parasites who loot its treasures and threaten its life force."
—Saidah, Joraga hunter

name: Primal Visitation
text: Gruul shamans believe all sentient beings have the soul of savagery inside them, an animal form clawing to escape.

name: Natural Order
text: ...but the price of Mangara's freedom was Asmira's life.

name: Whetstone
text:
To hone swords and dull minds.
—Whetstone inscription

name: Swarm of Bloodflies
text: In the Gudul delta, bloodfly bites are indistinguishable from spear wounds.

name: Mind Sludge
text:
"Guard your thoughts. You never know who might wish to take them from you."
—Kalitas, Bloodchief of Ghet

name: Regna's Sanction
text:
"Show them the light, my love."
—Krav, the Unredeemed

name: Vampire Hexmage
text: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.

name: Raffine's Tower
text: The Obscura's Cloud Spire dominates the skyline, its eye a beacon of progress that sees all.

name: Sly Spy
text: The Agents of S.N.E.A.K.—Subpar, Notoriously Evil Agent Killers.

name: Mighty Leap
text: "I feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh in the Second Sun, and I rise upon its rays."

name: Barrin, Tolarian Archmage
text: "There is no age at which you stop learning."

name: Wild Swing
text: Though the shaman rarely got what she wanted, she was never disappointed in the result.

name: Uphill Battle
text: Cho-Manno knew he had no choice but to ally with Gerrard. If that's what it took to free his people, he'd pay the price.

name: Windborn Muse
text:
"Her voice is justice, clear and relentless."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

name: Gild
text: Merchants of the Underworld trade in coins of clay. Gold serves another purpose.

name: Riptide Mangler
text: It wants you to be its chum.

name: Hull Breach
text: "Crovax knows we're coming now," said a grinning Sisay. "I just sent the *Predator* crashing into his stronghold."

name: Underworld Hermit
text: Mood: He's the Pied Piper of squirrels.

name: Damnation
text: Their bodies rotted, their bones splintered, and their souls frayed to tatters. Only then were they granted the mercy of death.

name: Unholy Strength
text: Such power grows the body as it shrinks the soul.

name: Aether Snap
text:
"May you wake to find you were only ever a dream."
—Mephidross curse

name: Cathartic Pyre
text: "Leave behind the sorrow of this body. Be blessed, being of light."

name: Thud
text:
"Give 'em a push."
—Mogwin, goblin delinquent

name: Zagoth Triome
text: Hunters in the primeval wetlands become fluent in reading the ripples to tell when to pursue and when to flee.

name: Anowon, the Ruin Sage
text: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."

name: Llanowar Knight
text: Her armor and steed were borrowed, but her courage was hers alone.

name: The Prismatic Piper
text: It is everything and nothing.

name: Dire Fleet Hoarder
text: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.

name: Ranger's Guile
text:
"You don't survive in the wild by standing in plain sight."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Adarkar Wastes
text: Left barren by the Brothers' War, it stands as a stark reminder of Dominaria's likely fate should the Coalition fail.

name: Persecute
text:
"My finest warrior was lost to the Phyrexians. I pray that Lady Selenia died honorably."
—Radiant, archangel

name: Fight to the Death
text: When a battlefield falls silent, it's rarely due to a cease-fire.

name: Eyeblight's Ending
text:
"Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one."
—Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana

name: Wash Away
text:
"May the ocean take it"
—Nephalia expression meaning
"good riddance"

name: Stupor
text: There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness. -Suq'Ata saying

name: Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose
text: "Through the blood of the wicked, we shall be redeemed. Let us pray."

name: Secret Base
text: The Order of the Widget doesn't believe in traveling light.

name: Echo Circlet
text: After the vanishing of the elder generations, the Anvil Tribe developed creative solutions to their personnel shortages.

name: Bereavement
text:
"Grief is as useless as love."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

name: Word of Binding
text:
"That was the worst experience of my days: standing there helpless as they killed my whole troop."
—Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*

name: Oxidize
text:
"Ashes to ashes, rust to rust."
—Viridian shaman

name: Lumberknot
text: Animated by geists fused in its oak, it hungers for more life to add to its core.

name: Hanna
text: Educated in Argive and highly knowledgeable in the field of artifacts, this expert navigator of the *Weatherlight* believes that scholarship does not necessarily lead to understanding. Her diligence in pursuing both is her greatest asset.

name: Terror of Mount Velus
text: The forge of Purphoros burns in the heart of Mount Velus, attracting dragons with its blistering heat.

name: Hunter's Insight
text:
"The predator knows the true way of the world. Life is conflict. Only the strong survive."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Geyser Glider
text:
"Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air."
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

name: Wall of Granite
text: The wisest man builds his house *behind* the rock.

name: Kraken's Eye
text: Bright as a mirror, dark as the sea.

name: Cephalid Aristocrat
text: It's easy to tell the difference between the devious cephalids and the trustworthy ones. The trustworthy ones are dead.

name: Insight
text:
"We can fight with you or against you. After my day, I'd prefer the former."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Elfhame Wurm
text: The wurms consume everything in their path, so the elves make sure that their path goes through as many Phyrexians as possible.

name: Sprouting Phytohydra
text: A hydra tender's problem isn't having enough defenses but enough pots.

name: Spinny Ride
text: There's no such thing as upside down in space. Put another way, there are infinite upside downs in space.

name: Splitting the Powerstone
text: As the glowing stone broke apart, so too did the last shred of the brothers' bond.

name: Forging the Anchor
text: The metal turned and blossomed with Saheeli's will, each filigreed twist bringing the temporal anchor closer to completion.

name: Elas il-Kor, Sadistic Pilgrim
text: "All will bow to the Whispering One."

name: Stalking Drone
text: As the Eldrazi adapted to the jungles of Zendikar, some took on the tactics of more familiar predators.

name: Tundra Kavu
text: A cross between a jaguar and an armadillo.

name: Cursed Rack
text: Ashnod invented several torture techniques that could make victims even miles away beg for mercy as if the End had come.

name: Coastal Drake
text: When the kavu emerged from their ancient nests, food chains long dormant became vibrant again.

name: Darksteel Plate
text:
"If there can be no victory, then I will fight forever."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Arcbond
text:
"If you must die today, make your death worthy of legend."
—Alesha, Who Smiles at Death

name: Bearscape
text:
"Nature is the endless dance between life and death."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Flaying Tendrils
text: Only one Eldrazi stood against them, yet the defenders were outnumbered.

name: Necrotic Hex
text:
"You foolish knights pound your breastplates and vow to fight until your last breath. As if that's when it ends."
—Tormod, the Desecrator

name: M'Odo, the Gnarled Oracle
text: Those with vision always have a path.

name: City of Brass
text: To walk its streets is to burn in its beauty.

name: Scouring Sands
text: When Purphoros cleans the ashes from his forge, entire cities vanish.

name: Essence Infusion
text: "I'd say it's still a fair fight—now my friend is about the size of your ego."

name: Guul Draz Mucklord
text: Death comes in many forms on Guul Draz, most of them slow, subtle, and agonizing. At least a monstrous crocodile offers a swift death.

name: Elvish Spirit Guide
text:
"We are never without guidance, if we but seek it."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

name: Good-Fortune Unicorn
text: Catching even a glimpse of one is the start of eight years of good luck.

name: The Modern Age // Vector Glider
text: It drifted from the spirit realm into a neon world full of new possibilities . . . and decided to stay.

name: Lovestruck Beast // Heart's Desire
text: His mind chose solitude, but his heart disagreed.

name: Voyage's End
text: Philosophers say those lost at sea ascended to a more perfect realm. Sailors say they drowned.

name: Sea God's Scorn
text: Instead of performing their daily devotions, Heliod's acolytes spent the morning picking strands of kelp off the altar.

name: Bleed Dry
text:
"Wipe your chin, child. We can't have Olivia thinking we're uncivilized."
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Raksha Golden Cub
text: Some believe that Raksha, youngest of the kha, is the reincarnation of Dakan, the first and mightiest of leonin leaders.

name: Kitchen Imp
text: Action: Show an imp that's a kitchen helper for Asmor, the Underworld Cook.

name: Southern Paladin
text:
"Look to the south; there you will find peace and serenity."
—*The Book of Tal*

name: Last Chance
text: No reinforcements. Nowhere to retreat. Nothing to lose.

name: Havoc Festival
text:
"We can't control enemies who have no regard for their own survival."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Wrath of God
text:
"As flies to wanton boys, are we to the gods. They kill us for their sport."
—William Shakespeare, *King Lear*

name: Vesuvan Duplimancy
text:
"There hasn't been an original thought on Vesuva in centuries."
—Emmest, Tolarian chronicler

name: Kozilek, the Great Distortion
text: A void as cryptic as reality itself.

name: Ochran Assassin
text: "The dagger is just the distraction. I carry the real killer in a vial at my side."

name: Xander's Lounge
text: Maestros agents can lie low in high style at the opulent Shadow Hostel.

name: Indrik Stomphowler
text: An indrik's howl has destructive power much subtler than that of its crushing foot.

name: Woodland Patrol
text: Each had seen friends and family taken by the corruption, so each carried an axe at the other's request.

name: Dream Halls
text: Within without.

name: Hazardous Conditions
text: "There are many reasons we invent, of which survival is not the least."

name: Corrupt
text: One misstep in the swamp and the evil that sleeps beneath will rise to find you.

name: Jester's Cap
text:
"They say the last owner cut out his own tongue, laughing the whole time. Superstitious drivel, but amusing, isn't it?"
—Hilde the Collector, last known words

name: Locked in the Cemetery
text: "Help! I'm not a zombie! Let me out!"

name: Tel-Jilad Fallen
text: "No longer am I shackled to antiquity. My new masters will etch a glorious future."

name: Thriving Heath
text: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

name: Suppression Field
text: The most feared of Azorius punishments is to be freed—sent back out into the world, stripped of all magical defenses.

name: Silvos, Rogue Elemental
text: He was born of the Mirari, thrust out of his homeland before he was even aware. Left without purpose or meaning, he found both in the pits.

name: Jwari Disruption // Jwari Ruins
text:
"The Ondu Skyclave was a center for rebellion against the capital in Makindi. Of course they built in deadly traps."
—Nys Dal, Sea Gate trapfinder

name: Reclusive Artificer
text: It's wise not to disturb an artist at work.

name: Lurking Jackals
text: Often it's not the hunter or the hunted but the opportunist who thrives in Rath.

name: Irencrag Feat
text: The greatest challenge isn't the stifling heat but the crushing weight of those who failed before.

name: Moriok Rigger
text: The Moriok scavenge for weapons, for armor, for food—and ultimately for their souls.

name: Rain of Tears
text:
"When mortals die, they have family, friends, compatriots to mourn them. When the land dies, all else dies with it, and there is no one left to weep."
—Jacinth, Skyshroud ranger

name: Impeccable Timing
text: To a trained warrior, there is scarcely a more potent weapon than patience.

name: Hedge Troll
text: His abode was clean and bare, not a morsel in sight. I asked him what he ate, fearing the answer. He smiled and said his faith alone sustained him.

name: Marhault Elsdragon
text: Marhault follows a strict philosophy, never letting emotions cloud his thoughts. No chance observer could imagine the rage in his heart.

name: Darkest Hour
text: The eclipse made it clear whose side the sky was on.

name: Halberdier
text: His reputation precedes him—and so does his weapon.

name: Self-Assembler
text:
"Test 37: Sentience module is still too strong. It's adding ears again."
—Development log of Willa, Yotian artificer

name: Scarecrow
text: There was more malice in its button eyes than should have been possible in something that had never known life.

name: Glimmer Bairn
text: "Tricks and treats, souls and sweets! On wooded path, whom shall we meet?"

name: Split-Tail Miko
text: "I wish there were no use for those with my talents. I wish that I could walk Kamigawa forgotten and unneeded, with no war wounds to heal and no broken bones to mend."

name: Minister of Inquiries
text: "This research violates Consulate law."

name: Drakewing Krasis
text: Cautious not to repeat Vig's mistakes, the Simic fuse life essences using magic alone. Each result is called a krasis.

name: Spinning Wheel
text:
"Though long forgotten, the wheel continued to turn, spinning fate from a dusty attic."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

name: Rock Lobster
text: Many take the lobster for granite.

name: Lumengrid Gargoyle
text:
"Anything that watches without sleep and fights without fear is a valuable ally against the Phyrexians."
—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Lightning Javelin
text: The harpies descended without mercy upon Akros, only to find their attack put them within range of the javelineers.

name: Whiptail Moloch
text:
"It wags its tail when it's happy. It wags its tail when it's angry. Nope, there's no good time to be around a whiptail."
—Rugar, Leaguehall Infirmary patient

name: Riddlemaster Sphinx
text: "Safe passage requires only a simple answer to a simple question, traveler."

name: Deception
text: Believing they wrote the forged letter that had been stolen from Zhou Yu, Cao Cao rashly executed his two best admirals for treason.

name: Hornbash Mentor
text: "We share the same nuanced opinion of hunters and military goons: smash them."

name: Flowstone Slide
text:
"Like an avalanche. With teeth. That will chase you. Uphill."
—Flint Foot, viashino runner

name: Zenith Flare
text:
"I defy this world to try our defenses now. Send pterons and skycats. Send Vadrok!"
—Janae, Coppercoat architect

name: Guardians' Pledge
text: A dozen fighting for each other are worth a thousand fighting for themselves.

name: Skyclave Cleric // Skyclave Basilica
text:
"As points of no return go, it is quite epic."
—Aelah, expedition cleric

name: Augur of Skulls
text: Within each empty skull, it seeks ways to preserve its own failing undeath.

name: Inferno
text:
"Any scrap of compassion that still existed in my soul was permanently snuffed out when they cast me out into the flames."
—Mairsil, called the Pretender

name: Misinformation
text:
"When you cannot rely on your sources, trust your own senses. When you cannot trust those, you must follow your instincts."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Infest
text:
"This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather."
—Rannon, Vithian holdout

name: Sure Strike
text: Before the officiant even had a chance to ask if anyone objected to the Voldaren-Markov union, Arlinn made her opinion known.

name: Battle Sliver
text:
"One emitted a strange series of buzzing clicks and guttural commands, then clawed arms emerged from all of them. Is there no limit to their adaptations?"
—Hastric, Thunian scout

name: Scavenging Ooze
text: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

name: Gloryscale Viashino
text:
"This is a new world and a new war. We need warriors who know chaos and how to combat it."
—Lisha of the Azure

name: Plague Wight
text: For some goods, the best couriers are the dead.

name: Krenko's Enforcer
text: He just likes to break legs. Collecting the debt is a bonus.

name: Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant
text: A despot in life. A monster in death.

name: Culmination of Studies
text: Will's quick thinking meshed with Rowan's raw power to bring down the Blood Avatar.

name: Voice of Law
text:
"Life's balance is as a star: on one point is Law, and Law must be upheld. If the knots of order are loosened, chaos will spill through."
—*Song of All*, canto 167

name: Fellwar Stone
text:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
—Mairsil, the Pretender

name: Goblin Arsonist
text: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

name: Lat-Nam Adept
text: "Every book is a doorway to enlightenment. Curiosity is your key."

name: Vengeful Devil
text: Devils love adding injury to injury.

name: Hurler Cyclops
text:
"It's my fault, really. I told him to throw anything he could find at the enemy."
—Throppel, auxiliary commander

name: Voltaic Construct
text: The undead may outlast the living, but those who have never lived outlast them both.

name: Sabertooth Alley Cat
text: It has eight lives' worth of hunger to satisfy.

name: Serene Offering
text:
"A sacrifice made in peace is worth a dozen made in panic."
—Orim, Samite healer

name: Siegecraft
text:
"They thought their fortress impregnable . . . until we marched up with ours, and blocked out the sun."
—Golran, dragonscale captain

name: Ashnod's Altar
text:
"If you work at sawing up carcasses, you notice how the joints fit, how the nerves are arrayed, and how the skin peels back."
—Ashnod, to Tawnos

name: Concentrate
text: "The treasure in my mind is greater than any worldly glory."

name: Thrive
text: "We wait and watch, and as we prepare for war, we grow strong."

name: Shivan Phoenix
text: To strike down the phoenix is to slash at the flame.

name: Dunes of the Dead
text: The Curse of Wandering permeated Amonkhet long before Nicol Bolas. He simply harnessed it.

name: Waste Not
text: Designed by the Magic community

name: Aven Wind Mage
text: "My skill sharpens with each beat of my wings."

name: Stratozeppelid
text: The "Days of Darkness" mark the stratozeppelids' annual migration, when for five days they blot out the sun and trumpet their passing.

name: Lofty Denial
text: The mage scowled as yet another bolt splashed harmlessly against seemingly empty air.

name: Grixis Panorama
text: There is no height above Grixis that is free from the stench of death.

name: Ghoulcaller Gisa
text: "Geralf, must you always whine? I agreed to nothing. I'll raise ghouls anytime I wish."

name: Ruins Recluse
text: Desert horrors were its favorite treat, but it happily expanded its diet to include extraplanar horrors.

name: Destructive Digger
text: "I love digging. It gives me lots of time to think about how much I love digging."

name: Relentless Raptor
text: As the battle for Orazca unfolded, the contenders discovered that others had already staked a claim.

name: Chittering Doom
text: One fateful night, bright-eyed and bushy-tailed, they rose.

name: Galestrike
text: Strong wings make strong winds.

name: Blade Banish
text: The Wanderer walks many paths. Her blade travels only one.

name: Cunning Lethemancer
text: "Give me your memories, and you will have release from the suffering they bring you."

name: Skulltap
text:
"Finally, a use for that head of yours."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Necron Overlord
text: "This galaxy once knelt before us, and it will do so again."

name: Leave No Trace
text: The magic of the Boros patrols the streets even when their soldiers do not.

name: Snubhorn Sentry
text: They're fun to train—if you like stubborn, aggressive, and fiercely territorial.

name: Gaea's Might
text: With the Heart of Yavimaya aiding him, Multani didn't even strain at the load.

name: Ancient Grudge
text: Shelby locked eyes with the ferocious creature as the glass began to crack. With one more lunge, she would break through and confront her nemesis at last.

name: Hedron Crab
text: Hedrons perplex minds both great and small.

name: Cormela, Glamour Thief
text: She sees the world as a gift meant for her.

name: Moonglove Extract
text: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

name: Thran Tome
text: Every line holds a tale, and between lie a thousand more.

name: Shipwreck Marsh
text: The bones of doomed ships jut out from the muck while the bones of their sailors molder below.

name: Rain of Revelation
text: "As the sky opened up, we ran for shelter. Halfway there I came to the sudden realization that, already soaked, there might be more to gain from experiencing the rain than running from it."

name: Kazuul Warlord
text: On expeditions, minotaurs are worth their weight in gold. Fortunately for their paymasters, most minotaurs don't know how much they weigh.

name: Returned Pastcaller
text: Lorehold spirit statues are not forbidden from raising statues of their own.

name: Underworld Fires
text: The Underworld is anything but a resting place.

name: Terminate
text:
". . . some sort of giant lizard-bat thing. Yeah, we shot it. No, nothing to clean up."
—Archelle, chief exterminator

name: Carrion Ants
text: "War is no picnic," my father liked to say. But the ants seemed to disagree.

name: Index
text: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

name: Serra Angel
text: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

name: Alpha Myr
text: Primero en cargar, primero en luchar.

name: Sunscorch Regent
text:
"We trust in the scalelords, bringers of justice that none can escape."
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

name: Watertrap Weaver
text: The river is a powerful friend.

name: Pariah's Shield
text: To bear the shield of the pariah is the highest honor a Boros can receive—and the last.

name: Rolling Spoil
text: The shadow that fell over the grove was silent yet horribly alive, roiling with millions of tiny minions dedicated to the process of rot.

name: Urn of Godfire
text: Ephara blessed the defenders of Theros with godfire, a Nyx-infused incendiary substance that burned without fuel.

name: Copper-Leaf Angel
text:
"When Serra made angels, people called her a goddess. My angels are far superior to hers."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Harvest Gwyllion
text: She speaks only in vile epithets, spitting out curses and obscenities that harm others just by the hearing.

name: Serum Sovereign
text: A thousand riddles, each with a single answer: "The glory of Phyrexia."

name: Nether Void
text: These days, some wizards are finding that they have a little too much spell left at the end of their mana.

name: Junktroller
text: One man's trash is another man's troller.

name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
text:
"About, about, in reel and rout
The death-fires danced at night;
The water, like a witch's oils,
Burnt green, and blue and white."
—Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Glare of Subdual
text: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.

name: Traitorous Greed
text:
"Remind me again, what's the going rate for betrayal these days?"
—Captain Rhenmir

name: Teferi's Isle
text: The three wizards knew only that this isle held a great mystery—and that patience alone would solve it.

name: Coax from the Blind Eternities
text: At Nahiri's call, Emrakul traversed the vast emptiness between the planes and arrived on Innistrad.

name: Goblin Digging Team
text:
"Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Dig. Die!"
—Goblin chant

name: Machine God's Effigy
text: Gix ensured his most loyal followers were the first to taste Phyrexian perfection.

name: Overgrown Tomb
text:
"Brago's tomb was first erected as a formality. Now it stands as the last memorial to a forgotten fool."
—Queen Marchesa

name: Armament Corps
text: The Abzan avoid extended supply lines by incorporating weapons stores into their battle formations.

name: Treasured Find
text: Gorgons crave beautiful things: gems, exquisite amulets, the alabaster corpses of the petrified dead . . .

name: Touchstone
text:
"One touch to the stone and the sidar's son turned me from stalwart to statue."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Force Away
text: Where an enemy once rode, not even a whisper remains.

name: Ulvenwald Tracker
text: "Peace will come to Innistrad, but only after all abominations have been dealt with, one by one."

name: Icatian Infantry
text:
"Valiant Icatia was the last of the Sarpadian empires to fall. Its faithful soldiers defended their cities to the very end."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI*

name: Jhovall Queen
text: War-trained jhovalls eat twice their weight in war-trained soldiers daily.

name: Llanowar Behemoth
text:
"Most people can't build decent weapons out of stone or steel. Trust the elves to do it with only mud and vines."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Scavenger Drake
text: Dragons consider drakes to be mockeries of their perfection, destroying them on sight.

name: Munda's Vanguard
text: "Do not let yourselves fall now. Zendikar is depending on us-on you!"

name: Sea Troll
text:
"I've seen those Trolls devour a drowning sailor faster than his lungs could fill with water."
—Zeki, Reef Pirate

name: Dauthi Jackal
text:
"All Dauthi are jackals, regardless of breed."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Putrefy
text:
"From monarch to mulch as quick as could be."
—*The Dethroner's Grimoire*

name: Mighty Leap
text:
"We may have lost faith in our gods, but we are far from losing faith in ourselves."
—Munda, ambush leader

name: Youthful Knight
text:
"Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Horobi, Death's Wail
text:
"From the ashes of Reito rose a new kami. And thereafter at every battle came Horobi, Death's Wail."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Dauntless Bodyguard
text: The Benalish aristocracy is hereditary, but the loyalty of its subjects is earned.

name: Price of Betrayal
text: The moment Liliana defied Nicol Bolas, her contract was broken, and her life was forfeit. But she was free to choose her fate, and she decided it was worth the price.

name: Belbe's Portal
text: The fight will continue on a new battlefield.

name: Ayula, Queen Among Bears
text: Born from the oldest red cedar, nursed on the sap of the tallest spruce, coronated under the mightiest pine.

name: Ready to Rumble
text:
"It's too quiet tonight. Go make trouble."
—Ziatora

name: Melira, Sylvok Outcast
text: Once a pariah, now Mirrodin's greatest hope.

name: Vile Entomber
text: The dead are lonely in the crypt and always eager for company.

name: Village Rites
text: "You were so eager to take and consume. Yet when asked to give, you refuse?"

name: Swamp
text: As you trudge through the sewers of Baldur's Gate it dawns on you: where are all the rats?

name: Transmutation
text: "You know what I was,/ You see what I am: change me, change me!" —Randall

name: Graveyard Shift
text: "Up and at 'em, buddy. We've got more work to do."

name: Victim of Night
text:
"Do not touch a drop. Not yet. I want to watch this so-called slayer's last crisis of faith."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Talisman of Dominance
text:
"As swift as a lash mamba, as sharp as a spineleaf, a stubborn as a wild grox."
—Colonel Pannet, in praise of the Catachan warrior

name: Fearsome Temper
text: Purphoros is god of creation and destruction, which makes him the most creatively destructive god in the pantheon.

name: Seal of Removal
text:
"I am the unraveler, the loosened thread that will not hold."
—Seal inscription

name: Timeless Witness
text: Intent: We'd like to re-imagine the Eternal Witness as an initiate on Amonkhet.

name: Oversimplify
text:
"A fine example of addition by subtraction."
—Deekah, professor of fractal theory

name: Stalwart Valkyrie
text: "Only the worthy may pass."

name: Opening Ceremony
text:
"Oooooh!"
—The crowd
"Aaaaaaaaah!"
—Also the crowd

name: Bargain
text: Bargaining with a goblin is like trading with a child; both believe they already own everything.

name: Ronom Unicorn
text: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

name: Artful Dodge
text: Those who know the alleys and sewers of the Erdwal can disappear like smoke.

name: Soltari Priest
text:
"Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men."
—Seneca, "On Providence," trans. Basore

name: Goblin Elite Infantry
text:
We're *elite*. You're not.
—Infantry motto

name: Pestilent Cauldron // Restorative Burst
text: "Death? Everyone does death. Let me show you something actually impressive."

name: Izzet Chronarch
text: He ensures not only whether but also when and where the lightning strikes twice.

name: Cryptic Caves
text: Only when you've given up the search will the caves yield their secrets.

name: Snarespinner
text:
"Let's lure the drakes to the webs over the Samok Stand. Keep the spiders content."
—Aurelia

name: Ravages of War
text:
"Thorn bushes spring up wherever the army has passed. Lean years follow in the wake of a great war."
—Lao Tzu, *Tao Te Ching*,
trans. Feng and English

name: Thraben Doomsayer
text: "Swarms of the unhallowed claw at Thraben's gates! Do you still deny the end approaches?"

name: Jagged Lightning
text: The pungent smell of roasting flesh made both mages realize they'd rather break for dinner than fight.

name: Time Warp
text:
"Let's do it again!"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Shimmering Grotto
text: Once each year, the sun's rays reach the hidden chamber of Velis Vel, and the changelings congregate from afar to bathe in the ever-shifting light.

name: Inspiring Veteran
text: "I fight for my daughter, who may not set foot on a battlefield for many years. Remember who you fight for."

name: Cadaver Imp
text: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

name: Strangleroot Geist
text: Geists of the hanged often haunt the tree on which they died.

name: Jerren, Corrupted Bishop // Ormendahl, the Corrupter
text: "Ah. Jerren. You've been such a faithful, useful insect."

name: Arasta of the Endless Web
text: Her webs, spun from her own hair, reach from Nyx to the mortal world and even into the Underworld.

name: Lorehold Apprentice
text: Ancient footfalls echo in her head, their timeless rhythm guiding the present.

name: Moorland Inquisitor
text: Inquisitors are taught scripture, philosophy, and the fine art of sharpening an axe.

name: Foreboding Ruins
text: Sent to find Sorin, Jace ventured to the vampire's ancestral home, only to find evidence of a deeper mystery.

name: Beastcaller Savant
text: "They come because I call. They stay because I listen."

name: Revered Dead
text:
"The mists coalesced into silent warriors. We charged them and broke through their lines, only to see them swirl and re-form behind us."
—Golas Mahr, black knight

name: Death Grasp
text: Plate mail, the skin of the chest, the rib cage, the heart—all useless against the mage who can reach directly for the soul.

name: Coastal Hornclaw
text: Jamuraan farmers fear three things above all else: droughts, floods, and hornclaws.

name: Shore Keeper
text: Over their long life spans, the larger trilobites accumulate vast treasure troves in their guts.

name: Commander Greven il-Vec
text: "Rage is the only freedom left to me."

name: Ulrich's Kindred
text:
"I am not its master. We are of the same pack."
—Ulrich, Krallenhorde alpha

name: Stalking Tiger
text: In the Jamuraan jungles, there is often no separating beauty from danger.

name: Pyrotechnics
text:
"Hi! ni! ya! Behold the man of flint, that's me! Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return."
—Navajo war chant

name: Thunderheads
text: The clouds grew thick, and then they grew teeth.

name: Oakshade Stalker // Moonlit Ambusher
text: He blends seamlessly into the forest, waiting silently for his prey.

name: Trumpeting Herd
text: An elephant never forgives.

name: Spirit Bonds
text: Designed by Justin Gary

name: Avenging Arrow
text:
"Forgive the theft. Punish the deception."
—Alcarus, Selesnya archer

name: Infernal Sovereign
text: Dominaria was his to conquer. The Phyrexians were merely the latest fools to stand in his way.

name: Domri's Nodorog
text: "Good girl."

name: Chasm Drake
text:
"Once he's got you, hold on. Fall from a drake and you'll suffer much worse than a bruise."
—Garl, drake trainer

name: Fissure Vent
text:
"Something down there has an appetite for what we're standing on. Let's hope it doesn't want seconds."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Shriek of Dread
text: When Crosis roared, the battle ended and the slaughter began.

name: Mundungu
text:
"Our buried kings silently await the revolt of dead peasants."
—Tuwile, mundungu of Aku

name: Taranika, Akroan Veteran
text: "I like to think Kytheon keeps watch over all of us."

name: Demonic Tutor
text: 「悪魔は、自分が賢く、騙されることなどないと信じている者を好む。」 ー巻物入れに刻まれた言葉

name: Syphon Sliver
text: When the hive must feed, every appendage becomes an additional mouth.

name: Bereaved Survivor // Dauntless Avenger
text: "With Avacyn gone, I no longer knew who to pray to. Alone, I wept for a sister who would never return."

name: Campus Guide
text: "There's nowhere in Strixhaven I can't find. Where do you need to go?"

name: Nimble Birdsticker
text: "What goes up must get stuck."

name: Foreboding Ruins
text: When the Great Rift opened across the galaxy, many Imperial worlds were lost to chaos.

name: Frontline Rebel
text: "Will you be strong and stand with me?"

name: Skycloud Egg
text:
"Have your dreams of a better society become an obsession?"
—Watnik, master glassblower

name: Sima Yi, Wei Field Marshal
text: Sima Yi fought for four generations of the Cao family before his own grandson became emperor and united the three kingdoms.

name: Psychosis Crawler
text:
"If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains."
—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

name: Goldmeadow Harrier
text:
"It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest."
—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

name: Brash Taunter
text: "You hit like a kobold!"

name: Profane Procession // Tomb of the Dusk Rose
text: Vona sought a conqueror. Mavren sought a savior. Both found what they sought . . .

name: Rorix Bladewing
text: In an attempt to restore pride to Shiv and to forge an undying legacy, Rorix traveled far to compete for glory in Otaria's Grand Coliseum.

name: Volcanic Submersion
text: A dragon's death is almost as feared as its life. Old, dying dragons throw themselves into volcanoes, causing massive upheaval and widespread disaster.

name: Aspect of Gorgon
text:
"My adopted children are loved no less."
—Pharika, god of affliction

name: Gnathosaur
text: Mirran creatures that could withstand the Phyrexian oil found an abundance of crunchy snacks.

name: Recoil
text: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

name: Loyal Guardian
text: Each scar on its hide is a badge of honor.

name: Millstone
text: More than one mage was driven insane by the sound of the Millstone relentlessly grinding away.

name: Larceny
text:
Opportunity makes the thief.
—Roman proverb

name: Azimaet Drake
text:
"A vizier's dish, best served drenched in honey and almonds."
—Suq'Ata royal recipe

name: Magewright's Stone
text: The stones hark back to an age before civilization, when the living earth blessed all who trod its untamed wilds.

name: Wheel of Sun and Moon
text: There's always another tomorrow.

name: Embereth Skyblazer
text: "We fight with valor in our hearts and fire in our veins!"

name: Glorious Anthem
text:
"North and South meet and angels sing. Voices resound with a righteous ring."
—"The Ballad of the Paladins"

name: Devouring Swarm
text: Their arrival is heralded by the deafening hum of ten thousand wings. Their departure is marked by the silence of the dead.

name: Cycle of Life
text: Thus does nature assert herself.

name: Artillery Blast
text: To conserve ammunition, Jhoira modified ancient Thran artillery cannons to fire gouts of pure Shivan lava.

name: Dream Chisel
text: Itself a product of Ixidor's tortured psyche, the chisel brings his darkest dreams to life.

name: Accorder Paladin
text: "I fight for the suns, the surface, and everything in between."

name: Anger of the Gods
text: There was no reason to pray. This was already an act of the gods.

name: Simian Grunts
text: These monkeys mean business.

name: Shenanigans
text: Pricy baubles are no match for cheap tricks.

name: Paladin of Atonement
text: For every wound there is a blessing; for every death, a reckoning.

name: Return of the Wildspeaker
text: "The curse is broken."

name: Fellwar Stone
text:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
—Mairsil, called the Pretender

name: Gerrard's Irregulars
text: Had Gerrard realized he'd end up fighting against them, he might not have trained them so well.

name: Knight of Dusk
text:
Fall like night upon the foe.
—Motto of the Knights of Dusk

name: Concession Stand
text:
"Days since last atomic ketchup explosion: 1."
—Kitchen safety notice

name: Contraption Cannon
text: Common side effects include headaches, ringing in ears, and excessive smithereens. In some cases, a small hole in space-time may develop.

name: Blightbeetle
text: Leaf and soul alike wither at its touch.

name: Squandered Resources
text:
"He traded sand for skins, skins for gold, gold for life. In the end, he traded life for sand."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Ancestor's Chosen
text: Empowered by generations of strength.

name: Master Biomancer
text: "Nature is a wonderful engineer but works far too slowly for my tastes."

name: Kaya's Onslaught
text: "Your trail ends here."

name: Planar Gate
text: Nireya reached through the Gate, sensing the energies trapped beyond.

name: Wall of Glare
text: The blinding barrier served Benalia better than a hundred shields.

name: Nightcreep
text:
"Please tell me I'm hallucinating. I'd rather be crazy than here."
—Gorev Hadszak, Wojek investigator

name: Sol Ring
text:
"One day, the dark glory of the void will swallow the light of the stars once and for all!"
—Magus Lucea Kane

name: Moonwing Moth
text:
"Night wings sprinkled with dust Of a thousand soldiers dead And a thousand cities fallen."
—Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

name: Faithful Mending
text: "What has been looted can be restored. The church lives on within us."

name: Reprisal
text:
"Kjeldor's borders are secure, and its citizens are prepared to take up arms in defense of their families."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Saprazzan Raider
text: Some quick dagger work and then back to the sea—that's the Saprazzan way.

name: Era of Enlightenment // Hand of Enlightenment
text:
"We have endured lifetimes of war and carved our way to peace by blade and conquest. Now, united at last under Kyodai's guidance, we lay down our weapons and open our minds."
—Aoha, general of the First Emperor

name: Errand of Duty
text:
"Call every able sword to our side. Kjeldor will stand triumphant!"
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Shield Bearer
text:
"You have almost completed your four years, my son. Soon you shall be a Skyknight."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Field of Reality
text:
"The scholars of the Minamo School understood the veil between their world and that of the kami. Moreover, they knew how to exploit it."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Wakeroot Elemental
text:
"When the forest walks, it's too late to run."
—Horent, Khalni druid

name: Boomerang
text:
"Returne from whence ye came. . . ."
—Edmund Spenser,
*The Faerie Queene*

name: Cemetery Gate
text:
"Just the place for a picnic."
—Murat, Death Speaker

name: Run Ashore
text:
"Which one of you slug-brained milksops forgot to make an offering to Cosima?"
—Jolkur, navigator

name: Maw of the Obzedat
text: The devout sacrifice themselves to it hoping for escape from their debts to the guild, but many end up owing in the afterlife.

name: Rampart Smasher
text:
"He has strength and courage—just way, way too much of both."
—Syr Faren, the Hengehammer

name: Fracture
text:
"Your defiance is amusing, little mage. It's time you learn how fragile you really are."
—Extus Narr

name: Skyreach Manta
text: As the dawns break, the manta soars.

name: Crumbling Necropolis
text:
"They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."
—Olcot, Rider of Joffik

name: Divebomber Griffin
text: Justice flies swiftly on angry wings.

name: Saheeli's Silverwing
text: "Track the source of those thopters," Saheeli told her creation. "And feel free to snack on as many as you want."

name: Vodalian Illusionist
text:
"Torahn gore these shifty fishtails! You can't even get close to one."
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Krosan Drover
text: "Sit."

name: Nomad Mythmaker
text: On the wild steppes, history vanishes in the dust. Only the mythmakers remain to say what was, and is, and will be.

name: Ghor-Clan Savage
text: The snap of sinew. The crunch of bone. A cry for mercy. These are the music of the Gruul.

name: Krumar Bond-Kin
text: "The Abzan replaced my savagery with a noble heritage. I would give my life for my House."

name: Crux of Fate
text:
「兄弟の一人は多元宇宙のために戦った。もう一人は自分のために。」
――*古呪の寓話*

name: Snowhorn Rider
text: Sure-footed, strong-willed, and ill-tempered—and so is the ram.

name: Elgaud Inquisitor
text: "It will take more than steel alone to purge this world of evil."

name: Sorcerer's Strongbox
text: Simun the Quiet filled the chest with his most precious thoughts. But in a fit of paranoia, he locked up the memory of where he hid the key.

name: Clock of Omens
text: Those near the clock don't hear it anymore, but their every movement is in time with its ticking.

name: Kjeldoran Skyknight
text:
"My Aesthir is my most trusted ally. We fight as one and live as one, and we will die as one."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Hunting Kavu
text: Dominarians gladly fought alongside kavu . . . until the kavu figured out some Dominarians were quite tasty.

name: Enlightened Tutor
text:
"I do not teach. I simply reveal."
—Daudi, Femeref tutor

name: Araba Mothrider
text:
"My finest creations are fashioned after the moths of Eiganjo. They fly higher, faster, and more gracefully than any of my own designs."
—Noboru, master kitemaker

name: Viridian Shaman
text: Because the elves are so in touch with Mirrodin's nature, they understand best how to dismantle it.

name: Consuming Tide
text: Nephalia's tides obey an unforgiving moon.

name: Pillory of the Sleepless
text: Which is worse—the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

name: Minions' Murmurs
text:
"They are quick to offer advice, those whose mistakes doomed them to undeath. How can I not listen to the wisdom of failure?"
—Ratadrabik of Urborg

name: Infantry Veteran
text: "Any fool can pick up a sword and charge into battle. To emerge alive at the end, that is a gift that comes from leadership and experience."

name: Cartographer
text: How do you map a world when the land moves beneath your feet?

name: Orzhov Advokist
text: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.

name: Bring to Trial
text: "In you go, big guy. Watch your head."

name: Contaminated Ground
text:
"No one cares about pollution until they can see it."
—Gurras, Golgari rot farmer

name: Fearless Skald
text: "Hold nothing back, my friends. Tonight we feast in Starnheim!"

name: Oddly Uneven
text: The odds are good, but the goods are odd.

name: Expedition Healer
text: In any adventuring party, the cleric is the heart: healing wounds, inspiring courage, and raising morale.

name: Ethereal Ambush
text: The energies of the Temur lands are readily unleashed upon intruders.

name: Deft Duelist
text: Some Serul Cove rogues traffic in stolen sigils, which fetch a high price from those who would rather pay for honor than earn it.

name: Miraculous Recovery
text:
"You stop breathing for just a few minutes and everyone jumps to conclusions."
—Zarkuu, necrosavant

name: Aether Storm
text: Thunder in the wind / no rain / peace mourns its passing.

name: Vow of Lightning
text:
"For all I have lost, for all who have fallen, I will render you to dust."
—Jared Carthalion

name: Bane of Progress
text: Urza's forces tore across Argoth, and Argoth responded in kind.

name: Traveling Philosopher
text:
The Champion and the philosopher Olexa returned from the opposing camp at dusk. Behind them, the enemy raised sail and departed, breaking the siege. When asked what the two had done, the Champion replied, "We spoke to them."
—*The Theriad*

name: Voyaging Satyr
text: "None can own the land's bounty. The gods made this world for all to share its riches. And I'm not just saying that because you caught me stealing your fruit."

name: Wash Out
text:
"Perhaps planning should become a higher priority for me."
—Dack Fayden

name: Civic Wayfinder
text: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

name: Stonecoil Serpent
text:
"Why do they call it a serpent when it's actually a snake? Serpents are usually aquatic while—"
—Tevor the Pedantic, last words

name: Urza's Tower
text: Urza studied the creations of the Thran not simply to learn from them, but to surpass them.

name: Last Gasp
text: Takedowns in Valor's Reach are never meant to be lethal, but that doesn't mean they won't be incredibly painful.

name: Dwynen, Gilt-Leaf Daen
text: "This is our land. We will not allow eyeblights to poison its beauty."

name: Soulcage Fiend
text: Vowing to free the souls of her children, Kastinne followed the tormentors into the ghastly network of caves below Stensia.

name: Curse of the Forsaken
text:
"Purge the damned, for they have no place among the righteous!"
—Seeta of Thraben

name: River Bear
text: The bears had been isolated on an island for hundreds of years, until the island sank and the bears didn't.

name: Huatli's Spurring
text: "Run like the wind, fierce one. The hunt has begun."

name: Silver Knight
text: "Hammer out your doubts as you forge your weapon. To slay a dragon, your resolve must be stronger than your steel."

name: Throne of Geth
text: At the heart of Ish Sah, Geth stokes the dark fires of Phyrexia.

name: Alabaster Potion
text:
Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
—D'Avenant proverb

name: Demonic Vigor
text: In the Cabal, death is just another mark of devotion.

name: Murasa Sproutling
text: The seeds of memory grow eternal.

name: Spitting Earth
text:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
—Kumano, to his pupils

name: Stensia Bloodhall
text: The revelry ends when the supply of fresh ingenues runs dry.

name: Wakedancer
text: Havengul wakes are widely regarded as great entertainment. If you're lucky, the guest of honor climbs out of the casket and joins in the festivities.

name: Walker of the Wastes
text: In the absence of life, something yet grows.

name: Blue Sun's Zenith
text:
「五つの太陽よ！軌道計算がどんなに複雑か想像できる？そんな方程式に挑戦できるというなら、何だって差し出すわ！」
——クアンドリクスの魔導生徒、ジモーン

name: Kiss of Death
text:
"I'd sooner lock lips with a viper. At least I might walk away from *that*."
—Elvish scout

name: Spiteful Sliver
text: Victories against the hive are tragedies.

name: Unseen Walker
text:
"To pass through the jungle: silence, courtesy, ferocity, as the occasion demands."
—Kamau, "Proper Passage"

name: Sight of the Scalelords
text:
"The Silumgar creep around our borders and infiltrate our aeries. We must remain ever watchful."
—Golran, Dromoka captain

name: Seal of Strength
text:
"I am the feeder, the morsel that revives the starving."
—Seal inscription

name: Archon of Emeria
text:
"Archons dispense justice according to an ancient, and flawed, premise."
—Nissa Revane

name: Gerrard
text: Soldier. Adventurer. Heir to the Legacy. Gerrard has, over the years, traveled much of Dominaria in search of fortune and glory. Now, after serving nobly in the Benalish army, he has returned to the *Weatherlight* to serve as captain in Sisay's absence and to take up the battle against the Lord of the Wastes.

name: Wet Willie of the Damned
text: Ever the warrior, Glissa responded with a "wedgie from beyond Uranus."

name: Clowning Around
text: The Astrotorium's Clown-Bots are programmed to delight attendees by any means necessary.

name: Lava Burst
text:
"Overkill? This isn't a game of kick-the-ouphe!"
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Slay
text: The elves had the edge in guile, skill, and valor. But in the end, only sheer numbers mattered.

name: Abyssal Hunter
text: Some smiles show cheer; some merely show teeth.

name: Gravedigger
text: His grim ritual ushers the dead to their new life.

name: Mikaeus, the Unhallowed
text: Once a servant of the light, now a slave to the dark.

name: Skullknocker Ogre
text: The ogre crashed through the massive door. The winged folios scattered like frightened birds.

name: Slaying Fire
text: The purest virtue burns brighter than the sun and hotter than dragonfire.

name: Smoke Teller
text: "See your enemies from a thousand sides. Then you will find a thousand ways to kill them."

name: Eager Cadet
text: The enthusiasm of the young, sharpened by the discipline of a soldier.

name: Dual Shot
text: There is an eagerness among the Quiver of Kessig to prove they are the equal of the other cathar orders.

name: Furyblade Vampire
text: "Writhe all you want, filth. It will do you no good."

name: Upheaval
text: The calm comes after the storm.

name: Dragon Fodder
text: Gront realized that his brilliant plan of being faster than Kork might still not be enough.

name: Lightning Rift
text: Options will cost you, but a lack of them will cost you even more.

name: Danitha, New Benalia's Light
text: Danitha had spent her whole life preparing to lead House Capashen, but she mourned that the opportunity had come so soon.

name: Spined Wurm
text:
"They're as much like plants as animals. Leave them unchecked, and they'll choke out all other forms of life."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Curse of Leeches // Leeching Lurker
text: First darkness falls. Then it burrows in.

name: Crucible of Worlds
text: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.

name: Echoes of the Kin Tree
text: Even after Anafenza was executed, many secretly maintained their beliefs in the old ways.

name: Swarm of Bloodflies
text: Despite the name, they'll happily devour the flesh too.

name: Samite Alchemist
text:
"Powders and potions are nothing compared to faith."
—Baris, Serra Inquisitor

name: Mechanized Warfare
text: First the automatons reinforced depleted squads. Then they replaced them entirely.

name: Exclude
text:
"Terrifying, but thankfully temporary."
—Teferi

name: A-Death-Priest of Myrkul
text: "The Reaper bids you rise!"

name: Marsh Viper
text: "All we had left were their black and bloated bodies." —Maeveen O'Donagh, *Memoirs of a Soldier*

name: Goblin Electromancer
text:
"Result 752: Rapid mass redistribution.
"Result 753: Calamitous reverse synthesis.
"Result 754: Acute disarrayment."
—Izzet research notes

name: Stoneskin
text: "Ooh, nice shot! I almost felt that one."

name: Hinder
text:
"Do not react to force in kind. Turn it aside. Direct it to where it can do no harm."
—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

name: Anaba Shaman
text:
"Few master the powers of the earth as well as do the Shamans of the Minotaurs."
—Baki, Wizard Attendant

name: Old Ghastbark
text:
"Beware of trees that talk. Their words are threats. And mind the ones that sway and creak. They too threaten us, but in a foreign tongue."
—*The Book of Other Folk*

name: Timmy, Power Gamer
text: "Just wait till I get my Gigantosaurus...."

name: And They Shall Know No Fear
text:
"They are my bulwark against the Terror. They are the Defenders of Humanity. They are my Space Marines."
—The Emperor of Mankind

name: Coral Merfolk
text: The merfolk know every contour of their coral homes; each reef is a garden in times of peace, and a refuge and fortress in times of war.

name: Twitch
text:
"The flow is diverted. Your path is clear. What are you waiting for—the cave to bid you welcome?"
—Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage

name: Flash Counter
text:
"She grinned at me—a wicked grin. 'I hope you weren't relying too heavily on that, my dear.'"
—Medryn Silverwand, *Diary*

name: Burning Inquiry
text: Jariad burned the midnight oil, burned through scroll after scroll, and then burned down his laboratory.

name: Inspired Charge
text:
"Let's show these soulless fiends what a real army looks like! Forward!"
—Shella, knight of Zhalfir

name: Ferocity
text:
"You lot go on ahead. I'll keep killing them until it sticks."
—Tahngarth

name: Spirit Link
text: "I am bound to all my children. I share in their joys, I rage at their injuries."

name: Traveler's Amulet
text: A vision of home, and a glimpse of hope.

name: Torch Slinger
text: Once thrown, twice burned.

name: Catalog
text:
"The appearance of these warped stones throughout the provinces is too pervasive to be random. More evidence is needed to determine the reason behind them."
—Tamiyo's journal

name: Axis of Mortality
text: The Church of Dusk teaches there is no gain without loss, no triumph without sacrifice, no drink of exquisite crimson without a dying gasp.

name: Mortuary
text:
"Think of them not as failures but as works in progress."
—Volrath

name: Dazzling Reflection
text:
"The light of a felidar's horns can give even an Eldrazi pause."
—Zarra, lullmage

name: Crown-Hunter Hireling
text: While most in Paliano seek fame through favor, he'll settle for infamy through blood.

name: Elven Cache
text: Elves know where to harvest the best of the forest, for they planted it themselves.

name: Aura Thief
text: Illusion steals reality from the unwise.

name: Cateran Brute
text: The Cateran guild prefers to call them "public relations."

name: Student of Ojutai
text: "Human enlightenment is a firefly that sparks in the night. Dragon enlightenment is a beacon that disperses all darkness."

name: Arrest
text: Bladehold houses a rogues' gallery filled with the living "statues" of the worst enemies of the Auriok.

name: Reckless Scholar
text: Progress comes at a price.

name: Rain of Tears
text: When emotions rain down, what rivers will be born?

name: Jovial Evil
text: "Today, for a lark, let's visit the plains. I'm sure we'll find something to entertain us."

name: Majestic Metamorphosis
text: New Capenna's statues hold Old Capenna's secrets.

name: Laquatus's Champion
text: Chainer's dark gift to a darker soul.

name: Luxury Suite
text: In opulent chambers behind closed doors, dynasties are made and broken but with a few murmured words.

name: Rogue's Passage
text: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

name: Giant Spider
text: The Broken Lands are littered with the remnants of civilizations long dead and infested by terrors very much alive.

name: Clinging Darkness
text: There's an experience worse than blindness—it's the certainty that your vision is perfect and the horror that there's no world around you to see.

name: Bant Sureblade
text: Soldiers who fought through Grixis learned to hit first, recite the prayer of Asha later.

name: Rushing-Tide Zubera
text: Cut off from the kakuriyo by the destruction of their honden, the zubera sought new ways to bring their secrets home.

name: Mad Science Fair Project
text: "When it comes down to it, science is more art than science."

name: Spire Patrol
text: "After I examine your cargo and check your papers, you can be on your way."

name: Captivating Gyre
text:
"That's enough of that."
—Atemsis, All-Seeing

name: Master Chef
text: You never thought "rations" was an appropriate term for the feasts you prepare for your party.

name: Selfless Spirit
text: "There is always more to give."

name: Sickle Ripper
text: His sickle was forged in the heat of another cinder's funeral pyre.

name: Ardent Elementalist
text: While the Dawnhart witches focus their magic on nature and community, other covens consort with devils and twist the elements to their will.

name: Crucible of Fire
text:
"The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Agadeem's Awakening // Agadeem, the Undercrypt
text:
"Now is the death-hour, just before dawn. Wake, sleepers, and haunt the living!"
—Vivias, Witch Vessel

name: Crash Through
text:
"We have to get out of the city, Djeru. All of us! Gather as many as you can."
—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Steppe Lynx
text: Nothing quickens the predator's blood like the unfamiliar scents of new hunting grounds and the mewling cries of new prey.

name: Grassland Crusader
text: "Everyone deserves a chance to live. My job is to make sure they get it."

name: Hewed Stone Retainers
text:
"Their origins are shrouded in mystery. I believe they are the protectors of the lost secrets of our world."
—Jilaya, Temur whisperer

name: Zhou Yu, Chief Commander
text:
"After making me, Zhou Yu, did you have to make Kongming?"
—Zhou Yu crying to heaven on his deathbed

name: Insolent Neonate
text: "Manners are for mortals."

name: Slobad, Iron Goblin
text: The Forge embraces all who contribute to the Great Work.

name: Radiant Epicure
text: Taste is not a sensation for the tongue alone.

name: Ryusei, the Falling Star
text: The course of the falling star always ends in ruin.

name: Ghirapur Osprey
text: Many airship captains keep pets that share their love of the sky.

name: Notion Rain
text: City air is a constant drizzle of private thoughts.

name: Frontier Bivouac
text:
"The most powerful dreams visit those who shelter in a dragon's skull."
—Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

name: Grazing Gladehart
text:
"Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

name: Stupefying Touch
text: "A warrior without wit is simply meat."

name: Nightpack Ambusher
text: A strong leader means a growing pack.

name: Paleoloth
text:
"Gods do not sleep soundly in the earth's embrace."
—Mayael the Anima

name: Avid Reclaimer
text: "All can't be lost. Nissa has shown me that."

name: Prickly Marmoset
text:
"It's either terrified or extremely mad at us, definitely one of the two."
—Jonald, mission naturalist

name: Soldevi Steam Beast
text:
"Nothing has ever broken my heart so much as this—the betrayal of Soldev by my beloved machines!"
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Cult of the Waxing Moon
text: In times of madness, people cling to the familiar, monstrous though it may be.

name: Waterwhirl
text:
"Be as water: untamed and unheld, yet inexorably flowing toward a greater goal."
—Shensu, Riverwheel mystic

name: Shanna, Sisay's Legacy
text: "I am heir to many treasures. None is as precious as knowing how my ancestor lived her life."

name: Skystreamer
text: Victories at Valor's Reach are broadcast via griffins in the sky above.

name: Darksteel Gargoyle
text: The ultimate treasure is one that guards itself.

name: Shoreline Raider
text:
"This strange new beast makes for an excellent meal. Get me more."
—Empress Galina

name: Temporal Adept
text:
"Of course she's at the head of her class. All her classmates have disappeared."
—Gatha, Tolarian renegade

name: Essence Backlash
text:
"The other guilds will learn the hard way not to interfere with our investigations."
—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

name: Dimir Guildgate
text: Enter and become a mastermind of spies, lies, and deception.

name: Reduce to Ashes
text: Previously the training center for cathars, the Elgaud Grounds are now used by the Lunarch Inquisition to punish those considered to be heretics.

name: Stony Silence
text:
Let moss grow over gargoyles
—Gavony saying meaning "forget painful memories"

name: Raid Bombardment
text: Goblins in the first wave of a fire raid always bemoan the aim of everyone else.

name: Pyromancer's Assault
text: Never ask a pyromancer if that's the best she's got.

name: Dust to Dust
text: Tervish never noticed that the amulet had vanished. It had disappeared not only from his possession, but from his memory as well.

name: Vindictive Lich
text: Heart, mind, soul—weapons all.

name: Rimewood Falls
text:
"For a fortnight, our warband lay still beneath the icy waters, breathing through reeds as we waited for the great bear to appear."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Cyclone Summoner
text: Frost giants study for centuries in isolation, honing their ability to harness elemental mayhem.

name: Skulduggery
text: "They're so much more willing to parley once they're hanging from a boom by the ankle!"

name: Grave Strength
text: So long as death follows life, the supply lines of the Sultai will never be cut.

name: Stromkirk Captain
text:
"No longer can we allow our human populations to be mindlessly slaughtered by ghouls. Slay all who trespass."
—Runo Stromkirk

name: Harrow
text: Changing Rath's landscape is like tearing the scab from a wound.

name: Bag of Holding
text: There's no prepared like overprepared.

name: Zealous Inquisitor
