name: Blessing of Frost
text: A friend of Jorn is never cold.

name: Knights of the Black Rose
text: "Hail to the true queen! Long may she reign!"

name: Cryoclasm
text: The people of Terisiare had come to live on frozen fields as though on solid ground. Nothing reminded them of the difference more clearly than the rifts brought on by the Thaw.

name: Thornwood Falls
text: Mere weeks later, the planet was scoured of any trace of life. Every scrap of vegetation, every drop of water—gone.

name: Dawn's Reflection
text: Only Sylvok magic could truly capture the perfection of a Mirrodin sunrise.

name: Handy Dandy Clone Machine
text: Early testing failed because the clones were all thumbs.

name: Unsummon
text:
"Send it back to its own strange world so we can avoid another inglorious combat with these wicked beings."
—Captain Valek of Jhess

name: Rockslide Elemental
text: On Jund, even the landscape is a deadly hunter. Volcanoes, tar pits, and rock slides seem to prey upon the living.

name: Strength of Lunacy
text: Don't confuse lunacy with courage.

name: Quill-Slinger Boggart
text:
"A good day in Goldmeadow is one in which I don't spend all evening picking quills out of my backside."
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

name: Vhati il-Dal
text: "Sir, I just thought . . . ," explained Vhati. "Don't think," interrupted Greven. "It doesn't suit you."

name: Greater Good
text:
"We have more sprouts than they have hands."
—Gamelen, Citanul elder

name: Paradox Engine
text:
"One look at this glorious item convinced me that Kaladesh deserved my full attention. Sure enough, my time here has yielded exquisite fruit."
—Tezzeret

name: Bog Initiate
text:
"Urborg's magic is strong. Did Urza send you to protect us or to protect against us?"
—Urborg witch, to Barrin

name: Citadel of Pain
text:
"Battle is our religion. This fortress is our temple."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Olivia's Wrath
text:
"These worthless cattle think they can sneak unnoticed into my wedding? Dispose of them."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Perplexing Test
text: "Your proofs were a bit nontraditional, but effective nonetheless. Full marks."

name: Ancient Amphitheater
text: The arbiter Galanda Feudkiller judges Lorwyn's squabbles from a lofty perspective.

name: Rofellos's Gift
text:
"Rise, elf. We are both of Gaea, and thus we are equal."
—Multani, to Rofellos

name: Din of the Fireherd
text: Vengeance in stampede form.

name: Zhalfirin Decoy
text:
"Never let them take their eyes off you."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Alley Evasion
text: "Sure, you know the law. But I know the streets."

name: Strength of the Coalition
text:
"Root and wing, claw and sword; this will be a memorable stand, indeed."
—Lyra Dawnbringer

name: Retaliate
text: The Auriok learned perseverance from their forebears. They learned justice from the leonin.

name: Maniacal Rage
text: Rage is the culmination of an accelerating cycle of anger and violence that feeds itself in battle, spreading like a flame from one warrior to another.

name: Knighthood
text:
"He has returned. He who brought the dark ones. He who poisoned our paradise. How shall we greet him? With swift and certain death!"
—Radiant, archangel

name: Femeref Healer
text:
"Faith is my shield, and hope is my armor; I am vulnerable only to myself."
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Experiment Kraj
text:
"Of course it will grow beyond control—it was designed to choose its own evolution."
—Momir Vig

name: Minor Misstep
text: No matter how many times he saw it, Sarnvax always relished the look of dawning horror as his foes realized their mistake.

name: Benevolent Unicorn
text:
The best use for a unicorn's horn is to adorn a unicorn.
—Femeref adage

name: Zulaport Chainmage
text: The chains obey her. Everything else would do best to get out of her way.

name: Illusory Ambusher
text:
"Violence is the food it craves. Feed it if you dare."
—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

name: Teeterpeak Ambusher
text: Goblins from the Makindi Trenches of Ondu make surprisingly skilled climbing guides due to their habit of scaling the cliffs to drop onto unsuspecting foes.

name: Erase
text:
"Truth is hard enough to see, let alone understand. We must remove all distractions to find clarity."
—Zogye, wandering sage

name: Wrench-Rigger
text: Goblin innovator, goblin corpse. Tomayto, tomahto.

name: Blinkmoth Well
text: When dictated by blinkmoth migratory patterns, clouds of tiny lights well up from Mirrodin's core.

name: Tawnos, Urza's Apprentice
text: "My master believes anything is achievable."

name: Putrid Raptor
text: It eagerly gobbles up bits of its own rotting flesh as they fall to the swampy ground.

name: Goblin Blast-Runner
text: Most goblins can light a fuse and run, but only the cleverest remember to drop the bomb.

name: Shimian Night Stalker
text: "'Tis now the very witching time of night,/ When churchyards yawn and hell itself breathes out/ Contagion to this world." —William Shakespeare, Hamlet

name: Nexos
text: The blessed union of gun, claw, and merciless intent is a force to be truly feared.

name: Blood Age General
text: His troops took the Fortress of Caerdoon centuries ago, yet he fights on.

name: Fireblast
text: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

name: Stampeding Elk Herd
text: The Atarka use them not just for food, but also to clear away snow, trees, and enemy forces.

name: Catapult Fodder // Catapult Captain
text: These days, ghouls are the only abundant resource in Thraben.

name: Vraska's Conquistador
text: Abandoning both queen and church, he chose to follow power.

name: Ogre Slumlord
text:
"His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too."
—Branko One-Ear

name: Pack's Betrayal
text: Tovolar's howl of command was too much to resist, even for Arlinn's own loyal pack.

name: Field of Dreams
text: Some people say that the world is round, and if you travel far enough you'll come to the other side, where everything is upside down.

name: Jalum Tome
text:
"These glyphs describe a Thran device capable of controlling a machine army, but the dimensions make no sense. It's nearly the size of the Null Moon."
—Urza, diary

name: Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
text: "I will be your most demanding master, Liliana. But I have great things in mind for you."

name: Pyramid of the Pantheon
text: Five gods, one purpose.

name: Orchard Warden
text: "After the Rising, a treefolk's mind is as limber and green as its limbs, and is at its most receptive to our teachings."

name: Wight of Precinct Six
text: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

name: Larger Than Life
text:
"They say Head Judge Tezzeret will be reviewing every invention at the Fair. I made sure to build something that will stand out."
—Jehvani, Vahadar artificer

name: Poison Arrow
text: In ancient China, not wearing armor could be a fatal mistake. Guan Yu, Zhou Yu, Sun Ce, and other heros were struck by poison arrows.

name: Grapeshot Catapult
text: The Southern Paladin taught the airborne vermin to fear the storm that rains upward.

name: Brackish Trudge
text: Most trudges are covered with decaying plant matter, making them ideal breeding grounds for fungal spores.

name: Tireless Hauler // Dire-Strain Brawler
text: A few townsfolk had their suspicions, but none dared accuse him openly.

name: Ruination Wurm
text: When the architects of Ravnica claim a structure will stand against a wurm, they never mention for how long.

name: Jamuraan Lion
text:
Der Löwe zwinkerte
—Ausdruck der Femeref für "noch einmal davongekommen

name: Lava Hounds
text:
What cats bury, dogs eat.
—Urborg aphorism

name: Warlord's Fury
text:
"The old ways were for a winter world. We do what's best for us, not for the past. We are Keldons!"
—Grand Warlord Radha

name: Grappler Spider
text: Creatures of the air wisely avoid the darkest regions of Guul Draz—which is why grappler spiders inhabit the few places touched by the sun's rays.

name: Dissenter's Deliverance
text:
"When all doubts have melted away, the worthy will meet the Hour of Eternity and earn a place at the God-Pharaoh's side."
—*The Accounting of Hours*

name: Starved Rusalka
text:
"No more wretched fate is there than to waste away. If you are slain, your ghost may at least avenge itself upon your killer. But what release is there for one slain by Time?"
—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

name: Citadel Gate
text: A beacon of order and safety, for those who can afford it.

name: Goblin Lore
text: "Now listen closely, my young gob. There are many ways to eat pimple bugs, but I say the best way is all smashed together between two slug chips."

name: Sphinx of Magosi
text: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."

name: Voldaren Pariah // Abolisher of Bloodlines
text: Even if the rain turned to blood, her thirst would not be slaked.

name: Instigator
text: The desecration of their dead makes even the Saprazzans careless.

name: Grim Strider
text:
"As a child I saw something walking in the distance, far beyond the Hekma—shadow-dark, and taller than the gods. Even now, it passes through my dreams."
—Pytamun, initiate of Nef crop

name: Grixis Battlemage
text: Vitals of Grixis who eschew undeath must scrape and scratch to retain their mortality. The result is a breed of inventive mages.

name: Icatian Priest
text:
"May you be strong and valiant, to defeat the enemies of the pure."
—"Leitbur's Prayer"

name: Golgari Longlegs
text: Despite its enormous stature, it can fold itself into a tunnel with startling quickness, vanishing back into the undercity.

name: Elven Fortress
text:
"Burn it down, you say? Now *there's* a stupid idea. What do you suppose will become of those overhanging branches, hmm? And then what do you suppose will become of us?"
—Ivra Jursdotter

name: One with Nothing
text: When nothing remains, everything is equally possible.

name: Netcaster Spider
text: In the jungles of Tazeem, aerial assault is not always advantageous.

name: Demigod of Revenge
text:
"His laugh, a bellowing, deathly din, slices through the heavens, making them bleed."
—*The Seer's Parables*

name: Staunch Throneguard
text:
"Brago in his arrogance let the throne's defenses fall dormant. Our new queen is not so incautious."
—Livio, Oathsworn Sentinel

name: Hollowhead Sliver
text:
"Brilliant! They evolved away from energy-taxing brains and respond only to spinal reflex arcs from the hive mind."
—Rukarumel, field journal

name: Goblin Hero
text:
"When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero—everyone else just has to step back!"
—Biggum Flodrot, goblin veteran

name: Rhys the Redeemed
text: Whole again in honor and horn.

name: Parallel Lives
text: Neither Urza nor Mishra would admit it, but it was their similarities, rather than their differences, that drove their obsessive rivalry.

name: Deeproot Wayfinder
text: Her warning raced through the roots and rivers of Ixalan: prepare for war.

name: Volition Reins
text: "Glorifying the will is a mistake. It is simply one more force to be mastered."

name: Moorland Rescuer
text: "Hold on tight, little one. I'll get you to safety."

name: Roller Coaster
text: The Howling Mine moves faster than the speed of sound. The screams you hear are the group ahead of you.

name: Rage Reflection
text: Make every blow count.

name: Niveous Wisps
text: In a world devoid of sun, illumination comes from cheerless fires or the wandering spirits of the dead.

name: Vampire Interloper
text: He listens to every heartbeat, deciding which one of hundreds he will stop.

name: Decorated Champion
text: The oddsmakers hate him because every fight is a foregone conclusion. The crowd loves him for exactly the same reason.

name: Custodian of the Trove
text: Silumgar delights in repurposing the treasures of other clans to serve his own ravenous greed.

name: Diamond Mare
text: When it passes, rainbows follow.

name: Demystify
text: "The River Heralds carve spells into jade, hoping to steer us from our course. But what right do they have to keep us from that which once was ours?"

name: Coral Merfolk
text: The coral merfolk delight in wrestling with their foes, skinning them alive on the razor-sharp edges of their reef.

name: Fleetfoot Dancer
text: The Vanto Beatdown began as an improvised dance-battle at the Rose Room lounge. When word spread of how many were slain at the first event, it became a citywide obsession.

name: Dragonborn Looter
text: Erdur never thought of it as stealing. Treasure simply didn't deserve to be stuck underground where no one could admire it.

name: Druid of the Anima
text: Although the Anima herself remains at the Sacellum, her druids roam Naya, collecting mana bonds with every location in the world.

name: Angelic Benediction
text:
"Even in single combat, I am never alone."
—Rafiq of the Many

name: Smashing Success
text:
"Who said there's no profit in destruction?"
—Magda, brazen outlaw

name: Isleback Spawn
text: The more deadly the lake monster, the shorter the tale.

name: Amrou Scout
text: The people of Amrou were scattered by war and driven into hiding. Scouts maintain the beacon fires that signal "return" and "home."

name: Kozilek's Channeler
text:
"In the dark places of our world, something horrible is growing. I fear our foes may be more numerous than we had imagined."
—Nissa Revane

name: Chance for Glory
text: "It is not your time. The Legion still needs your blade."

name: Suq'Ata Firewalker
text:
"Comfortable even in a furnace? I've never met one who'd accept my wager."
—Talibah, embermage

name: Iona's Judgment
text: Beneath the gaze of angels, only the righteous may stand without fear.

name: Bring Down
text:
"Big, wicked, and not too smart. Poor thing never stood a chance against us, dear."
—Regna, to Krav

name: Rural Recruit
text: The Dawnhart survivors welcome recruits of all shapes and sizes.

name: Fascist Art Director
text: Dear Mr. and Mrs. Cranford, After careful analysis of Jeremy's vocational testing, I feel that he is best suited for a career in either torture or art direction.

name: Seismic Stomp
text:
"It is not in me to tread lightly."
—Ryda, geomancer

name: Rubbleback Rhino
text: The trouble started when a street urchin bet a goblin he could ride one until the clock on Shilbo's Tower struck thirteen.

name: Triumphant Reckoning
text: In a flash of a light and a burst of aether, despair turned to hope and defeat turned to victory.

name: Merciless Javelineer
text: "My mind is the calm in the midst of the storm, and my javelin the lightning."

name: Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
text: "I've sworn to protect the people from the horrors that would destroy them—even if those horrors are the angels themselves."

name: Kin-Tree Warden
text: "The amber of the tree and the blood of my veins are the same."

name: Blaze Commando
text: A true Boros commando only calls for reinforcements so they can clean up the mess.

name: Persistent Petitioners
text: ". . . the king's burning heart must be laid to rest at last. And furthermore . . ."

name: Wild Griffin
text: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

name: Crackling Emergence
text: The transition from spiritual to material is sometimes as shocking as it is beautiful.

name: Gideon's Company
text: "For the Legion! For Ravnica!"

name: Envelop
text:
"What you made will be unmade. What you learned will be unlearned. And when you're done, you will be undone."
—Ambassador Laquatus

name: Sengir Autocrat
text: "The penalty for idleness is death. The penalty for disputing the penalty is death."

name: First Come, First Served
text: Yotian soldiers hoped that one day R&D would make an artifact creature whose name starts with Z. And in their dreams, it's a 4/1.

name: Sunset Pyramid
text: Decades to build. Hours to demolish.

name: Regal Caracal
text: Oketra's closest viziers are known as her chosen, though others may have a better claim to that moniker.

name: Flamewright
text: Those who can't conspire, create.

name: Fugue
text:
"It's hard to keep our own troops from fleeing when he's like this. How can our foes possibly stand against him?"
—Field marshal for the Eastern Paladin

name: Disciples of Gix
text: "Machines feel no fear, no sorrow, no hunger—only glorious purpose, true and pure."

name: Mox Sapphire
text: 2016 North American Vintage Champion

name: Temple of Mystery
text: Genestealer Cults bide their time on Imperial worlds, spreading tendrils of corruption through the native population.

name: Bloodfire Expert
text: Some efreet abandon their homes in the volcanic Fire Rim to embrace the Jeskai Way and discipline their innate flames.

name: Furnace Host Charger
text: With barely a moment's warning, a one-giant avalanche crashed into Kaldheim's defenders.

name: Restoration Specialist
text: Dwarves' tools are priceless heirlooms handed down through generations.

name: Planar Bridge
text: Its power levels are off the charts.

name: Cloudshift
text:
"Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn."
—Elder Rimheit

name: Fit of Rage
text:
"Anger is fleeting; remorse is eternal."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Goldmaw Champion
text: "That was nothing. I once took down a frost giant with a spoon!"

name: Torch Drake
text:
"Drakes? Bah! Things that breathe don't interest me. It breathes *fire*, you say? Well, that's a different story!"
—Zataz, Izzet clockwork artificer

name: Mana Tithe
text:
「暴君の怒鳴り声は、最後の財宝がその手を逃げ出すと、次第に泣き言になりました。」
——退位させる者のグリモワール

name: Bellowing Elk
text:
"Their two-tone vocalization contains a whistle and a roar. Both mean get away."
—Vivien Reid

name: Elite Inquisitor
text: "No matter how many I kill, there are always more to hunt. It makes me smile just to think about it."

name: Dust to Dust
text:
"All this nonsense made by mages Rusts and crumbles through the ages."
—Aline Corralurn, "Inheritance"

name: Hurloon Shaman
text:
"I believe it when they say they're connected to the land—looks like somebody plowed her face."
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Vintara Snapper
text:
"The snapper is still when all else moves
And strikes when all are dozing."
—*Tales of the Vintara Forest*

name: Sylvan Tutor
text: The whole of creation stood transfixed, silenced by the weight of anticipation.

name: Bounty of Skemfar
text: Even war cannot dull Skemfar's beauty.

name: Geth's Grimoire
text: The book shrieks horribly until its cover is opened, granting the spirit inside a moment's rest from the painful stirrings of the book's contents.

name: Reknit
text:
"An axe may break upon a ribbon if the ribbon's will is the stronger."
—Awylla, elvish safewright

name: Boros Signet
text:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos

name: Meandering River
text: The river split into many channels as it flowed to the Halimar Sea. Few travelers could follow the same one twice.

name: Clown Extruder
text: Pietra's Mirthing Pod boasts an output that's hilarious and impressive—a real laugh a minute.

name: Cut // Ribbons
text: Better To Reign In Hell Than Serve In Heaven

name: Syr Carah, the Bold
text: "Duty and honor are reasons enough, but beating you will also be a pleasure."

name: Day of Destiny
text:
"If you wish to die as a hero, you must first live as one."
—General Takeno

name: Aliban's Tower
text:
"Those who hide in hollow towers would do well to remember the rain."
—Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

name: Llanowar Elves
text: Whenever the Llanowar elves gather the fruits of their forest, they leave one plant of each type untouched, considering that nature's portion.

name: Patron of the Arts
text: "It's okay. My mother owns the museum."

name: Tel-Jilad Lifebreather
text: "The Tangle loans you life. Spend it well."

name: Culling Mark
text: Hunt without Nylea's leave and you may find yourself the next quarry.

name: Flowering Lumberknot
text:
"It used to eat us trappers. Now it follows us around like some kind of hound dog."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Cenn's Enlistment
text: The more the scarier.

name: Ardenvale Paladin
text: "Even when hope is but a small flame fighting the night, I will serve the absent king."

name: Elvish Berserker
text: Their fury scatters enemies like a pile of dry leaves.

name: Critical Hit
text: "How do you kill what's already dead? *That's* how."

name: Balan, Wandering Knight
text: "I'm feeling generous. I'll let you choose the blade that slays you."

name: Kruphix's Insight
text: The horizon is tantalizing in both its uncertainty and its potential.

name: Wild Leotau
text:
"Leotau that were born wild make the best mounts. It's like riding a thunderstorm."
—Rafiq of the Many

name: Runehorn Hellkite
text: Inscribed with runes that predate the dragon, its horns possess their own ancient magic.

name: Argothian Treefolk
text: Haunting cries we hear in our dreams As the forest dies, a death from machines.

name: Sorin's Vengeance
text: "Cherish these last moments. Though your miserable life has come to nothing, I have given it a magnificent end."

name: Goblin King
text: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok. . . .

name: Gempalm Incinerator
text: "I've got this under control! Probably!"

name: Endless Detour
text: After diverting around the eleventh construction barrier, the taxi driver began to suspect she was being herded into a trap.

name: Voracious Wurm
text: Shepherds in Kalonia know it's better to let sheep roam than have them be trapped when the wurms are feeding.

name: Enshrined Memories
text:
"The race is run in the mind before the first step is taken."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Celestial Judgment
text:
"I was going to suggest silver, but a beam of pure angelic fury works even better."
—Rem Karolus, Fiendslayer

name: Whipkeeper
text: "If you don't hit your adversaries while they're down, they might get up again."

name: Cephalid Retainer
text: Cephalids whisper flattery in your ear, put jewels in your hand, spin dreams in your head, and stick knives in your back.

name: Satyr Firedancer
text: His heart, the coal; his eye, the spark; his hand, the whirling flame.

name: Sandsteppe Citadel
text: That which endures, survives.

name: Patagia Golem
text: Its wings were only designed to be ornamental, but it learned to use them on its own.

name: Sunstone
text:
"I dispute Relicbane's hysterical allegations, Commissioner, but it is true that these artifacts can be dangerous."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Servant of Tymaret
text: Life is most precious to those who have already lost it.

name: Beast Whisperer
text: "No symphony can compare to the melody of the ferrox's roar."

name: Smite the Monstrous
text: The changing of a single moment in Tarkir's past altered its future, rewriting its history.

name: Crumbling Necropolis
text: It's said the spirits of the drowned dead hang their lights from the shattered figureheads.

name: Trumpet Blast
text: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

name: Luxury Suite
text: The view is rivaled only by the decadence of the decor.

name: Precision Bolt
text: Ral had wielded lightning all his life but had never harnessed the power of an entire guild.

name: Cerulean Drake
text: Dragons avoid the bright colors of its wings.

name: Snap
text: Good riddance.

name: Fog
text:
"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."
—Lord Hilneth

name: Starlight Invoker
text: "The constellations form a tapestry of light that traces my people's broken history. Day and night, I feel their glittering presence calling me to weave the pattern whole."

name: Composite Golem
text: An artificer's experiment in cross-material engineering found its own purpose as an interpreter between cultures.

name: Spirit Summoning
text:
"Books are fantastic, but if you're really curious about the distant past, why not ask someone who was there?"
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Plow Under
text:
To renew the land, plow the land.
To destroy the land, do nothing.
—Druids' saying

name: Aether Helix
text: Some Quandrix mages prefer to study at twilight, watching their experimental equations trace glowing trails against the encroaching darkness.

name: Druid of the Sacred Beaker
text: Others try to be the best in their class. She strives to be the best in her phylum.

name: Baleful Force
text:
"As with any malevolent being, the trick is knowing how long you can afford to keep it in your service."
—Liliana Vess

name: Universal Automaton
text:
"Within minutes, the strange device was indistinguishable from the other on my workbench."
—Tocasia, journal entry

name: Jaheira, Friend of the Forest
text: "The Harpers' movement grows, but it needs sunlight to blossom. We can be that light."

name: Inspiring Leader
text: Your family needed a farmer, so you tilled. Your town needed a fighter, so you trained. When your people needed a leader, you knew what you had to do.

name: Black Dragon Gate
text: An imposing visage that looms over all who would rise above their station.

name: Disempower
text:
"Mangara is gone. Who among you doubts that I have taken his power?"
—Kaervek

name: Unexpectedly Absent
text: Once you've been dragged down the currents of time, you'll never quite trust your own permanence again.

name: Valeron Outlander
text: After years of honing her philosophy in debate with stubborn rhoxes, Niella was ready to convert any heathen.

name: Naturalize
text: The remains of ancient sky tyrants now feed the war-torn land.

name: Pious Wayfarer
text: Every footstep is a prayer, every road a temple.

name: Wall of Ice
text:
"And through the drifts the snowy cliffs/ Did send a dismal sheen:/ Nor shapes of men nor beasts we ken—/ The ice was all between."/
—Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Myr Superion
text: Two kinds of myr survive: the powerful and those that stay close by them.

name: Perhaps You've Met My Cohort
text: "I'm calling in a favor from an old friend. Once you're all dead, I'll consider the matter settled."

name: Bird Maiden
text: "Four things that never meet do here unite To shed my blood and to ravage my heart, A radiant brow and tresses that beguile And rosy cheeks and a glittering smile." —*The Arabian Nights*, trans. Haddawy

name: Odylic Wraith
text: By the time you've seen it, you won't remember that you did.

name: Innocent Traveler // Malicious Invader
text: "Aren't you going to offer me a drink?"

name: Swords to Plowshares
text:
"Peace hath her victories / No less renownd than war."
—John Milton, "To the Lord General Cromwell"

name: Candlekeep Sage
text: You love the smell of dusty tomes, the flicker of candles during late-night reading, and the old texts that bring to life the scholars who have come before.

name: Goblin Warrens
text:
"Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV*

name: Psychic Possession
text: "You will do the thinking for the both of us!"

name: Augur of Bolas
text: "There is no future save the one my master wills."

name: Spectral Guardian
text:
"A treasure to guard other treasures is worth the highest price."
—Mtai, Civic Guildmage

name: Soul Salvage
text: The first mistake the Grimnant knights made was bullying the owner of an Urborg corpse shop. Their second mistake was dying.

name: Thicket Basilisk
text: Moss-covered statues littered the area, a macabre monument to the basilisk's power.

name: Thantis, the Warweaver
text: She spins a web few can resist. Its sweet aroma sparks chaos in every heart.

name: Wojek Bodyguard
text: "By all means, take another step toward the captain."

name: Steam Catapult
text: "You idiots! Turn it around! Turn it around!"

name: Intimidation Bolt
text: For hours afterward, all they could see was the grisly silhouette of their master, screaming.

name: Lightning Serpent
text: Ice exploded into steam in its wake, hissing like a thousand serpents hailing their blazing master.

name: Belbe's Armor
text: It protects her from the ravages of Phyrexia and the savages of Rath.

name: Undercity Shade
text:
"Officially, there's nothing under that bridge to hunt . . . . Unofficially, my torchers are too terrified to go there after nightfall."
—Agrus Kos

name: Echoing Courage
text: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

name: "Rumors of My Death . . ."
text: By the fourth funeral, the mooks had gotten pretty good at them.

name: Long Road Home
text: The person who finishes a journey is rarely the same as the one who starts it.

name: Death Pits of Rath
text: As the sludge below began to shift and take shapes, Gerrard turned from the railing to Orim. "I suppose," he said, "it's a little too late for prayer, isn't it?"

name: Pressure Point
text: Poke a drake in the right place and it becomes as docile as a pet. Poke it in the wrong place and goodbye, hand.

name: The Wretched
text:
Once I had the strength but no wisdom; now I have the wisdom but no strength.
—Persian proverb

name: Golden-Scale Aeronaut
text: Johar had never heard of a pterodon. He just knew Saheeli's new invention let him fly circles around the invading monsters.

name: Magus of the Candelabra
text:
"What would Urza think, I wonder, if he could hear how the nature mages still snarl at his name, but venerate the work of his apprentice?"
—Teferi, to Jhoira

name: Entomb
text: A grave is the safest place to store ill-gotten treasures.

name: Halcyon Glaze
text:
"Earth to æther, window to wonder, stillness to the sky."
—Glazing incantation

name: Shrine Steward
text: From broken swords, the first Imperials forged a peaceful servant to tend the shrines of Eiganjo.

name: Giant Tortoise
text: In the coastal states of Jhess and Valeron, "tortoise" is a synonym for "stubborn."

name: Bloodbriar
text:
"There is a sourness here that I don't understand. When the land reaches out to me, I hesitate to reach back."
—Nissa Revane

name: Garrulous Sycophant
text:
"Marchesa's poison is delivered by more than daggers."
—Adriana, Captain of the Guard

name: Reef Shaman
text: With one gesture, she can render a thousand years of navigational charts obsolete.

name: Aeromoeba
text: Some clouds heed no wind.

name: Teleportation Circle
text:
"Hold on to your lunch!"
—Bartleby, gnome wizard

name: Priests of Norn
text:
"May our blessings sever the tongues of the forsaken."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Defend the Hearth
text: The defenders said not a word. Their shields, spears, and stances were warning enough.

name: Naturalize
text:
"Stone and thought fade into ruin. Only the wind in the leaves will endure."
—Tomb inscription

name: Frozen Shade
text:
"There are some qualities—some incorporate things,/ That have a double life, which thus is made/ A type of twin entity which springs/ From matter and light, evinced in solid and shade."
—Edgar Allan Poe, "Silence"

name: Opt
text: "It's easy to anticipate Captain Storm's orders: take the more dangerous route."

name: Rewind
text: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."

name: Miscast
text:
"Next time, try something more appropriate for your skill level."
—Barrin, Tolarian archmage

name: Wurm's Tooth
text: Jevna Nor lugged it around, bragging of his triumph over the wurm. Luckily, the tavern regulars didn't notice it was only a baby tooth.

name: Persistent Petitioners
text: ". . . we will no longer sit idly by, fearing for our lives! To that end . . ."

name: Shattered Sanctum
text: The Quietus Cult holds their grim ceremonies in the dark places where unburied dead litter the ground.

name: Northern Paladin
text: "Look to the north; there you will find aid and comfort." —The Book of Tal

name: Roving Keep
text:
"It wandered slowly across the landscape, calling out in its lonely voice, but no other castles answered its cries."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

name: Combat Professor
text: "Before Yovus was cut down at Pranticle Peak, she performed which maneuver? Anyone? From the reading?"

name: Wave of Terror
text: The sea of fear has endless depths.

name: Kinsbaile Skirmisher
text: "If a boggart even dares breathe near one of my kin, I'll know. And I'll not be happy."

name: Council's Judgment
text: "Our ruling is final."

name: Enter the Infinite
text:
"Don't just have an idea—have all of them."
—Niv-Mizzet

name: Sylvan Caryatid
text: Those who enter the copse never leave. They find peace there and take root, becoming part of the ever-growing grove.

name: Bedevil
text:
"It's easy to get taken in by the spectacle, to enjoy a bit of naughty amusement. But make no mistake: the Cult of Rakdos is a danger."
—Tajic

name: Ancient Craving
text:
"Knowledge demands sacrifice."
—Tojira, swamp queen

name: Scavenging Ooze
text: Some days, it just feels like trash. Other days, it could really go for some people.

name: Immortal Phoenix
text: Their fires burn quietly, allowing the phoenixes to glide silently through the canyon.

name: Shivan Harvest
text:
"The blood of your ancestors ran heavy on this soil. Now it's your turn to sacrifice for the glory of Shiv."
—Viashino heretic

name: Rite of Passage
text: Every scar is a lesson, every battle a test of what you have learned.

name: Reckless Amplimancer
text: "Linear growth? What am I, a first-year?"

name: Initiates of the Ebon Hand
text:
"Many Initiates sacrificed a hand to become full members of the Order."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. II*

name: Deus of Calamity
text:
"He bears the marks of ages upon his skin, memories of dreams long dead and best left buried."
—*The Seer's Parables*

name: Annul
text: The most effective way to destroy a spell is to ensure it was never cast in the first place.

name: Serene Master
text:
"A great warrior studies many different disciplines and takes the best from each."
—Gideon Jura

name: Aether Storm
text:
"I do love the rain . . . but this storm feels somehow wrong, Taysir."
—Daria

name: Crusading Knight
text: "My only dream is to destroy the nightmares of others."

name: Giant Spider
text: The giant spider's silk naturally resists gravity, almost weaving itself as it blankets the forest canopy.

name: Growth Spiral
text: Cyclical and spiral patterns are the specialty of the Gyre Clade, which seeks to revitalize the cycles of nature.

name: Hans Eriksson
text: "Nothing could ruin such a fine day, Saffi."

name: The Fair Basilica
text: In Elesh Norn's domain, the gospel of unity is the highest law.

name: Heightened Reflexes
text: Some crystals glow in the presence of monsters, forming a convenient warning system. Some monsters have learned to outrun the light.

name: Wall of Runes
text:
"It's strangely satisfying seeing an undead killing machine from another world standing befuddled in front of a wall of text."
—Lavinia

name: Shriek Raptor
text:
"That's no glint hawk. The skies have changed for the worse."
—Ria Ivor, White Sun partisan

name: Jund Charm
text: Jund pulses with raw energy, waiting for shamans to shape it into useful form.

name: Sanctum of Tranquil Light
text:
An untroubled mind
Dwells in perfect harmony
With a peaceful heart.

name: Skulking Killer
text: Olivia set a few villagers loose in the hedge maze as part of the evening's "entertainment."

name: Drag Down
text: The barbarians of Jund believe the bottomless tar pits extend forever into other, darker worlds.

name: Defensive Formation
text:
"Your enemies will pound upon the door of your defenses, but only you shall have the key, and it is the key of life."
—*Song of All*, canto 873

name: Hadana's Climb // Winged Temple of Orazca
text: Hadana seeks power in the service of peace.

name: Inverter of Truth
text: In its shadow, everything changed.

name: Needlebug
text: Near Tel-Jilad, the Tangle is almost silent, save for the trolls' chants and the skittering of needlebugs.

name: Chef's Kiss
text: "Cooked to perfection, of course."

name: Hoarding Recluse
text: To the spiders of Argoth, thopters were just bigger, crunchier flies.

name: Felidar Sovereign
text: Kneel before her Impurrial Meowjesty, Pawlina von Whiskerface III. It makes it much easier to give her pets.

name: Soul of Magma
text:
"In every other mind, the battle was lost. General Takeno alone was not touched by despair. Drawing his blade, he was attack and rallying cry in one."
—*Battle of Akagi River: A Survivor's Tale*

name: Gutless Ghoul
text:
"Make sure those wretches feed only upon the plagued. The blood of the healthy is reserved for me alone."
—Garza Zol, plague queen

name: Research Assistant
text: There are many words and phrases that can cause an experienced wizard to tremble in fear. Chief among them is "oops."

name: Fervent Charge
text: Crovax was nearly buried beneath the weight of his opponents.

name: Bala Ged Recovery // Bala Ged Sanctuary
text:
"Always have a backup plan."
—Doral, Bala Ged guide

name: Elvish Visionary
text: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.

name: Lightning Dart
text: Broken and punctured by dozens of Phyrexian portals, the angry sky began to spit lightning back at the world.

name: Borderland Ranger
text: "There's only one route from Kessig into Stensia. Unless you come with me."

name: Justice Strike
text:
"Those who show no mercy to the weak deserve no mercy from the strong."
—Firemane Kavrova

name: Chandra's Pyreling
text:
"I think Chandra just wanted something to blame random scorch marks on."
—Jace Beleren

name: Wrath of God
text: Each side prayed for the gods to smite the other. In the end, all their prayers were answered.

name: Sea Sprite
text:
"No one can catch what won't be caught."
—Kakra, Sea Troll

name: Grisly Spectacle
text:
"Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head."
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Impulse
text: "You call it luck. I call it preparation."

name: Thornscape Familiar
text: Blessed with many options, Thornscape masters favor scarabs as familiars.

name: Alloy Myr
text: With or without witnesses, the suns continued their prismatic dance.

name: Skittering Horror
text:
"This monstrosity will do—for now."
—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

name: Springleaf Drum
text: After trying mudskippers for an afternoon, Scratch decided that crickcarp made the best noise.

name: Fuming Effigy
text: Some spirits share ancient wisdom. Others just get mad you touched their stuff.

name: Gutterbones
text:
"Down here, things don't stay dead."
—Lavinia

name: Akki Ronin
text:
"Carry the heat of the furnace in your steel, and never let it fade."
—Keni-Keni, akki smith

name: Midnight Guard
text:
"When you're on watch, no noise is harmless and no shadow can be ignored."
—Olgard of the Skiltfolk

name: Armored Griffin
text: When an order for griffin barding comes in, blacksmiths prepare their forges for months of exacting work. They know griffins always detect imperfections and never haggle.

name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
text: |su,porkFst,GEyts,LecchuZFFGKMEDEauDut. |be,Gyyts,pFnenBePe,Qe,fyrshuZFGKDugSeDZnepyt.

name: Conch Horn
text: Even the most skilled of modern mages only partially understand the Conch Horn's awesome powers.

name: Arcum's Sleigh
text:
"With the proper equipment and caution, one can travel anywhere."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Brood Sliver
text: Within weeks, more slivers nested in Otaria than ever existed on Rath.

name: Order of the White Shield
text:
"Shall we turn away a worthy soul because his parents were peasants? I think not."
—Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Take to the Streets
text: No institution, however grand, can withstand the collective will of the people.

name: Mistral Singer
text: "I sang of storms, there came a squall. I sang of waves, the seas grew tall. I sang of love, but no voice called."

name: Fully Grown
text:
"One day I woke up and knew I had nothing left to teach her. So now I ride on her shoulders and follow where she leads."
—Gustin, wildbonder

name: Juniper Order Advocate
text:
"In these troubled times, we alone carry the hope of reconciliation between Elf and Human."
—Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order advocate

name: Dauthi Cutthroat
text: In their twisted logic, to empty the shadow world is to escape it.

name: Murmuring Mystic
text: Rumors float through the city like crows, alighting on citizens seemingly at random.

name: Hydroform
text:
"While the sea may be our home, the sky is our destiny."
—Prime Speaker Zegana

name: Eidolon of Inspiration
text:
"Agios was felled by a minotaur's blade, but I swear I have seen him since—in the midst of battle, wherever help is needed most."
—Phrokos, soldier of Akros

name: Firescreamer
text: In the dark, it's nearly invisible—until it exhales.

name: Jetpack Janitor
text: "'Carol, blast those aliens.' 'Carol, transport these concessions.' No one cares that today is my birthday."

name: Temporary Lockdown
text: "Any one of us could be compromised," said Karn. "No one leaves until we know who can be trusted."

name: Trash Bin
text: Yet another trash uncommon.

name: Beast in Show
text: "A stunning example of the breed! Flawless plating, ruthlessly efficient death stroke, and an excellent drool shimmer."

name: Clear Shot
text:
"What worked to bring down angels will do the same for these horrors."
—Rem Karolus, Slayer of Eldrazi

name: One-Clown Band
text: Programmed to play more than seventy instruments and only one song.

name: Feast of the Unicorn
text:
"Some delicacies are not to be savored, save by the callous."
—Baron Sengir

name: Sea Drake
text: Highly territorial, they often attack boats whose colors too closely resemble those of other drakes.

name: Axebane Stag
text:
"When the spires have burned and the cobblestones are dust, he will take his rightful place as king of the wilds."
—Kirce, Axebane guardian

name: Mark of the Vampire
text:
"Through your sacrifice of self, you become holy. Through your strength, all will be saved."
—From the Rite of Redemption

name: Kolaghan Monument
text: Kolaghan has no lasting home, but her disciples leave relics to mark her conquests.

name: Bayou
text: 2021 Legacy Champion

name: Vampire Revenant
text:
"A thick fog obscures the port of Leor, but it's not thick enough to muffle the screams."
—Admiral Beckett Brass

name: Disentomb
text:
"If we've run out of warm bodies, then cold bodies will have to do."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen

name: Devout Witness
text: The Cho-Arrim fought Mercadia's decadence with more than just swords.

name: Righteous Cause
text:
"Until the world unites in vengeful fury and Phage is destroyed, I will not stay my hand."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

name: Ravenous Sailback
text: Converter beasts were sent to ensnare as many of Ixalan's dinosaurs as possible. Many of them were converted themselves—into snacks.

name: Fruition
text: Come to these woods and suffer no pain; you've burdens to lose and new life to gain.

name: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
text: |Fs,PccYpLZFst,suCEtCpunAodrm/wne%mfyrshuZFkKne%ym,CpunAodrm.

name: Infantry Veteran
text: "This scar? From a zombie's teeth. This scar? From a barbarian's axe. That scar? I don't talk about that one."

name: Pyroclastic Hellion
text:
"The difference between a hellion and a volcano is that volcanoes don't get hungry."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Razor Hippogriff
text: She incubates her eggs in gold and mana.

name: Hard Cover
text: A good book is a refuge, but a great book is a fortress.

name: Bitterbow Sharpshooters
text:
"Remember, brother, the eyes are always vulnerable."
"I never forgot."

name: Warren Instigator
text: There is always a rabble to be roused.

name: Soltari Trooper
text:
"Dauthi blood is soltari wine."
—Soltari Tales of Life

name: Syr Gwyn, Hero of Ashvale
text: Squires throughout the realm aspire to her mix of panache and martial prowess.

name: Orcish Lumberjack
text:
"How did I ever let myself get talked into this project?"
—Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

name: Guan Yu's 1,000-Li March
text: "He [Guan Yu] covered the ground on a thousand-*li* horse; / With dragon blade he took each pass by force."

name: The Hive
text: Mouths and wings beyond numbering, but a single mind to guide them.

name: Power Armor
text:
"Great peril demands formidable weaponry."
—Urza

name: Elven Palisade
text:
"Volrath is not the only one who can shape this world to serve him."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Brute Strength
text: It's not the size of the rock. It's how badly you want to lift it.

name: Flow of Ideas
text:
"Beware the merrows, whose envy and covetousness surpasses even that of the ravenous whirlpools where they dwell."
—*The Book of Other Folk*

name: Raiders' Spoils
text:
"To conquer is to eat."
—Edicts of Ilagra

name: Priest of Iroas
text: "Even my last breath will be a blow struck for Iroas."

name: Wilderness Hypnotist
text:
"I felt as if I were moving in brackish water, as if I were drowning, even though I knew I stood on dry land."
—Dindun of Kulrath Mine

name: Conquering Manticore
text: It speaks no commands but is always obeyed.

name: Arboreal Grazer
text:
"We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world."
—Vivien Reid

name: Knight of the Tusk
text: "Horse? Who needs a horse?"

name: Kite Shield
text:
"To my sword I owe my glory, but to my shield I owe my life."
—Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

name: Scathe Zombies
text:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Teferi's Sentinel
text:
"Long ago, I enchanted an army of statues to guard Zhalfir. My homeland is gone, but its protectors remain."
—Teferi

name: Boil
text:
"The fishers will throw out their nets and draw them back filled with dust."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Smoldering Efreet
text: The efreet are drawn to the Kaisham Wanderers, a loosely organized Jeskai school where trickery is employed to challenge the status quo and upend the belief systems of others.

name: Gravedigger
text: Oddly, no one questioned the Cabal's wisdom in hiring a zombie to work at the cemetery.

name: Kjeldoran Knight
text:
"Those who do not ride the wind on Aesthir still command loyalty and respect."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Chameleon Blur
text:
"Sometimes the best plan is neither fighting nor running."
—Freyalise

name: Crippling Blight
text:
"Still alive? No matter. I'll leave you as a warning to others who would oppose me."
—Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter

name: Pendelhaven
text:
"This is the forest primeval. The murmuring pines and the hemlocks . . . Stand like Druids of eld."
—Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, "Evangeline"

name: Zendikar Farguide
text: Expeditions follow the paths it leaves in its wake.

name: Tasigur's Cruelty
text: The cruelest tortures leave no mark upon the flesh.

name: Wind-Scarred Crag
text: Serra was a symbol of hope to Dominaria, so Norn defiled her temples with monuments to Phyrexia.

name: Orcish Oriflamme
text: The orcs' banner sends a clear message: "Stand against us and meet the same fate as the goblins."

name: Access Tunnel
text: Oriq agents stick to the dark corners of Arcavios, unseen yet ever-present.

name: Scatter Ray
text: Mishra's army demanded the secrets of the Third Path. Hurkyl's followers graciously showed them.

name: Carom
text: Her enemy's strength is her own.

name: Flowstone Blade
text:
"Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight."
—Karn, silver golem

name: Lingering Mirage
text: Birds frozen in flight. Sea turned to glass. Tolaria hidden in a mirror.

name: Geist of the Moors
text:
"The battle is won. There's work to be done. / The Blessed Sleep must wait. / A fiend is about. It stalks the devout. / I'll save them from my fate."
—"The Good Geist's Vow"

name: Death-Hood Cobra
text:
"Size alone does not guarantee survival."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Ninth Bridge Patrol
text: The Consulate keeps watch at each of the eleven bridges to ensure that the market remains a haven for commerce, not for con artists.

name: Riverglide Pathway // Lavaglide Pathway
text:
"The wind knows the way. Just let it carry you there."
—Amandi, kitesail expert

name: Wily Goblin
text: Goblins climb and swing with ease, whether through a pirate ship's rigging or a tree's branches.

name: Broodhunter Wurm
text: The native creatures of Zendikar have adapted to live under rocks and crawl through underbrush in order to avoid the most voracious predators. The Eldrazi have yet to make such adjustments.

name: Slashing Tiger
text:
"Unless you enter the tiger's lair, you cannot get hold of the tiger's cubs."
—Sun Tzu, *Art of War* (trans. Giles)

name: Gruesome Fate
text:
"You were keen enough to sink your fangs into us, vampire! And now you're afraid of a few little nibbles?"
—Udvil "Ratty" Ratlock

name: Agent of the Shadow Thieves
text: Your skill, dexterity, and moral flexibility make you a valuable asset to your guild.

name: Grizzly Bears
text: They've got claws as long as your arm. And they're grouchy. Really, really grouchy.

name: Typhoid Rats
text: When Tasigur sent his ambassadors to the Abzan outpost, the true envoys were not the naga but the infectious rats they carried with them.

name: So Tiny
text: His sword sounded like a silver chime on the glass jar, and the sprite laughed with delight.

name: Sage of the Falls
text: Ask a merfolk even a simple question and the answer is a journey far beyond the known.

name: Fates' Reversal
text: A doom denied—or, perhaps, delayed.

name: Insist
text:
"Finesse is no match for brute force."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Knight of the Kitchen Sink
text: "Whew. For a minute, I thought I'd forgotten the juicer."

name: Trenching Steed
text: The Keldons took several of the steeds as trophies of war. They'd never seen such a light beast stand so firm.

name: Zeriam, Golden Wind
text:
"For their courage, the griffins were granted domain over all the desert skies."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Soldevi Simulacrum
text: They look human— until they bleed.

name: Nirkana Assassin
text: Nirkana assassins craft incurable concoctions by mixing basilisk marrow and deathwillow sap with the vital fluids of a dozen other poisonous species.

name: Blood Pact
text: Griselbrand's defeat did not mark the end of the Skirsdag cult. They simply turned their worship to the next demon to emerge from the shadows bearing offers of power.

name: Shade's Breath
text: The grim business of the Coliseum casts long shadows.

name: Ravenous Necrotitan
text: Some of Sheoldred's goliaths spread the glory of Phyrexia. Others just eat.

name: Awesome Presence
text: "At the core of all power is raw passion." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Harvest Mage
text: "Why should one limit oneself to the resources at hand?"

name: Moment of Truth
text: On the precipice of eternity, Elspeth made a choice. The fight would not end without her.

name: Lifegift
text:
"Walk the world and you'll find your soul; search your soul and you'll discover the world."
—Diary of Azusa

name: Savai Triome
text: Broad prairies feed the human sanctuary of Drannith and conceal a network of caverns where giant cats make their dens.

name: Cardboard Carapace
text: . . . that exciting . . . about . . .

name: Winged Boots
text: Get carried away.

name: Glaze Fiend
text: Before the zealots of the Ethersworn came to power, Esper illusionists dreamed up creations to mimic a variety of substances.

name: Akki Scrapchomper
text: The Furnace Host found great value in the chaotic ingenuity of Kamigawa's akki and allowed willing converts to "experiment" however they saw fit.

name: Dark Ritual
text:
"Praise Nurgle! For the plague to have progressed so quickly, truly his blessing must be upon us!"
—Ku'gath Plaguefather

name: Anaba Shaman
text:
"The shamans? Ha! They are craven cows not capable of true magic."
—Irini Sengir

name: Warrior's Oath
text:
"If I fail, my head is yours."
—Warrior's oath common during the Three Kingdoms period

name: Ogre Battledriver
text: Ogres are driven by passion, rage, and another ogre standing behind them with a whip.

name: Khenra Scrapper
text: "There is no tomorrow, so hold nothing back."

name: Igneous Golem
text:
"The creature rose from the mountain, its body weeping fire."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Clearwater Pathway // Murkwater Pathway
text:
"Just when the river seems most peaceful, suddenly you round a bend and hurtle down a waterfall."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

name: Durable Coilbug
text:
"I've seen them survive lava, trampling, and a moloch's digestive system. They just roll out and get on with their lives!"
—Gannet, Skysail zoologist

name: Deflection
text:
Up and down,
over and through,
back around—
the joke's on you.

name: Steamfloggery
text: Goblins only have two speeds: hard loaf and full-on hammer freak-out.

name: Dispel
text: The Jwari winds undo reality as easily as they scatter a pile of leaves.

name: Dutiful Return
text:
"We have a word for enemies too mutilated for military service: furniture."
—Taigam, Sidisi's Hand

name: Adventurous Impulse
text:
「彼女の探検は、すべての探検と同様に、予期せぬ方向への小さな一步から始まった。」
—-探検者の遺言

name: Angelic Wall
text:
"The Ancestor protects us in ways we can't begin to comprehend."
—Mystic elder

name: Despoil
text: Nothing could grow where the vile smoke had been, and no one could breathe it and live.

name: Tymaret, the Murder King
text: His memories remained in the Underworld, but his cruelty crossed the Rivers with him.

name: Shattered Ego
text:
"You can't even fathom the depths of your own insignificance."
—Geyadrone Dihada

name: Alabaster Mage
text:
"We hold sacred the powers of light and life. Truth and honor are our greatest weapons."
—Alabaster creed

name: Wrath of God
text: Watch the skies.

name: Funeral Rites
text: Funerary masks help the newly dead resist the erosion of memory and identity in the Underworld.

name: Volcanic Hammer
text: Cast the weight as though it were a die, to see a rival's fate.

name: Deathbloom Gardener
text: "I can provide the Coalition with poisons that will break down Phyrexian machinery as easily as they stop the heart."

name: Orochi Ranger
text:
"The young come to me, confused. They have been taught to respect the kami, and now they must fight them? I do not know what to say."
—Sachi, to her father

name: Beloved Beggar // Generous Soul
text: As long as evil threatens his town, the Blessed Sleep can wait.

name: Bloodstone Cameo
text:
"The stone whispers to me of dragon's fire and darkness. I wish I'd never pried it from the figurehead of that sunken Keldon longship."
—Isel, master carver

name: Hijack
text: Trapped on Ixalan, the Planeswalker Angrath is the only minotaur sailing the seas. No matter how many ships he captures, he cannot break free.

name: Lightning Prowess
text: "Undead flesh is dry and papery. A single spark and 'poof.' No more ghoul."

name: Stirge
text:
"I will never complain about mosquitos again."
—Imoen

name: Thoughtweft Gambit
text: The kithkin mind-bond is even tighter in Shadowmoor, reinforcing the unity of their community to the point of xenophobia.

name: Forest
text: The lights in the cavern glow and fade, glow and fade in a rhythm that must have a deeper meaning, if only you can figure it out.

name: Swallow Whole
text:
"World's better with one fewer poacher in it."
—Winota, heartbonder

name: Puffer Extract
text: The puffer's flesh is the deadliest in the sea—and therefore the most useful.

name: Elderleaf Mentor
text: "Our ancestors grew complacent in their divinity, allowing their lessers to topple them. Never again."

name: Aerial Predation
text: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.

name: Grotesque Demise
text:
"A debtor's soul has little value, except as a warning to others who might consider defaulting on their loans."
—Ubea, Orzhov ministrant

name: Burgeoning
text: Given time, a single seed can sprout a mighty forest.

name: Loam Dryad
text:
"I've never known dryads to suffer visitors in their woods. Beware the Ulvenwald when she welcomes you."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Lu Bu, Master-at-Arms
text: "Dong Zhuo's man, Lu Bu, warrior without peer, / Far surpassed the champions of his sphere."

name: Fleet Swallower
text: "Captain, I think that island is following us."

name: Wayfarer's Bauble
text: Anrakyr the Traveler awoke from his slumber with a singular goal: to rebuild a united Necron galaxy.

name: Beacon of Creation
text: A chorus of life heralds the arrival of Mirrodin's final sun.

name: Negate
text:
「十分な力で対戦相手の呪文を打ち砕けば、それで自信も打ち砕けるでしょう。」
—-障害の秘本、傍注

name: Simic Charm
text:
"We measure our progress in heartbeats."
—Prime Speaker Zegana

name: Plague Fiend
text: As the strange plague ravaged Jamuraa, the fiends multiplied.

name: Dimir Guildgate
text:
"You've found this place only because you were summoned. Pray you're worthy of the invitation."
—Etrata

name: Mechanized Production
text:
"Give me eight walkers, I'll give you the city."
—Dovin Baan

name: Deepfire Elemental
text:
"There are deep, deep places in this world that have long burned hot with little regard for the whitening of the earth's thin skin."
—Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper

name: Deepglow Skate
text: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.

name: Mourning
text: Barrin waited for the nausea to pass or for Urza to say something else. He waited in vain.

name: Windgrace's Judgment
text: Not all who remember Urza do so with fondness.

name: Rime Tender
text: "Fools view winter as the season of death because they cannot see the life underneath."

name: Hinterland Harbor
text:
"Our ancestors brought down a Phyrexian portal ship, then built our town on its hull. We're pretty proud of that."
—Alene of Riverspan

name: Shepherd of the Flock // Usher to Safety
text: Not all heroes carry swords.

name: Piston Sledge
text: Only the goblins could make a simple machine so complex.

name: Unquestioned Authority
text:
"Only the Ancestor should be revered."
—Mystic heretic

name: Knight Errant
text: Knights are quick to pledge their loyalty and even quicker to charge into battle.

name: Revelsong Horn
text: A deflated sigh breathed into the horn emerges as an inspiring melody.

name: Lamplighter of Selhoff
text: For stitchers and necro-alchemists, it's important that work can continue at all hours.

name: Evacuation
text: The first step of every exodus is from the blood and the fire onto the trail.

name: Wydwen, the Biting Gale
text: In a world of bright, cloudless skies, she is the dark storm on the horizon.

name: Frost Walker
text:
"As the clans carved out their territories, we saw allies where the Mardu saw only obstacles."
—Yasova Dragonclaw

name: Kaysa
text: Kaysa speaks as the Elder Druid, but the Yavimaya recognizes only one voice: its own.

name: Time and Tide
text:
"Time may heal all wounds, but what heals time?"
—Teferi

name: Banishing Slash
text: "In the name of Kyodai, begone!"

name: Devastate
text:
"You're willing to die for your homeland. I'm willing to kill for it."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: War Oracle
text: "When you are felled by my mace, you shall know it was divine fate."

name: Phyrexian Obliterator
text: Take everything from them. Lives. Flesh. The very gorund they walk on. Only then will your victory be compleat.

name: Ghirapur Gearcrafter
text: The metal must be pure. The hand must be steady. The product must be perfect.

name: Anrakyr the Traveller
text: "Though it may take an eternity, I will see the myriad dynasties united once more."

name: Niblis of the Mist
text:
"Not even a roaring fire could thaw the chill it put in my heart."
—Vonn, geist-trapper

name: Bathe in Light
text: "Truth shines even in darkness. Those who march on the side of truth walk always in righteous light."

name: Levitation
text: The horses of Scytha's army must be well trained. A thrown rider would fall miles before meeting the ground.

name: Sunmane Pegasus
text: Chosen by Heliod, Daxos approached the pegasus without fear, and rode it without saddle or reins.

name: Resolute Archangel
text: Cut it down, bury it in snow, put it to the torch. The rose will still bloom again.

name: Monastery Mentor
text: "One path. Many feet."

name: Elven Warhounds
text:
"If a creature is dumb enough to love you for leashing it, why would you want to follow its lead?"
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Braidwood Cup
text:
"I think it no accident that every civilized people has discovered the art of distillation."
—Rofellos of Llanowar

name: Seek the Horizon
text:
"The horizon is the perpetual ideal, the constant promise of hope."
—Nissa Revane

name: Storm Crow
text:
"It tells you that the worst is coming. Do you listen?"
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Information Booth
text:
"When I arrived, I was looking for the costume shop. But when I left, I'd learned what I was really looking for: myself. Five stars."
—*Salzon's Ride Review*

name: Skycloud Expanse
text: Most denizens of an Imperial hive city live and die without ever setting foot inside the towering skyscrapers of the ruling class.

name: Heart-Piercer Bow
text: Designed by an ancient artificer, the finest Mardu bows are carved from dragon bone and strung with the wind itself.

name: Gargoyle Sentinel
text:
"Do not mistake a quiet rampart for one that is unguarded. Some things stir only when they need to."
—Bonovar, siege commander

name: Sphinx of the Chimes
text: "I've dreamt of the future, Isperia. Danger is on the horizon. You must heed my warning."

name: Spark Elemental
text: Vulshok shamans summon spark elementals to burn paths through thick underbrush—or through goblin salvage squads.

name: Unstable Shapeshifter
text:
"In a world of untruths, the living lie rules."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Khenra Charioteer
text:
"We do not swerve."
—Tah-crop charioteer motto

name: Selhoff Occultist
text: "The mist whispers to those who know it to be more than a mundane fog."

name: Shadowfeed
text:
"The future is a snake, devouring your life backwards through time. And when you die, believe me, it doesn't stop feeding."
—Sedris, the Traitor King

name: Goblin Bookie
text:
"Glok loved bets! He'd sit in the bar all night an' laugh an' laugh. Hey—he still owes me."
—Squee, goblin casino hand

name: Cyclone Sire
text: The rampaging Roil creates life out of the most volatile elements.

name: Cavern Thoctar
text: Natives of Naya know better than to loiter near the mouth of a cave. Two glowing red eyes and the stench of foul breath are all the warning you're likely to get.

name: Stronghold Taskmaster
text:
"With the completion of each joyous task, we are closer to Yawgmoth's divine vision."
—Stronghold architect, journal

name: Wu Elite Cavalry
text: At the second battle of Ruxu, the brave Wu general Gan Ning raided Cao Cao's camp of 400,000 men with only 100 cavalry. Not a single man or horse was lost.

name: Perilous Myr
text: To Mirrodin, an explosive. To Phyrexia, a missionary.

name: Phase Dolphin
text:
"You've never had to trust your breath to an inhuman creature who could crush you at its whim, and I truly feel sorry for you."
—Eagan, seabonder

name: Aggravate
text:
"Barbarians! They burned my favorite chair! We'll kill them all!"
—Anje Falkenrath

name: Transmutation
text:
"You know what I was,/ You see what I am: change me, change me!"
—Randall Jarrell, *The Woman at the Washington Zoo*

name: Searing Barrage
text: It emerged from the coldest depths of Lochmere only to face the fires of Irencrag.

name: Dimir Keyrune
text: A key that slips through every lock.

name: Workshop Assistant
text: Sometimes the smallest things make the biggest difference.

name: Astral Confrontation
text: "After voyaging all the way through the Astral Sea with my life hanging by a silver thread, fighting the mind flayer was the easy part."

name: Ashiok's Skulker
text:
"Fear writhes and whispers in the shadows of your mind. It is the enemy you always knew would come."
—Ashiok

name: Benthic Behemoth
text: The sea has many secrets, but some are too big to be kept.

name: Skophos Warleader
text: The minotaur polis of Skophos boasts grand temples to the god of slaughter.

name: Jalum Tome
text: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.

name: Toxicrene
text: It emits a stinking cloud composed of millions of nascent microscopic organisms, each possessing a fragment of predatory sentience.

name: Mire Triton
text: Caught between life and death, between land and sea, between thought and oblivion.

name: Dauntless Escort
text: Elspeth's squires do not seek advancement. For them, no knightly glory could surpass the glory of serving their champion.

name: Slaughterhouse Bouncer
text: A Rakdos party is a flop if anyone lives to talk about it.

name: Phyrexian Arena
text: An audience of one with the malice of thousands.

name: Juniper Order Advocate
text:
"In these troubled times, we alone carry the hope of reconciliation between Elf and Human."
—Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

name: Buried Ruin
text: History has buried its treasures deep.

name: Reckless Pangolin
text:
"A pangolin's power grows with its speed. Strike when you have the chance!"
—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

name: Cloudblazer
text: All the aether charts in the world can't compete with the trained eye of a talented scout.

name: Bloodsky Berserker
text: "Who's next?!"

name: Cultivate
text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Obsessive Astronomer
text: "Sleep? I can sleep when I'm dead!"

name: Squirrel-Powered Scheme
text: Lucinda didn't know which she enjoyed most: the science, the squirrels, or the maniacal laughter.

name: Natural Order
text:
「自然は残酷でも親切でもない。感情ではなく、必要性に応じて機能するのよ。」
――ウィザーブルームの魔道生徒、ダイナ

name: Valiant Rescuer
text: The floating city of Skysail has two rules: don't leave your crewmates behind, and don't mess with the guardrails.

name: Trusted Advisor
text: Some of Minamo's students claimed he was as old as the knowledge he dispensed.

name: Crossway Vampire
text: "Do not flatter Fate. It did not guide you into my clutches tonight. That was all my doing."

name: Dramatic Finale
text: The enraptured audience barely noticed their programs were suddenly blank.

name: Yavimaya Ants
text:
"Few natural forces are as devastating as hunger."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Moderation
text: Intent: This card prevents you from casting multiple spells per turn but rewards you for your restraint.

name: Scathe Zombies
text:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Abyssal Persecutor
text: His slaves crave death more than they desire freedom. He denies them both.

name: Rag Dealer
text:
"After General Takeno found the Oathkeeper amidst the bamboo marshes, more scavengers braved the swamp's nezumi, oni, and kami in hopes of glory."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Geist of the Archives
text: After reading the final words, it turns back to the first page and begins again.

name: Blitz of the Thunder-Raptor
text: The sound of Vadrok's gigantic wings is ominous. But the true terror is when they fall silent.

name: Sunscape Familiar
text: The spirits of fallen battlemages can serve their guilds as familiars by joining with any physical form.

name: Soul-Guide Gryff
text: It conducts the souls of the righteous to their blessed rest and the spirits of the evil to justice.

name: Wee Champion
text: Nobody has ever won the bear, but then again, nobody has ever wanted it quite as much.

name: Duskmantle, House of Shadow
text: In a space where there is no room, in a structure that was never built, meets the guild that doesn't exist.

name: Fortify
text:
"Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Lifecraft Cavalry
text:
"I do not ask you to be tame. I only ask you to be true."
—Rishkar, Peema renegade

name: First Response
text:
"There's never a good time for a disaster or an attack. That's why we're here."
—Oren, militia captain

name: Sphinx-Bone Wand
text: Its host's final curse lies captured within.

name: Sage's Knowledge
text:
"Those who know do not talk. Those who talk do not know."
—Lao Tzu, *Tao Te Ching*
(trans. Feng and English)

name: Agent of Stromgald
text:
"The 'fabled' Order of Stromgald is cast to the four winds, lost for all time. I, for one, give them no thought."
—General Varchild

name: Lost in a Labyrinth
text: Even those who leave the labyrinth never escape it, forever dreaming of their time trapped within.

name: Rootwater Hunter
text:
"Bitter water, vicious wave;
Shadow-cold shallows, root-made maze.
Home's angry embrace."
—*Rootwater Saga*

name: Locthwain Paladin
text: "I will find the king if I have to ride from summer to winter and back again."

name: Sunspear Shikari
text: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

name: Asha's Favor
text: As his new wings lifted him high above Bant, Taric felt his earthly aspirations transform into heavenly resolve.

name: Words of Waste
text:
"Terror corrupts order and paralyzes instinct."
—*Volume III, The Book of Decay*

name: Serra's Embrace
text:
"With one breath, the newborn angel took to the air . . . and the world sighed."
—*The Book of Serra*

name: Bog Wraith
text: 'Twas in the bogs of Cannelbrae My mate did meet an early grave 'Twas nothing left for us to save In the peat-filled bogs of Cannelbrae.

name: Mox Amber
text: A moment in time made tangible, it has the power to realize epic visions.

name: Striking Sliver
text: You're too busy recoiling in fear to realize that it's already hit you.

name: Thoughtseize
text: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

name: Avarice Totem
text: Souls and steel, the essence of Mirrodin. Memnarch lacks one but has an abundance of the other.

name: Righteous Blow
text:
"The Golgari believe they should be given what they deserve. On this we agree."
—Tajic

name: Gisela, the Broken Blade // Brisela, Voice of Nightmares
text: She now hears only Emrakul's murmurs.

name: Pious Evangel // Wayward Disciple
text: ". . . and I will prove my devotion."

name: Unknown Shores
text:
"Just imagine what's waiting around the bend. Adventure. Discovery. Riches for the taking. This is why I sail."
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Elvish Bard
text: Helplessly drawn in, the bard's enemies quickly find there's more than song to be found.

name: Lady Evangela
text:
"When milady was young, the sight of a rainbow would fill her soul with peace. As she grew, she learned to share her rapture with others."
—Lady Gabriella

name: Aggressive Urge
text: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.

name: Tranquil Expanse
text: Despite the chaos of the Roil and the devastation of the Eldrazi, Zendikar is a world of breathtaking beauty.

name: Rampaging Growth
text: When they had the house checked for bugs, they didn't think big enough.

name: Eye Collector
text: "Lord Rankle will see you now—all he asks is a small token of tribute."

name: Gloomwidow
text: When gloomwidows mature, they abandon venom in favor of massive webs that span the eaves of cliffs.

name: Shimmering Grotto
text: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.

name: Forked Bolt
text:
"Play no favorites. Everybody dies."
—Sparkmage saying

name: Explore
text:
"I will never run out of new oceans to explore or new sea-dwellers to embrace as my own."
—Kiora

name: Rampage of the Valkyries
text: "This is a foul place. Cleanse it."

name: Despondent Killbot
text: "click . . . click . . . beep . . . whirrrr . . ."

name: Aerial Boost
text: "Ha! You missed!"

name: Rowan Treefolk
text: One of the forest's best protectors is the forest itself.

name: Tar Pitcher
text:
"Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

name: Cleansing Ray
text:
"The sun creates, sustains, and consumes so it can create again."
—Caparocti Sunborn

name: Maestros Initiate
text:
"How far are you willing to go for your family, cleanblade?"
—Lord Xander

name: Hellfire
text:
"High on a throne of royal state . . . insatiate to pursue vain war with heav'n."
—John Milton, Paradise Lost

name: Firestorm Hellkite
text:
"If it can scar the sky with fire, do not share its destination."
—Mwani, Mtenda herder

name: Stonework Packbeast
text: It will happily carry home your treasure or drag you back to civilization, as circumstances demand.

name: Mercadia's Downfall
text: With an explosion that shook the foundation of the city, the *Weatherlight* burst from the underground hangar.

name: Crypt Sliver
text:
"Death couldn't contain the slivers. What made us think we could?"
—Riptide Project researcher

name: Culling Sun
text:
"Who truly runs this city? Look to the sky on hallowed days, and see whose sigil is stamped clearly onto the heavens."
—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

name: Faerie Vandal
text: History may be written by the triumphant, but it's often rewritten by the troublesome.

name: Double Take
text: "But next time we meet, . . ."

name: Ridge Rannet
text:
"Only those with the strength to seize their destiny deserve to have one."
—Nacatl scratchforms

name: Aether Flash
text:
"You can't get there from here. Well, you can—it just won't be fun."
—Ertai, wizard adept

name: Blinding Drone
text:
"Zendikar's true gods have risen. Whether in reverence or agony, all the world will kneel."
—Ayli, high priest of the Eternal Pilgrims

name: Patron of the Valiant
text: "Bant's most gallant knights wear my sigil, and for that I am humbled."

name: Knight of the Stampede
text: "My whisper becomes a thousand roars."

name: Peek
text: Sometimes you have to read between the minds.

name: Sedris, the Traitor King
text: He bids his minions rise from their graves to their knees.

name: Angelfire Crusader
text: Nothing burns hotter than the fires of holy rage.

name: Bumper Cars
text:
"These bumping cars remind me of the time your amusement park smashed into my planet."
—Ambassador Blorpityblorpboop

name: Crop Rotation
text: Zendikar's elves have developed innovative methods to mitigate the effects of the Roil.

name: Jaya's Immolating Inferno
text: The mirror's shards sparkled like starfire, and a legend was reborn.

name: Esika, God of the Tree // The Prismatic Bridge
text: The end of us all.

name: Kalastria Healer
text: "Time and again, I have demonstrated my skills as a healer. Why, then, are you so ill at ease?"

name: Zuran Orb
text:
"I will go to any length to achieve my goal. Eternal life is worth any sacrifice."
—Zur the Enchanter

name: Welcoming Vampire
text: From the moment they arrived, wedding guests were met with a pageant of wealth and excess.

name: Pacifism
text: Without warriors there can be no war.

name: Keldon Warcaller
text:
"The Mountain gave the Flame to Kradak to light the furnaces of his people's hearts. The wanderers became Keldons, and he the first warlord."
—"The Flame of Keld"

name: Boomerang
text: Early Jamuraan hunters devised a weapon that would return to its source. Tolarian Æthermancers developed a spell that skipped the weapon entirely.

name: Goblin Battle Jester
text: Somehow goblins found a tactical advantage by sending a clown to war.

name: Murmuring Phantasm
text:
"The most insidious thing in the world is nonsense that sounds just plausible enough to listen to."
—Lazav

name: Reckless Fireweaver
text: Architects find inspiration in the dragon's beauty of form, while artificers are influenced by the function of its fire.

name: Rainbow Efreet
text:
"A beauty made more so by its fleeting visitations."
—Teferi

name: Venerable Monk
text: "I rely not so much on the wisdom of age as on the overconfidence of youth."

name: Scepter of Dominance
text:
"Whether or not you will bow to me is not open to debate. The question is, will I ever let you rise?"
—Fridius, telemin master

name: Wanderer's Strike
text:
"Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."
—Lavinia

name: Dark Ritual
text:
"From void evolved Phyrexia. Great Yawgmoth, Father of Machines, saw its perfection. Thus The Grand Evolution began."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

name: Gifted Aetherborn
text: A few aetherborn have discovered a way to sustain their own existences at the cost of an insatiable hunger for the life essence of other beings.

name: Wasteland
text: "But I am going to Mordor," said Frodo. "I know that well enough," said Sam. "Of course you are. And I'm coming with you."

name: Shivan Zombie
text: Barbarians long for a glorious death in battle. Phyrexia was eager to grant that wish.

name: Morale
text:
"After Lacjsi's speech, the Knights grew determined to crush their ancient enemies clan by clan."
—Tivadar of Thorn, *History of the Goblin Wars*

name: Vona, Butcher of Magan
text: "For four hundred years, I have led armies of conquest. These lands hold nothing that can stand against me."

name: Wormfang Newt
text: Spawned by mages emulating the insane.

name: Lone Wolf
text: A wolf without a pack is either a survivor or a brute.

name: Scorching Spear
text: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

name: Ravenous Rats
text: Devouring books is only the beginning. The librarian's next.

name: Daggerdrome Imp
text: One of the many reasons why open-air markets close at dusk.

name: Reign of Terror
text:
"I don't know what takes them; they die around me without time to scream."
—Scout Ekemet, final journal

name: Brightclimb Pathway // Grimclimb Pathway
text:
"Why risk life and limb exploring the wilds? For this."
—Yavotz, Sea Gate Expeditionary House

name: Renounce the Guilds
text:
"Scores will die in the name of peace. That is what you call compromise?"
—Gideon Jura, to Aurelia

name: Seal of Cleansing
text:
"I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."
—Seal inscription

name: Whip Sergeant
text: Keldon soldiers learn to move faster than the whip.

name: Blinkmoth Urn
text: The vedalken embed such urns in their living artifact creations.

name: Suspicious Bookcase
text: The great library in the Museum of Old Capenna has a million volumes on display—and miles of passages hidden behind them.

name: Roaring Slagwurm
text: Wurms compete for nesting grounds near the Radix. The young who hatch closest have the best chance for survival.

name: Soul Diviner
text: As the Eternal's cold fingers tightened around his throat, Domri realized what kind of master he had rushed to serve.

name: Hail Storm
text:
"If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home."
—Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

name: Ghoul's Feast
text: Mercadians not wealthy enough to buy a tomb are thrown into a bog called "the Ghoul's Larder."

name: Sultai Charm
text: "Strike," the fumes hiss. "Raise an empire with your ambition."

name: Vodalian Knights
text: Fear the Knight leaping from the water into the air, weapon ready.

name: Warrior's Honor
text:
"The day will come when the righteous warrior faces a battle she cannot win. She will greet that day as she has any other."
—Asmira, holy avenger

name: Might of Old Krosa
text:
