text: Few warriors dare to challenge a knight of Capashen. Should one do so, there is one fewer.

name: Case the Joint
text: Steel doors and iron bars are child's play for an Obscura operative.

name: Spark Harvest
text: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.

name: Spectral Rider
text: Never a word. Never a warning. Only the sound of hoofbeats along the crossways, and the screams of the avenged.

name: Drana's Emissary
text: "The taste of freedom is sweeter than blood."

name: Sure Strike
text: To survive imminent doom, it sometimes takes a foolhardy soul who acts first and fears later.

name: Sanctum Prelate
text: "These halls are sacred. You will be silent."

name: Worthy Knight
text: Every Ardenvale aspirant must step through the flame. Their honor determines whether they burn or shine.

name: Celestial Force
text:
"Wishing upon only one star seems like a failure of imagination."
—Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter

name: Shatter
text:
"Let the past be the past. Do not call up that which you cannot put down. Destroy that which destroyed us, so long ago."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Chief of the Edge
text: "We are the swift, the strong, the blade's sharp shriek! Fear nothing, and strike!"

name: Fencing Ace
text: "Go find yourself a couple of friends, and bring me a blindfold. Then we might have a fair fight."

name: Crushing Canopy
text:
"The forests of this world are unafraid to assert themselves."
—Wrenn

name: Giant Crab
text: During the giant crabs' mating season, Skyshroud nights are filled with the clatter of their skirmishes.

name: Ravenous Bloodseeker
text:
"Nothing will cool the fire in their blood. They are too far gone. We must keep them away from our towns at any cost."
—Cosper Lowe of the Silbern Guard

name: Glimmervoid
text: An empty canvas holds infinite possibilities.

name: Goblin Grenade
text:
"According to accepted theory, the Grenade held some kind of flammable mixture and was carried to its target by a hapless Goblin."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV*

name: Sol Ring
text: Deep within the heart of the forest, a new sun flared to life.

name: Feedback Bolt
text: The path of least resistance is often through your enemies.

name: Squirrel Nest
text: In the treetops, unseen by many, lurks chittering, skittering death.

name: Steadfast Cathar
text:
"The most resolute soldiers will press forward in the face of overwhelming odds."
—Gideon Jura

name: Illuminator Virtuoso
text: The Obscura reserve their keenest blades for traitors in their midst.

name: Merfolk Secretkeeper // Venture Deeper
text: Merfolk curiosity usually has dire consequences, but rarely for the merfolk.

name: Skirsdag Flayer
text: Certain initiates into the Skirsdag cult take a vow of blindness, pledging obedience to none but demonkind.

name: Warden of the Beyond
text: He draws strength from a vast source few mortals can fathom. Designed by Isaiah Cartwright

name: Bound in Gold
text:
"Trespassers will be smelted."
—Axgard inscription

name: Kazuul's Fury // Kazuul's Cliffs
text:
"The toll is steep, but the cliffs are steeper."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Primal Order
text:
"It's strange, but I can feel it when the land is corrupted. I understand why the Autumn Willow is so protective."
—Daria

name: Manaweft Sliver
text:
"I see in their interconnectedness a strange embodiment of the natural order."
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

name: Sacred Boon
text:
"Divine gifts are granted to those who are worthy."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

name: Molten Hydra
text:
Keep off the glass.
—Hydra warning sign

name: Cabal Evangel
text: "All hail the Demonlord Belzenlok, Evincar of the Stronghold, Scion of Darkness, Doom of Fools, Lord of the Wastes, Master of the Ebon Hand, Eternal Patriarch of the Cabal . . ."

name: Gwendlyn Di Corci
text: Urborg became the final resting place of many swordsmen of renown, their steel outmatched by the wiles of Gwendlyn.

name: Temporal Cleansing
text: "Now's not a good time."

name: Thoughtbind
text:
"As the rest of the mortal world waged war, Lady Azami and her students invaded tomes of knowledge. Their search yielded spells critical in the fight."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

name: Thundering Chariot
text: In times of conflict, the philosophers of Meletis trade their podiums for conveyances of war.

name: Captivating Unicorn
text:
"Gazing at the unicorn, I felt closer to the majesty of Nyx than I ever had before."
—Oineus, traveling merchant

name: Prowling Pangolin
text: It's always hungry, yet easily sated.

name: Sun-Blessed Guardian // Furnace-Blessed Conqueror
text: . . . but even the unbreakable can be reshaped.

name: Fire at Will
text: "Make these shots count. The more foes we drop now, the fewer we'll have trying to kill us later."

name: Enthusiastic Mechanaut
text: "Greetings, fellow inventors!" the akki shouted, attempting a friendly smile. To her dismay, the greeting was met only with shrieks and alarms being activated.

name: Reanimate
text:
"You'd better be worth it."
—Liliana Vess

name: Souls of the Faultless
text:
"More horrible than their empty forms are their noble eyes. I dare not strike."
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

name: Phantasmal Dragon
text: Its hunger and ire are no less for being wrought of lies and mist.

name: Mesa Falcon
text:
"Pretty Falcon, friend to Soraya. Will you send her my greetings?"
—Gemma, Willow Priestess

name: Stomper Cub
text:
"This one is only a yearling, but it would be wise to move away before we provide it with excellent hunting practice."
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Lingering Souls
text: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

name: Wandering Ones
text:
"I saw them once, when I was a child. They led me to my parents' arms when I was lost. Why have they abandoned me now? Why won't they take me home again?"
—Unnamed beggar

name: Bone Splinters
text: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

name: Huang Zhong, Shu General
text: "Virile in war, he kept the north in fear; His prodigies subdued the western sphere."

name: Fire Elemental
text:
"The best way to learn from a book on pyromancy is to burn it."
—Jaya Ballard

name: Run Wild
text: Wirewood's beasts didn't seem to mind when the elves moved in. In fact, they hardly noticed them underfoot.

name: Flames of the Raze-Boar
text: "Fire will cure a multitude of ills."

name: Dune Diviner
text: The desert had once been a place of endless horror. It was now the last refuge as the city of Naktamun fell.

name: Wolf's Quarry
text:
"The monster was gaining on them. Twice it had found them. There was only one place left to hide."
—*Tales of the Fae*

name: Thought Vessel
text: Before the Great Sleep, the Necrons knew every corner of the galaxy, as only the ultimate conquerors could.

name: Porcelain Legionnaire
text:
"My new design has lightweight plating specially cultivated from heretics' spare tissues."
—Izathel, priest of the Annex

name: Rishkar, Peema Renegade
text: "Aether is the soul of Kaladesh, and all souls should be free."

name: Tempest of Light
text: "Let everything return to its true nature, so that destiny may take its course."

name: Syncopate
text: "Patience, mage. Killing you now would be too easy."

name: Fog of War
text: So thick was the fog on Argoth's shores that the brothers' forces passed within shouting distance of each other without realizing it.

name: Flowstone Embrace
text:
"The seventh symbol, the Mark of Stone, stores the power of ancient Rath."
—*Tome of Elemental Mastery*

name: Lantern Spirit
text: Bound to the square where she died, she calls out to those in danger—usually scaring them straight into the peril she warns of.

name: Murasa Behemoth
text: The loss of its hunting grounds made it all the more dangerous.

name: Aven Fleetwing
text:
"It was too fast, even for our veteran archers. They might as well have been blowing it kisses."
—Vulok, elvish archer

name: Reverberate
text:
"I'm not indecisive. I just don't like to limit my options."
—Maxti, pyromancer

name: Elite Instructor
text: The greatest minds in Meletis study under the masters at the Dekatia, a renowned school of magic and philosophy.

name: Final Flare
text: Those who fought without honor in life are taken to Agonas and doomed to fight forever in its arenas.

name: Exsanguinate
text: Vampires don't consider patience a virtue nor gluttony a sin.

name: Coat with Venom
text:
"Every Silumgar blade carries the blessing of our dragonlord."
—Xathi the Infallible

name: Llanowar Sentinel
text:
"The forest has as many eyes as leaves."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Rout
text:
"End this. What I seek is far greater."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Vampire Warlord
text: "How can you serve me? By dying."

name: Vengeful Dead
text: Those who don't learn from their deaths are destined to repeat them.

name: Release to Memory
text:
"Those who have passed are beyond war, beyond suffering. Mourn them, envy them, but above all, remember them."
—Light-Paws, Imperial advisor

name: Grand Abolisher
text: "Your superstitions and mumblings are useless chaff before my righteousness."

name: Megatog
text: In an ironic bit of evolution, the megatog's dozens of teeth are mainly ornamental. It prefers swallowing things whole.

name: Karakas
text: 2020 Legacy Champion

name: Captain's Call
text:
"Who among you has the courage to face certain death? Who will heed my call?"
—Rayel Vanger, Firstblade of Thune

name: Kird Ape
text: Apes can be gentle, contemplative beasts—but context is everything.

name: Barbed Lightning
text: Every creature on Mirrodin is a lightning rod.

name: Warden of the Chained
text: "Strength, skill, rage—all have their limits, but patience can be infinite."

name: Clock of DOOOOOOOOOOOOM!
text:
"Perhaps you believe, even in these final moments, that you will be saved. But doom has no snooze button, you fools!"
—Baron Von Count

name: Spinal Graft
text:
"This one has not screamed enough to show effective implantation. Kill it."
—Volrath

name: Temur Banner
text: Savagery to survive, courage to triumph.

name: Boggart Ram-Gang
text:
"We're going to need a bigger gate."
—Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

name: Peer into the Abyss
text:
"Oh, don't be so dramatic. When your eyes bleed, and your brain leaks out your ears, then we'll talk about lost sanity."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Nether Horror
text:
"My dreams darkened and seeped into my waking hours. Spellcraft and nightmare merged to create this monstrosity."
—Sunniva, witch of Holm Hollow

name: Gavony Township
text:
"The protective wards of the church have weakened, and no one can tell us why. It's time to look to our own defenses."
—Gregel, militia leader

name: Aura of Silence
text: Not all silences are easily broken.

name: Galvanic Key
text: A solution in search of a problem.

name: Bonds of Faith
text:
"What cannot be destroyed will be bound."
—Oath of Avacyn

name: Pearl Dragon
text:
"They knew Bantau was lost when, to hide the pearl he had found on the beach, he swallowed it—and soon grew wings."
—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Battle Mastery
text:
"Boom! Boom! Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills!"
—*Clachan Tales*

name: Omen of the Dead
text: "My time will come, when life's frantic striving will fade into the boundless quiet of death."

name: Malevolent Noble
text: He has slain a dozen witches, luring each with a promise of fresh children's bones.

name: Strategic Planning
text:
「私が与えられるのは情報だけよ。どの道を選ぶかはあなたの自由。」
——アルケヴィオスの神託者、ジャジ

name: Teferi's Care
text:
"If I do nothing else, I will protect my people."
—Teferi

name: Noble Hierarch
text: In all her years of vigil, her resolve has never faltered.

name: Storm Fleet Arsonist
text: "Go ahead, build another. I'll burn that down as well."

name: Tarkir Duneshaper // Burnished Dunestomper
text:
"Your precious dragonlords repressed your instincts, cur. You were born a hunter. Evolve, and hunt again."
—Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

name: Cut Down
text:
"There can be no mercy, no half measures. When facing Phyrexians, it's kill swiftly or die."
—Jodah

name: Shaper Guildmage
text:
Shape this world in Zhalfir's image.
—Shaper Guild maxim

name: Eye of Ugin
text: An eye closes. A race awakens.

name: Dusk Legion Zealot
text: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.

name: Ethereal Whiskergill
text: Fallowsages debate whether the whiskergill is native to the Dark Meanders or merely dreamstuff made real.

name: Harmonize
text:
「侵略の血まみれの喧騒が消え
そして再び静かな歌が森の中に鳴り響く。」
—-「フレイアリーズの歌」

name: Kjeldoran Gargoyle
text: The gargoyles were taken from the walls of flooded Kjeldoran cities and brought upland to guard the outposts of New Argive.

name: Damping Sphere
text: A Thran relic, it has spent ten thousand years doing absolutely nothing.

name: Dueling Grounds
text: "You think you can stop me?" hissed Tsabo. "I think I can kill you," replied Gerrard.

name: Thoughtcutter Agent
text: Agents of the Architects of Will mark their victims as a reminder that their secrets are secret no longer.

name: Serpent Warrior
text: They are incubated by swamp gases and cut their teeth on zombie flesh. Serpent warriors are not to be trifled with.

name: Now I Know My ABC's
text: The quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.

name: Mistform Skyreaver
text: Conviction, the third myth of reality: Only those who seek the truth can be deceived.

name: Ishai, Ojutai Dragonspeaker
text: "Through me, the Great Teacher's voice will rattle this world."

name: Ashnod's Transmogrant
text: Ashnod found few willing to trade their humanity for the power she offered.

name: Prickly Boggart
text:
"Even without the spines, who would dare to touch it?"
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

name: Rhizome Lurcher
text:
"The dead gain new purpose here. What is strange in the eyes of other guilds is harmonious in ours."
—Devesh, Golgari shaman

name: Wings of Hope
text: Urza knew Phyrexians would come through the air and sent his soldiers to greet them.

name: Crush
text: A golem's hands know no tenderness.

name: Nocturnal Feeder
text: A living pulse is an irresistible temptation.

name: Metropolis Sprite
text: "Well, if that goblin didn't want his tongue pierced, he shouldn't have stuck it out at me."

name: Final Revels
text: One whiff of the sweet, pungent scent leads to euphoria—or to an early grave.

name: Haunted Guardian
text:
"Drain the victim's blood, sell the corpse, and use the soul on guard duty. No muss, no fuss, no problems."
—Olivia Voldaren

name: Tolarian Academy
text: 2020 Vintage Champion

name: Akoum Boulderfoot
text:
"If you're in Akoum and you glimpse a shadow overhead, the worst thing you can do is duck."
—Chadir the Navigator

name: Conductor of Cacophony
text:
Only an imitation of tortured shrieking
—or so the Rakdos claim.

name: Cackling Witch
text: The touch of his madness can drive anyone into a killing frenzy.

name: Bronze Bombshell
text:
"Ooh, shiny! Let's pull off the chain and take her with us."
—Ukl, Gruul raider, last words

name: Brass Gnat
text: Its buzzing is the sound of its inner mechanisms, ever winding down.

name: Mosstodon
text: Whether gargantuans are the manifested will of Progenitus or simply the result of overabundant resources is moot when a herd of them is thundering at you.

name: Pygmy Kavu
text: "We could learn a lot by watching the little ones," said Agnate. "Define 'little,'" replied Grizzlegom.

name: Hurly-Burly
text:
"Things were popping like corn in a skillet. Olly landed in the pig pen with his prize sow on top of him, both squealin' like boggarts."
—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

name: Snare Tactician
text:
"Our volleys don't aim to kill. Impair them and the ground will do the rest."
—Alux, Skysail defender

name: Catacomb Slug
text:
"The entire murder scene was covered in dripping, oozing slime. No need for a soothsayer to solve that one."
—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

name: Bounty of Might
text:
"I am the very soul of battle, but even I would never advise open war with the Conclave."
—Aurelia

name: Path of Peace
text: The soldier reaped the profits of peace.

name: Mantis Engine
text: Tawnos left a legacy of animal designs in many of Urza's creations.

name: Grasping Scoundrel
text: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."

name: Gorilla Chieftain
text:
"In the soil of leadership sprout the seeds of immortality."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Nirkana Revenant
text: Hate is an everlasting wellspring from which she is eternally sustained.

name: Ghor-Clan Wrecker
text: "Today the Rubblebelt is a bit larger. That's a good day's work."

name: Sun-Crested Pterodon
text:
"Pterodons tolerate no intrusion into their skies. Even the clouds must ask permission."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer

name: Wall of Bone
text:
"Good neighbors make good walls."
—Jakkarak the Maimer

name: Leonin Warleader
text: When one leonin hunts, many more are surely nearby.

name: Rain of Rust
text: On Mirrodin, mages who call upon the power of rust are shunned by their people and often turn mercenary to survive.

name: Merchant Scroll
text: Lat-Nam wizards trade knowledge on scrolls made of magic so they can better guard against thieves and spies.

name: Complex Automaton
text:
"This wasteful design cannot possibly be Phyrexian."
—Belbe

name: Grand Arbiter Augustin IV
text: "A great leader must have the wisdom to know what's right and the courage to make it so."

name: Control Magic
text: If you don't have the best toys, find the one who does.

name: Dreadbore
text: In Rakdos-controlled neighborhoods, everyone is part of the show.

name: Whisper Squad
text: Ears can't hear them. Eyes see too many of them.

name: Sigarda's Aid
text: The Order of Saint Traft found new strength with Sigarda's support.

name: Unraveling Mummy
text:
"We are no longer in control."
—Elekh, vizier of embalming

name: Exotic Disease
text:
"Do not fear death. I shall release you from the eternal bonds and bring you glory."
—Lord Dralnu

name: Aether Charge
text: "Is it just me, or does that meteor have teeth?"

name: Visara the Dreadful
text: "My eyes are my strongest feature."

name: Gust of Wind
text: Skysail's strength was also its vulnerability.

name: Gladecover Scout
text: "The forest is my cover and I hold it close. In such a tight embrace, there is no room for wickedness."

name: Boompile
text:
"Fuses? We have more than enough! Now ... which one was it?"
—Flearan One-Eye, goblin engineer

name: Manamorphose
text:
"Master the chaotic forces of nature, and you shall master magic."
—Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur forest

name: Mending Hands
text:
"I can staunch their blood, mend their flesh, and knit their bones. But I cannot restore their hope."
—Tender-Hand, kitsune healer

name: Moon Sprite
text:
"I am that merry wanderer of the night."
—William Shakespeare,
*A Midsummer Night's Dream*

name: Ondu War Cleric
text: "I will follow the light of Iona into battle, and I will know no fear."

name: Crackdown Construct
text:
"All buildings are subject to search. Resistance will be punished."
—Enforcer-Chief Ranaj

name: Pit Scorpion
text: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

name: Hungry Ridgewolf
text: Even vampires know to travel faster when they hear howling in the Geier Reach passes.

name: Lightning Elemental
text:
"Oh, it's easy enough to kill, but I'm not going anywhere near it."
—Norin the Wary

name: Mana Confluence
text: Five rivers encircle Theros, flowing with waters more ancient than the world itself.

name: Adherent of Hope
text: "Basri has shown me the way forward, and I will follow."

name: Wood Elves
text: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

name: Skyscanner
text: The municipal senate makes extensive use of the thopters, mostly to gather dirt on rival senators.

name: Elvish Warrior
text: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

name: Freelance Muscle
text: He never asks why. Just who, when, and where.

name: Radha, Heir to Keld
text: "Run home, cur. I've already taken your master's head. Don't make me thrash you with it."

name: Skaab Wrangler
text: After Uda's hat boutique in Selhoff was destroyed by werewolves, she relocated outside of town and took up a new type of sewing.

name: Bonder's Ornament
text:
"Found families deserve a family crest too."
—Kinnan, bonder prodigy

name: Deep Freeze
text: For cryomancers, studying the Ice Age isn't just an academic exercise.

name: Worldpurge
text: The Aurora is not the only magic capable of remaking a world.

name: Adaptive Shimmerer
text:
"You sure you want to see what emerges? You might not like it. It definitely won't like you."
—Kinnan, bonder prodigy

name: Blue Elemental Blast
text: Nothing escapes a sharp mind.

name: Pendelhaven Elder
text: The elder who carries the ancestral mantle of Jacques le Vert is tasked with his ancient mission: to protect the creatures of Pendelhaven.

name: Behind the Scenes
text: It does no good to bar the gate when the enemy is already inside.

name: Arashin Sovereign
text: Dromoka dragons foster trust among their subjects, while the other clans must spend their time quelling rebellion.

name: Vigilante Justice
text: It begins as a whisper and ends with the red roar of fire.

name: Aysen Bureaucrats
text:
"When one's word is law, one's whim is equally binding."
—Calmont, Aysen bureaucrat

name: Dralnu's Crusade
text:
"Don't you agree that mogg intellects are improved by zombification?"
—Lord Dralnu

name: Hideous Visage
text: "Seeing you cower before me is its own reward."

name: Roast
text:
"Intruders in the lands of Atarka have but two choices: be consumed by fire, or be consumed by maw."
—Ulnok, Atarka shaman

name: Chaplain's Blessing
text: "There was a time when the purpose of the church was to heal and protect. I would see that time return."

name: Shimmerdrift Vale
text: Reflections from the wind-sculpted snow gleam with every color of the rainbow.

name: Chasm Skulker
text: Designed by Mike Neumann

name: Base Camp
text: A new dawn, a new adventure.

name: Sky Tether
text:
"If you can't control your mount, I will control it for you."
—Mirela, Azorius hussar

name: Homarid Explorer
text:
"Homarids spread northward from Sarpadia as the climate cooled, raiding coastal settlements for supplies."
—*Time of Ice*

name: Risen Reef
text:
"No, not 'washed' ashore. It *walked* ashore."
—Shafring Hulm, beachcomber

name: Cloak of Mists
text: Mystery lies beneath the haunting mists. Never stay where obscurity deepens.

name: Honored Hydra
text: Even gods have pets.

name: Dreamspoiler Witches
text: At night, the faeries steal dreamstuff for their queen. At daybreak, countless creatures wake weak and hollow.

name: Distant Melody
text: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

name: Tundra Wolves
text:
"I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains."
—Onean scout

name: Anger
text:
"For its time as a mortal, Anger chose a shell of boiling rock."
—*Scroll of Beginnings*

name: Liliana's Contract
text: Immortality is worth any price.

name: Venomous Fangs
text: All the pain of the shattered forest contained in a single drop.

name: Femeref Archers
text:
"They say a Zhalfirin archer can split the eye of a griffin. Nonsense, of course: they have no faith to guide their darts."
—Nuru, Femeref archer

name: Loxodon Sergeant
text: His voice is both war horn and rallying cry, a trumpeting call that stirs even the faintest heart.

name: Second Sunrise
text: The bright tunnel sometimes leads back to life.

name: Narset's Reversal
text:
"In the disarray of battle, an enemy's attack may be your most convenient weapon."
—Narset

name: Reap What Is Sown
text: The strength of the people comes from the land. And the bounty of the land comes from Karametra.

name: Mogg Squad
text: As they crept into the *Weatherlight*'s hold, the squad leader held up his hand and whispered, "Stop, goblins—what's that sound?"

name: Alaborn Trooper
text:
"I dedicate my body to my country And my life to my King."
—Alaborn Soldier's Oath

name: Siege Modification
text: Perfect for getting through to the consuls.

name: Merchant Raiders
text: "Tell you what, you keep the rope."

name: Sai, Master Thopterist
text: "Industry without artistry is just a fancy way to fill the junkyard."

name: Sailmonger
text: Clients who cheat the sailmonger make an impact on the rest.

name: Dinosaur Stampede
text: If you're in the way of a ceratops charge and you're made of mere flesh and bone, then you're not really in the way.

name: Kavu Climber
text:
"There was a crack of branches, a rustle of leaves, then a tremendous roar. Our party had no chance as death descended from above."
—Taseen, elvish bard

name: Cephalid Constable
text: Cephalids don't police people. They police loyalties.

name: Flesh to Dust
text:
"Pain is temporary. So is life."
—Liliana Vess

name: Force of Will
text: "Weren't you ever taught that it's rude to interrupt?"

name: Gravedigger
text: A full coffin is like a full coffer-both are attractive to thieves.

name: Nesting Grounds
text: Dappled coats become armored hides. Soft jaws become razor tusks. Nestling play becomes the fight for survival.

name: Feiyi Snake
text: Two bodies, twice the malice.

name: Squelching Leeches
text: Leeches are sacred to followers of Pharika for drawing poison from a wound, but feared by everyone else for drawing blood from the flesh.

name: Phyrexian Ironfoot
text: It took the Rimewind cultists days to realize they had successfully activated the creature—it just wasn't interested in moving.

name: Mind's Eye
text: "Ideas drift like petals on the wind. I have only to lift my face to the breeze."

name: Wrap in Vigor
text: Some nature mages unknowingly took advantage of the temporal energies still swirling on Dominaria. What they mistook for healing magic was in fact the manipulation of time.

name: Drove of Elves
text: "The light of beauty protects our journeys through darkness."

name: Raging Cougar
text: Mountaineers quickly learn to travel with their spears always pointed up.

name: Spatial Binding
text:
Time is the one shackle you can't break.
—Zhalfirin aphorism

name: Drowned
text: We asked Captain Soll what became of the Serafina, but all he said was, "Ships that go down shouldn't come back up."

name: Reckless Embermage
text: Many mages have been consumed by their work.

name: Centaur Healer
text: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

name: Fractured Identity
text: Self-reflection is not without its perils.

name: Caligo Skin-Witch
text: "Take their faces. The lips of these unbelievers may yet honor the Demonlord."

name: Every Dream a Nightmare
text: "Let me unburden you of these fatuous hopes."

name: Reject
text:
"Grux, for the last time, you have to do more than simply shout 'Apply!' at the administrators."
—Pavil, admissions officer

name: Megantic Sliver
text: Even the thrums, the lowliest of slivers, become deadly in its presence.

name: Cut the Tethers
text:
"You cannot bar the path of gods. You can only divert their journey for a while."
—Sensei Hisoka

name: Mesa Falcon
text:
"The faith of Serra is borne on wings of hope."
—Gulsen, Abbey Matron

name: Patrician Geist
text: He rides in agitated circles, snapping orders at servants who've long since found their peace.

name: Island
text: As you gaze down upon Wyrm's Crossing, you hear distant cries of alarm, and you notice that all traffic on the bridge has come to a halt.

name: Durkwood Boars
text:
"And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine; and the herd ran violently . . . ."
—*The Bible*, Mark 5:13

name: Staff of the Sun Magus
text: A symbol of conviction in uncertain times.

name: Wrathful Red Dragon
text: "We'll put it all back! The gems, the gold, the chalice that would've looked great on my mantle; we'll put everythi—"

name: Hungry Mist
text:
"If the air must feed, let it take the self-righteous."
—Murat, Death Speaker

name: Weight of Conscience
text: Sometimes the weight of the world on your shoulders is a literal one.

name: Orcish Vandal
text: Every ancient relic is a weapon if you throw it hard enough.

name: Ballista Squad
text: The perfect antidote for a tightly packed formation.

name: Retromancer
text: "If one harm us, strike them in return. So sayeth the bey."

name: Sygg, River Guide
text: "If there's a place worth going, the Merrow Lanes already do. And if there's a route worth taking, yours truly already has."

name: Scrounging Bandar
text: "It was right here a second ago . . ."

name: White Knight
text: In the wretched depths of the Grand Coliseum, his soul shines like a single torch blazing in the night.

name: Forest
text: As monsters from the Underdark rampage across the world above, you've delved deep underground to determine what has driven them upward.

name: Mad Prophet
text: "I have seen it. Seen the end, seen the beginning, the beginning of the end. Not death, no, no. Transcendence!"

name: Harvesttide Infiltrator // Harvesttide Assailant
text: He was one masked stranger among many. Blending in was child's play.

name: Liquimetal Torque
text:
"Weaponized jewelry has a long and respected history."
—Ervos Trax

name: Unruly Mob
text:
"Those who aren't welcome will know it!"
—Kolman, elder of Gatstaf

name: Cenn's Tactician
text: "A well-trained force brings peace... which brings more time for training!"

name: Drift of the Dead
text:
"Take their dead, and entomb them in the snow. Risen, they shall serve a new purpose."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
text: His knowledge of the Multiverse enabled New Phyrexia to strike each plane with surgical precision.

name: Courageous Outrider
text: One silvery blast signaled that she wouldn't be arriving at Thraben alone.

name: Witching Well
text: It was built by the Witch of Lochmere. Most of the wishes it grants are its own.

name: Hurloon Battle Hymn
text: The magical echoes of the Hurloon mountain range greatly increase the potency of spells based on song or speech.

name: Necrotic Ooze
text:
"To death all must go, and so in death lies ultimate power."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Scalding Tongs
text:
"This has nothing to do with what you know and everything to do with what I wish."
—Volrath

name: Castle Vantress
text: Without Vantress's knowledge, the realm would lose itself in darkness.

name: Stolen by the Fae
text: Denizens of the wilds don't always seek to harm intruders. Sometimes they simply misplace them.

name: Magnify
text: The seed torches' pollen gives off light, but the elves find it heightens their senses as well.

name: Rishadan Pawnshop
text: Everything comes to the waterfront eventually, on the tide or on credit.

name: Riding Red Hare
text: One of the greatest steeds in the empire, Red Hare could travel a thousand *li* a day and climb hills as if running on flat ground.

name: Deserted Temple
text: A monument to long-forgotten gods, it stands as a tribute to the fleeting nature of human ways.

name: Satyr Piper
text:
"When I asked my commander the reward for killing that prancing nuisance, he told me, 'None! I want to kill him myself!'"
—Phrogas, soldier of Akros

name: Spinny Ride
text:
"Expect to be out of commission for about a week. It's awesome."
—*Salzon's Ride Review*

name: Juggernaut
text: We had taken refuge in a small cave, thinking the entrance was too narrow for it to follow. To our horror, its gigantic head smashed into the mountainside, ripping itself a new entrance.

name: Lurking Crocodile
text:
"Preying on unsuspecting goobers, this crocodile is the only foe to ever best me in a knife fight."
—Crocodile Jackson, legendary cowboy

name: Kiddie Coaster
text:
"The calming motion of this grubling's ride reminds me of my world's beauty before this mobile astropark obliterated it."
—Ambassador Blorpityblorpboop

name: Sphinx's Revelation
text:
"Our secrets lie in the desert beyond the Hekma. But finding them will not be your challenge; living with the knowledge will be."
—Samut, to Basri

name: Goblin S.W.A.T. Team
text: They put the "special" in special weapons and tactics.

name: Strider Harness
text: Each journey begins with a single step—and sometimes ends with that single step as well.

name: Stomping Ground
text:
"What we begin, the End-Raze will finish. Then we will dance in Ravnica's rubble."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Deadeye Rig-Hauler
text: "Up you go, you soggy rat."

name: Attrition
text:
"I will trade life for life with the insurgents. Our resources, unlike theirs, are limitless."
—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

name: Ranger of Eos
text: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.

name: Emberwilde Augur
text: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

name: Darkwater Catacombs
text: Murky Otarian tides hide the forgotten treacheries of the Phyrexian war.

name: Predatory Wurm
text:
"The strong eat. The weak are eaten. That's the way of things."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Nezumi Bone-Reader
text: "The old ways still work, but a little tech support never hurts."

name: Ladies' Knight
text:
"I said 'Put him in a *core set*, not a corset!'"
—Richard Garfield, Ph.D.

name: Armored Galleon
text:
"Information equals profits. Our merchants sell it, or our pirates use it."
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

name: Thirst for Discovery
text: I knew he had left the castle now, and thought to use the opportunity to explore more than I had dared to do as yet.

name: Battleflight Eagle
text: Eagles make fine mounts, but they're too proud to carry anyone for long.

name: Filigree Angel
text: "I craved enlightenment, and Crucius's etherium opened my eyes. I would share my sight with you, but first you must believe."

name: Arashin Foremost
text: "I would gladly give my life if it would inspire my clan to victory."

name: Rile
text: The enormous can still be at the mercy of the small.

name: Consuming Fervor
text: Headlong is the only way to pass through the gate to the afterlife.

name: Goblin Scouts
text:
"Pathetic—like I wouldn't know a goblin painted up to look like a dwarf!"
—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

name: Arcane Spyglass
text: It breaches not physical distances but temporal ones.

name: Bloodmark Mentor
text: Boggarts divide the world into two categories: things you can eat, and things you have to chase down and pummel before you can eat.

name: Skull Catapult
text:
"Let any who doubt the evil of using the ancient devices look at this infernal machine. What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Retreat to Coralhelm
text: Their Enclave overrun, the merfolk took refuge within beauty.

name: Sigarda, Host of Herons
text: Great devotion yields great reward.

name: Lost Soul
text:
Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name—
But those who go with her are never the same.

name: Demystify
text:
"Illusion is a crutch for those with no grounding in reality."
—Cho-Manno

name: Rumor Gatherer
text: "It's delightful, the things their owners reveal when they think no one is listening."

name: Fertile Ground
text: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil —almost.

name: Riveteers Decoy
text: He keeps the heat off his allies—by drawing it all to himself.

name: Arcbound Bruiser
text: Break in case of emergency.

name: Duskwielder
text: "My shadow alone will slay you."

name: Ocular Halo
text: While the soldier dreams, the eyes stand watch.

name: Bastion Mastodon
text: The Consulate's automaton bank contains only the most impressive specimens.

name: Golden Guardian // Gold-Forge Garrison
text: An army of living gold for the golden city.

name: More or Less
text: Why was 5 afraid of 6? Because 678.

name: Reflecting Pool
text:
"The reflection of land interests me far more than its reality."
—Volrath

name: Dissipate
text:
"If you weren't born with it, you don't need it."
—Grahilah, former trader of Amiqat

name: Urban Evolution
text: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

name: Cloak of Mists
text:
"All we could lose, we did. All we could keep, we do. And both are shrouded by mists."
—Barrin, master wizard

name: Isamaru, Hound of Konda
text: The hound sniffed the air and let slip a low growl. General Takeno looked down at the faithful Isamaru and calmed him with a touch. "Alert the guard. The kami are coming."

name: Gnarlid Colony
text: Where mana flows, the gnarlids follow.

name: Liquid Fire
text: There's no such thing as a little bit of lava.

name: Deathgazer
text: Your entire life passes before its eyes.

name: The Shattered States Era // Nameless Conqueror
text:
"In the wake of the Kami War, Kamigawa descended into a state of constant warfare. Even with Kyodai's wisdom guiding them, it took the first Imperials decades of work and bloodshed to subdue the clans and bring peace to the land."
—*History of the Empire*

name: Jasmine Boreal of the Seven
text: "I've had my adventures. All I wish now is to sit in peace and speak with the pines."

name: Contraband Kingpin
text: "Don't waste my time with trifles. Bring me works of art, and I will make you rich."

name: Disenchant
text: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

name: Inga Rune-Eyes
text: Each path ever charted by an Omenseeker is etched into her eyes.

name: Macetail Hystrodon
text: The goblins tracked the hystrodon with much stealth and cunning. Then they were eaten with much pain and yelling.

name: Quintorius, Field Historian
text: "Every life has a story to tell. I won't let them be forgotten."

name: Storm Fleet Pyromancer
text:
"She's quick and fearless, and she's never missed a shot. That almost makes up for all the scorch marks she leaves behind."
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Wildgrowth Walker
text:
"Hear me, stone, root, branch: be the fist of this land. Turn back those who trample upon your domain."
—Song of the Shaper

name: Valakut Predator
text:
"Whatever volcanoes dream of, it seems like they always wake up grumpy."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

name: Thopter Architect
text: "She'll only fly once. Make it count!"

name: Nezumi Shadow-Watcher
text:
"The Okiba Gang! Night-cursed thieves and assassins! I've had enough of their meddling! Triple the guard!"
—Marrow-Gnawer

name: Blaze
text: Fire never dies alone.

name: Thalia's Lancers
text: "Let the points of our lances lead the way."

name: Divine Smite
text: "When darkness closes in around us, my blade will light our path."

name: Fruit of Tizerus
text: One spiny tree with bitter fruit grows in the realm of Tizerus, outside the palace of Erebos.

name: Nissa's Revelation
text: The evil inside the mountain pulsed at Nissa in a shock wave of madness.

name: Hubris
text:
"You wish to learn of Nyx? Very well."
—Phenax, god of deception

name: Etherium Sculptor
text: The greatest masters of the craft abandon tools altogether, shaping metal with hand and mind alone.

name: Defense Grid
text:
"Properly installed, each powerstone emits a targeted electromagnetic field that halts momentum as sure as stone."
—*Tome of Obstructions*

name: Tidehollow Strix
text: The scullers beneath Esper keep strixes as trained pets, and set them loose when a fare refuses to pay.

name: Careless Celebrant
text:
"Renata was mesmerized by the satyr's dance of gleeful indifference, of reckless grace and bright disaster."
—Luphea of Setessa, *Histories*

name: Thunderscape Familiar
text: Thunderscape masters release familiars to help guide their apprentices down the thunderscape path.

name: Incriminate
text:
"If I were you, I'd check that elf's coat. I saw him slipping something into his pocket just before you arrived."
—Krandal, freelance instigator

name: Copper Host Crusher
text: Walls built to withstand assaults even from Ikoria's apex monsters were quickly deemed tactically irrelevant by Vorinclex's forces.

name: Inevitable End
text:
"How many more will die before you accept your fate?"
—Erebos, god of the dead

name: Pledge of Loyalty
text: Urza convinced many Dominarians not only to set aside their differences, but to embrace them.

name: Uncomfortable Chill
text: The cold slowed their movements until only their panicked eyeballs swiveled beneath the ice.

name: Yavimaya Ants
text:
"Few natural forces are as devastating as hunger."
—Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Mystic of the Hidden Way
text: "There are many different paths. The Great Teacher reveals them all."

name: Craven Giant
text:
"The best armor is to keep out of range."
—Italian proverb

name: Footlight Fiend
text:
"This footlight's broken. Get me a stagehand!"
—Judith

name: Great Sable Stag
text: Ineffable and incorruptible.

name: Citanul Woodreaders
text: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.

name: Tendrils of Corruption
text:
"Even swamps need sustenance. We will give it to them, and in turn, they will sustain us."
—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

name: Stromkirk Patrol
text: "You'd best move along, human. Our palates are far less discerning than our master's."

name: Mangara of Corondor
text: "I have been brought to this place and I cannot leave. I may be free of the amber, but I am still in prison."

name: Sol Talisman
text: It contains the energy of a dying star, caught at the moment of its explosion.

name: Viashino Runner
text:
"It moved this way, an' that way, an' then before I could stick it, it jumped over my head an' was gone."
—Jula, goblin raider

name: Planar Portal
text: The sky split, and the air crackled and roiled. The Phyrexian invasion of Dominaria had finally begun.

name: Setessan Oathsworn
text: "Setessa is not the city of my birth, but it is the place I fight for, and the place I'm willing to die for. Does that not make it my home?"

name: Warriors' Lesson
text:
"Let each challenge make you a better warrior."
—Anthousa of Setessa

name: True Polymorph
text: Maybe a little *too* convincing.

name: Ark of Blight
text: When opened, it erases entire landscapes from minds and maps.

name: Impale
text: Never let the glitter of gold distract you from the gleam of steel in the shadows.

name: Errantry
text:
"There is no shame in solitude. The lone knight may succeed where a hundred founder."
—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

name: Bastion Protector
text: "By this oath, I pledge to stand by thee, against traitor, beast, or fiend, for only in death does duty end."

name: Flame Jet
text: Did the land make the Keldons? Did the Keldons make the land? Or were they simply meant for each other?

name: Nephalia Smuggler
text: "My drivers are trustworthy. I removed their tongues myself. Any other questions?"

name: Temple Altisaur
text:
"Kinjalli sculpted humans from clay, but the dinosaurs were carved from unyielding stone."
—Itzama the Crested

name: Krenko's Command
text: Goblins are eager to follow orders, especially when those orders involve stealing, hurting, annoying, eating, destroying, or swearing.

name: Qilin's Blessing
text:
"Interesting . . . This mortal being seems to have been blessed with Qilin's essence."
—Mu Yanling's journal

name: Urza's Blueprints
text: From concept to paper to reality.

name: B.F.M. (Big Furry Monster)
text:
than that. Even bigger. Keep going. More.
dreadnoughts for jewelry. It was *big*!"
—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

name: Aura Mutation
text:
"Nature has a way of adapting to and overcoming any force that seeks its end."
—Vivien Reid

name: Nuisance Engine
text: All Auriok children know the tale, "Bolgri and the Long Day of Squashing."

name: Runaway Carriage
text:
"They left in one piece. I can't speak to how they arrived."
—Rupirk, porter at the Rusted Anchor Inn

name: Dragonscale Boon
text: Only those who have proved themselves worthy are granted a dragon's scale.

name: Soratami Seer
text: Their mirrors show two worlds: that which is and that which should be.

name: Mortal Wound
text:
"Their tears spill over Jamuraa. Mixed with blood, they wash everything red."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Sizzle
text: Explosions ripped through the ship overhead, and those unfortunate enough to be directly below scrambled to find cover.

name: Flood of Recollection
text: Jace tumbled down the waterfall and plunged deep into his past.

name: Temporal Spring
text: One splash of the spring's water knocks you clear into last week.

name: Regisaur Alpha
text:
"Seeing a pack of these monsters hunt together, I'm at a loss to imagine the size of their prey."
—Adrian Adanto of Lujio

name: Viashino Outrider
text: "Give thy ration to thy mount, if the road be long. So sayeth the bey."

name: Village Rites
text: The Skelle raise scorn poles in conquered villages—cursed totems of wood and bone that sap survivors of physical strength and the will to fight back.

name: Akroma's Blessing
text: The clerics saw her as a divine gift. She saw them only as allies in her war against Phage.

name: Lumengrid Warden
text: His peers derive knowledge from ancient tomes locked within dark spires. He finds knowledge within the solitude of a lifetime spent watching the Quicksilver Sea.

name: Coral Commando
text: Few Ravnicans are aware of the vast reefs in their world's hidden ocean. Far beneath the great sinkholes, where the light is blue and dim, merfolk tend the coral labyrinths that feed the benthic ecosystem.

name: Rowen
text:
"I've dreamt of a second harvest but fear I will not see it."
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: Corpse Churn
text: "How did we find each other? So there I was, exploring a mound of monster corpses..."

name: Yavimaya Kavu
text: Kavu hunt prey in packs—one kavu hunts a pack of prey.

name: Goblin Bowling Team
text: Flog was out of his league—this game wasn't up his alley, but the team couldn't spare him if he split.

name: Gustrider Exuberant
text: "The elves claim the canopy. The nacatl claim the mountains. I suppose you think we ought to stay on the jungle floor?"

name: Squall Line
text: The constant shifting of Dominaria's shredded timeline played havoc with its atmosphere, combining savage electrical storms from ages past.

name: Turtleshell Changeling
text: A changeling involuntarily mimics the nearest being at hand, sometimes trading a borrowed shell for borrowed claws.

name: Chilling Apparition
text: Mortal minds shrivel at its touch.

name: Rolling Stones
text:
"Trust me—the walls have more than just ears."
—Orcish spy

name: Gift of Strength
text: "What greater testament can there be to Rhonas's lessons?"

name: Golgari Charm
text:
"Let the rest of Ravnica sneer. One way or another, they all end up in the undercity."
—Jarad

name: Trickster's Talisman
text: "Lady Luck, smile on me!"

name: Unnatural Speed
text:
"How can we hope to match the speed of lightning? The fury of storms? The power of mountains? The answer is simple. We cannot. I advise against this war."
—Sensei Hisoka, letter to Lord Konda

name: Thornhide Wolves
text:
"Halana grew brambles to create a barricade around our camp, hoping that it would keep the wolves out. That was a mistake for which we almost paid dearly."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Eaten Alive
text:
"If you hear a groaning noise in the cellar, don't investigate. Don't split up. Just lock the door and barricade it."
—Emili, guard captain

name: Patron Wizard
text: "The best way to teach is by example."

name: Furious Assault
text:
"Does it burn, Saprazzan? Do you wish you had never raised arms against us?"
—Kyren overseer

name: Summon Undead
text: The air itself shuddered at the wizard's words, and from the dark beyond, her call was answered.

name: Vernadi Shieldmate
text: "Selesnya's soil is sacred, and you're about to meet it with your face."

name: Vedalken Heretic
text: "Etherium clouded my eyes, clogged my ears, desensitized my skin. Now that I can feel, I can begin to learn."

name: Open Fire
text: Some khenra archers fashion their arrows with a personal touch.

name: Cloud Manta
text: When Emeria's worshippers learned that she was no more than a twisted memory of Emrakul, they abandoned their temples to the god. The deserted shrines now serve as breeding grounds for the mantas.

name: Loam Lion
text: In Zendikar, today's grassland could be tomorrow's jungle, and hunting grounds change as quickly as the weather.

name: Secretkeeper
text: It is all the things that humanity was not meant to know.

name: Counterspell
text:
"The duel was going badly for me, and Zur thought I was finished. He boasted that he would eat my soul—but all he ate were his words."
—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

name: Fireball
text: The orchard soon reeked of sulfur, smoke, and scorched bugbear, with just a hint of peach.

name: Castigate
text:
"We have no need for military might. We wield two of the sharpest swords ever forged: Faith in our left hand, Wealth in our right."
—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

name: Dread Summons
text:
"Did you have a nice nap?"
—Liliana Vess

name: Inspiring Roar
text:
"This is about more than aether or inventions. Tezzeret's schemes must be stopped!"
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Meteor Blast
text:
"Behold astronomy's contribution to war."
—Fennor Rhyl, starcaller

name: Invasion of Eldraine // Prickle Faeries
text: When the courts fell, Eldraine's fae turned from their usual pranks to deadlier tricks.

name: Cloud Elemental
text: The soratami surround their sky-castles with living clouds that serve as both sword and shield.

name: Stench of Decay
text:
"My lord, there is only so much I can do. This plague infests Krov worse than any other city."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Slith Firewalker
text: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

name: Bramble Creeper
text:
"I've seen the fully grown ones tear a baloth to gory ribbons in seconds."
—Kivi, thornberry harvester

name: Wildwood Escort
text: With Eldraine's human knights called away to defend the courts, lost travelers were surprised to find themselves whisked to safety by the secretive folk of the wilds.

name: Boggart Forager
text:
"Reach in this hole, lose a hand. Reach in that hole, find a sparkly."
—Auntie wisdom

name: Lunar Frenzy
text: In the adrenaline-fueled chaos, she hadn't even felt the bite.

name: Howling Mine
text: Legend has it that the mine howls out the last words of those who died inside.

name: Circle of Flame
text:
"Which do you think is a better deterrent: a moat of water or one of fire?"
—Chandra Nalaar

name: Altar's Reap
text:
"Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible."
—Gorghul, augur of skulls

name: Dromoka Monument
text: Dromoka rules her clan from the Great Aerie atop Arashin, the central city of the Shifting Wastes.

name: Lava Serpent
text: Lavabrink's boiling moat is a deterrent for most, and a relaxing bath for one.

name: Standardize
text: At that point, the wizards' argument got a lot uglier.

name: Sphere of Resistance
text: A sphere pushes equally in all directions.

name: Kayla's Reconstruction
text: Anyone can destroy a continent. Few have the vision to rebuild one.

name: Undead Servant
text:
"Get up. You're not finished yet."
—Liliana Vess

name: Syr Faren, the Hengehammer
text: "Words are pointless. It's what you do with your hammer that counts."

name: Ornate Kanzashi
text: Masako was privy to a great many of Konda's deepest secrets, and her hair was always perfect.

name: Adriana, Captain of the Guard
text: "My sword is pledged to the defense of this city, not to the throne or this usurper."

name: Branching Evolution
text:
"Is it the water? The stars? Whatever it is, something incredible is happening here."
—Eris, zoologist, journal entry

name: Thing from the Deep
text: Seafarers fear sailing off the world's edge not so much as down its gullet.

name: Hour of Reckoning
text: Those who are chosen do not doubt. Those who remain do not lament.

name: Cowl Prowler
text: Consulate guards who pursue fleeing renegades into the Cowl often become lost—occasionally permanently—in the city's wildest greenbelt.

name: Body of Research
text: Needledeep had promised that his final project would be his biggest one yet.

name: Anaba Ancestor
text:
"The Ancestors are the wisdom of the tribe and the soul of the Homelands. I am eternally in their debt."
—Taysir

name: Planeswalker's Mirth
text:
"I enjoy a good joke as much as the next guy."
—Commodore Guff

name: Subtle Strike
text: Silence is an underrated hunting strategy.

name: Chief of the Scale
text: "We are the shield unbroken. If we fall today, we will die well, and our trees will bear our names in honor."

name: Eternal Taskmaster
text:
"They are called Eternals. They will never stop."
—Jace Beleren

name: War Falcon
text: The falcon is the picture of nobility, maintaining a regal bearing even as it conducts the bloody business of war.

name: Ziatora's Proving Ground
text: Restless Riveteers can always find a sparring partner in the sprawling Treza warehouse.

name: Ghazbán Ogre
text:
"We were holding our own—until the ogre guiding us suddenly grinned and turned on our commander."
—Ivra Jursdotter, Sarpadian mercenary

name: Pedantic Learning
text: Even the trivial can inspire.

name: Crown of Skemfar
text: Lathril, queen of the ancient Eimir, left a powerful legacy for her mortal descendants.

name: Double Deal
text: "I'm facing defeat, . . ."

name: Borderland Ranger
text: "Only fools and bandits use roads."

name: Elemental Summoning
text:
"You've made a splash. Now show me a torrent."
—Uvilda, Prismari dean

name: Supply Runners
text: Good dogs stay by your side until the end. Great dogs leave to bring back aid.

name: Beamsplitter Mage
text: The Izzet love replicating results.

name: Deal Gone Bad
text:
"Feed the rumor mills with delicious treachery. Bad blood between those two is a good deal for us."
—Kamiz, Obscura Oculus

name: Oakenform
text:
"When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

name: Final Flourish
text: Strixhaven braced for another Oriq assault, but something far worse arrived.

name: Maw of Kozilek
text:
"The Eldrazi make worse than ruins—they make a world where not even ruins stand."
—Gideon Jura

name: Su-Chi
text: Flawed copies of relics from the Thran Empire, the su-chi were inherently unstable but provided useful knowledge for Tocasia's students.

name: Lady Orca
text:
"I do not remember what he said to her. I remember her fiery eyes, fixed upon him for an instant. I remember a flash, and the hot breath of sudden flames made me turn away. When I looked again, Angus was gone."
—A Wayfarer, on meeting Lady Orca

name: Goblin Deathraiders
text: Every once in a while, when they aren't getting incinerated in lava, crushed under rock slides, or devoured by dragons, goblins experience moments of unmitigated glory in battle.

name: Nocturnal Raid
text: The Eastern Paladin doesn't attack at night for the tactical advantage. He does it for the sheer joy of fighting beneath the moon.

name: Ghitu War Cry
text: The war cry is not simply a shout but a sacrament.

name: Riot Control
text:
"Ravnicans need order. If they don't have it, we shall bring it to them."
—Isperia

name: Sphinx's Tutelage
text: "You've never considered the implications of dealing with another telepath, Jace."

name: Forgotten Sentinel
text: It was built to withstand the ages, but no one remembers who built it or why it keeps its eternal watch.

name: Bident of Thassa
text: Only Kiora would dare steal the weapon of a god. Only Kiora could have succeeded.

name: Elfhame Druid
text: The bond between Llanowar elves and their kavu empowers both.

name: Assault Griffin
text:
"The Simic offer a prize to any biomancer who can breed a krasis to match a griffin in the air. It's never been claimed."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Infernius Spawnington III, Esq.
text: See evil, hear evil, speak evil.

name: Strategic Planning
text: "Plans evolved within the tent decide a victory 1,000 *li* away."

name: Nezumi Informant
text: "Tell Boss Umezawa there's a new gang moving in on our territory. I'm forwarding their insignia. Watch for it elsewhere."

name: Quenchable Fire
text: You'd better know how to pray for rain.

name: Merry-Go-Round
text: After the first rotation, the dressage phase begins.

name: Myrsmith
text: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

name: Kongming, "Sleeping Dragon"
text: "Such a lord as this-all virtues' height-Had never been, nor ever was again."

name: Time of Need
text:
"When the kumo attacked the monks' sacred shrine, a mournful toll for help echoed through the forest. Thus began the Battle of Silk, which would last six years."
—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*

name: Rage Thrower
text: "Some lament these haunted times, but I'm a geistflame-tank-half-full kind of person."

name: Storm Entity
text: Dweldian magi don't enter the Realm of Thrones when they die. Instead their souls are drawn to great works of magic.

name: Peace and Quiet
text:
"In time our realm will shine again. But it will gleam only when we scour away the taint of doubt."
—Radiant, archangel

name: Zombie Master
text: They say the Zombie Master controlled these foul creatures even before his own death, but now that he is one of them, nothing can make them betray him.

name: Bargaining Table
text: Although it looks like a game, business around the table is deadly serious.

name: Valor Made Real
text: "As my father taught, 'Training will raise your shield to the blow, but courage fills the gaps the shield leaves open.'"

name: Satyr Hedonist
text: "Any festival you can walk away from wasn't worth attending in the first place."

name: Brotherhood's End
text: The brothers' rivalry escalated into all-out enmity, and Tocasia paid the price.

name: Moriok Scavenger
text: Many go to Mephidross in search of lost riches. Most end up as part of the cache.

name: Tinker
text:
"I wonder how it feels to be bored."
—Jhoira, artificer

name: Alms
text:
"Helping people is mostly a matter of teaching them to help themselves."
—Sisay, journal

name: Korozda Gorgon
text: "Welcome to my collection."

name: Peacekeeper
text:
"I have always imagined my mother as such a woman, strong and wise."
—Sisay, journal

name: Bant Charm
text: Bant is a world where death and chaos hold no sway.

name: Biblioplex Assistant
text:
"I appreciate the help, and honestly, it's very entertaining."
—Isabough of the Biblioplex

name: Reki, the History of Kamigawa
text:
"After his death, monks spent ten years transcribing the tattoos from Reki's body and gathering stories from those who spoke with him. Thus the volume you hold was written."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Martyr of Ashes
text: She turns ash into flame and burns enemies to ash.

name: Zodiac Monkey
text: ". . . By six offensives from the hills of Qi Kongming sought to change Han's destiny. . . ."

name: Pramikon, Sky Rampart
text: Its colors entrance aggressors, directing their violence.

name: Delusions of Mediocrity
text: When nothing but second best will do.

name: Naya Battlemage
text: "I have trained in all three schools of magic."

name: Frilled Deathspitter
text: Nothing says trouble like a reedy hiss with a hint of liquid gurgle.

name: Earth Elemental
text: Earth elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

name: Shadowblood Egg
text:
"Does your passion for power consume your soul?"
—Watnik, master glassblower

name: Angelic Protector
text:
"My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait."
—Crovax

name: Costume Shop
text: Dress up like all your favorite Planeswalkers! And Oko.

name: Blazing Sunsteel
text: Wyleth emerged from the crater unscathed with the sun's fury trapped in his hands.

name: Ash Zealot
text: "Smarter than death? Let's see you outsmart my mace, necromancer!"

name: Hymn to Tourach
text: Members of the Order often played the Hymn on instruments made from their victims' bones.

name: Forever Young
text: Those who say you only live once have never been touched by the Cauldron of Eternity.

name: Relentless Advance
text: They approach in formation, every movement efficient and sure. They halt, listen, and then press on in silent unison.

name: Tooth of Ramos
text: Ramos smiled, and there was day.

name: Precognitive Perception
text: "To control the present we must master the future."

name: Silverflame Ritual
text: Tempered by fire and united in virtue, the knights of Ardenvale fight with a single, unbreakable will.

name: Fateful Absence
text: Sensing a plot, Sorin raced to his grandfather's resting-crypt. But someone else had gotten there first.

name: Mist Intruder
text: The wastes spread as quickly as the wind.

name: Fractal Summoning
text:
"Fractals are just pseudo-dimensional manifestations of asynchronous biosymmetries. It's really quite simple."
—Kianne, Quandrix dean

name: Grinning Ignus
text: On rare occasions, a Prismari student will summon an elemental that shows such promise that it's permitted to stay and enroll.

name: Treefolk Seedlings
text:
Even the grandest forest begins with a single seedling.
—Llanowar saying

name: Tarpan
text:
"A good Tarpan will serve you, faithful and true. A bad one will kick you in the head."
—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Pygmy Pyrosaur
text:
Do not judge a lizard by its size.
—Ghitu proverb

name: Long Rest
text: A job well done means a rest well earned.

name: Brainstorm
text:
"I see more than others do because I know where to look."
—Saprazzan vizier

name: Skulking Ghost
text:
"They exist only so long as the living take no notice."
—Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

name: Smuggler's Share
text: One way or another, everyone gets paid what they're owed.

name: Take Vengeance
text: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."

name: Krark-Clan Ogre
text: The Krark Clan believes it's caught an ogre. The ogre believes he's caught seven goblins.

name: Royal Assassin
text: Trained in the arts of stealth, the royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

name: Miss Demeanor
text: Even war can be civil.

name: Orgg
text: It's bigger than it thinks.

name: Goblin Hero
text: They attacked in an orgy of rage and madness, but only one seemed as focused on killing us as on the sheer joy of battle.

name: Dead Weight
text:
"You're not my quarry, little one. I'm after whatever comes to investigate your cries."
—Kelsien, the Plague

name: Brazen Wolves
text: With fewer patrols about, Kessig's roads have become prime hunting grounds.

name: Mox Opal
text: On loan from a private collection, this unique mechanism extracts power from a carefully prepared gemstone.

name: Silverback Shaman
text: The apes of Yavimaya draw strength from the spirits of their ancestors.

name: Skyshroud Falcon
text:
The falcon slits the sky to let the light drip through.
—Kor saying

name: Lucid Dreams
text: Never be afraid to look where others can't—or won't.

name: Eidolon of Rhetoric
text: It is the soul of a philosopher who died of starvation contemplating the universe.

name: Earthcraft
text:
"The land gives up little, but we are masters of persuasion."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Skywhaler's Shot
text: In the moment of truth, it is as though time stands still, and the whale waits, suspended in the sky.

name: Butcher's Glee
text: The Crave made Kneecleaver think she was bigger than the dragon.

name: Oblivion's Hunger
text:
"Indulge the void. Become the void. Consume all you touch."
—Drana, the last bloodchief

name: Jenson Carthalion, Druid Exile
text: He was born with the crescent-moon Mark of the Elder Druid, tying his fate to the druids of the Juniper Order.

name: Urza's Mine
text: In his hunger for power and knowledge, Urza dug deep into Dominaria's ancient past.

name: Celestial Purge
text:
"We see clearly the error of your ways. It does not matter that you choose not to."
—Urien of the Lightwielders

name: Iname, Death Aspect
text: Iname revels in sadistic glee at the crushing of souls, but soon mourns the lives so cruelly cut short. So the cycle begins anew.

name: Psionic Gift
text: For sale: Complete wizard's library. Rare scrolls, grimoires, and works of ancient spellcrafting! Slightly abridged.

name: Enthralling Hold
text:
"I offered to pay him to do the job, but he refused. So I took matters into my own hands."
—Tahim, the Puppetmaster

name: Ur-Golem's Eye
text: Ur-golems once dominated the plane. Even now, they maintain a deep connection to it.

name: Retraction Helix
text: Where the geometries of the world collapse, a master of the aether can harvest power beyond comprehending.

name: Goblin Razerunners
text: Finding an unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

name: Lurking Evil
text:
"Ash is our air, darkness our flesh."
—Phyrexian Scriptures

name: Fulgent Distraction
text:
"Channeling the white-hot power of all five suns creates a pretty good diversion."
—Yavash of the Accorders

name: Hero of the Winds
text: To tame a griffin is to ride into legend.

name: Mindscour Dragon
text:
"The bells may one day ring as an anthem of our own end."
—Kyu, Sage-Eye mystic

name: Peel from Reality
text: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."

name: Master Apothecary
text: It takes a remarkable cleric to turn a group of healers into a hospital.

name: Dromoka Captain
text: "We fight not out of fear, but for honor."

name: Worn Powerstone
text: Even a fragment of a powerstone contains within it not just energy, but space —vast dimensions trapped in fragile crystal.

name: Spontaneous Flight
text: "Amazing! And I was only trying to teach her to sit!"

name: Vernal Bloom
text: Spring breathes the magic of new life.

name: Displacer Beast
text: The only place you can be sure it's not is wherever it appears to be.

name: Launch Party
text: Life's too short to not do the things you love.

name: Arcane Endeavor
text: Late at night, when dreams touch a studious mind, bouts of inspiration strike.

name: Village Bell-Ringer
text: "Priests, hunters, slayers—to arms! The enemy approaches!"

name: Circle of Elders
text: They whisper of an ancient hero who saved the dragons of their world.

name: Graf Mole
text:
"Their keen sense of smell draws them to the unnatural. To find one is a boon."
—Veka, hinterland inspector

name: Topsy Turvy
text: "Here on going is heck the what?"

name: Frantic Search
text: Motivation was high in the academy once students realized flunking their exams could kill them.

name: Precise Strike
text: "Hit where it hurts, and always hit first."

name: Wolfhunter's Quiver
text:
"Steel in the heart, silver in the bow."
—Wolfhunter's creed

name: Scarecrone
text: Her poppets bring joy to the truly depraved.

name: Blast of Genius
text:
"Knowledge is the greatest virtue—with the courage to apply it."
—Rowan and Will Kenrith

name: Nature's Spiral
text: Like nature, the fern spirals back on itself, eternally seeking its own center.

name: Mind's Eye
text:
"I sit and think of Lat-Nam, of the azure waves white with froth, suspended over the shore. I see the energy there and I call it here."
—Hurkyl, meditation notes

name: Fateful Handoff
text:
"Get the sylex to Urza at any cost. Tell him to fill it with memories of the land."
—Ashnod, to Tawnos

name: Righteousness
text: Syr Damon looked at the dragon and saw the faces of every innocent it had devoured. Suddenly, his sword blazed like the sun.

name: Commune with Lava
text: Atarka conquered Qadat, the Fire Rim, long ago, winning over its efreet with a promise to spread the glory of fire to all the world.

name: Rust Monster
text:
"They don't seem scary, but then you're suddenly standing there in your underclothes without a weapon. Then everything looks like a threat."
—Jarro, battle master

name: Henrika Domnathi // Henrika, Infernal Seer
text: Nothing can be more dreadful than those awful women, who were—who are—waiting to suck my blood.

name: Dragonscale General
text: "Dragons seek war. I bring it to them."

name: Drop Tower
text: "Um, technically you can't 'drop' in space. What you—AIIIIEEEEEEE!"

name: Grizzled Wolverine
text:
"Before you release a Wolverine from the trap, make sure it's really dead."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Myr Enforcer
text: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

name: Encroach
text:
"The rate of spread in this region is unacceptable. Start again."
—Davvol, Evincar of Rath

name: Youthful Valkyrie
text: Before she is admitted to the host of Starnheim, a young valkyrie must learn a thousand tales of her ancestors.

name: Mother Bear
text: Even without her, the cubs will always know their mother's love.

name: Tombfire
text: The fondest memories burn brightest. As they're lost forever, the flames grow hotter still.

name: Kemba's Skyguard
text:
"We're now to dispense aid to any Mirran we see battling anything . . . 'strange.' Regent's orders."
—Ranya, skyhunter captain

name: Wall of Opposition
text: Like so many obstacles in life, the Wall of Opposition is but an illusion, held fast by the focus and belief of the one who creates it.

name: Talisman of Creativity
text:
"Good ideas don't take time. They take a lot of bad ideas first."
—Ral Zarek

name: Nakaya Shade
text: Made strong by reckless magic. Made horrid by reckless strife.

name: Skyclave Relic
text: Skyclaves held the key to reshaping the world.

name: Checkpoint Officer
text: After what he viewed as Lukka's shocking betrayal, General Kudro enacted stringent security measures at every entry point into Drannith.

name: Roving Harper
text: The Harpers value peaceful coexistence, historical preservation, and harmony with nature, and each day they spread their ideals a little farther.

name: Scapeshift
text:
"Whether we like it or not, our arrival has altered the landscape."
—Malcolm, navigator of the *Belligerent*

name: Amphibious Kavu
text: Merfolk raided the shores untroubled for years . . . until the shores started fighting back.

name: Serra Angel
text: She soars on wings of Serra's light, her sword of faith meting out justice to the wicked.

name: Thermokarst
text:
"Finally we understand the lesson of our home: loss begets renewal."
—Kolbjörn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

name: Edge of Autumn
text: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

name: Leonin Shikari
text: Her instinct is as sharp as her blade.

name: Flame Discharge
text: "What? Why would it need a cooling unit?"

name: Dark Bargain
text:
"The poacher's trade isn't monster parts. It's myth. People pay to be part of the fantasy."
—Kelsien, the Plague

name: Liberate
text:
"Not everyone gets a second chance."
—Hanna

name: Haunting Apparition
text: Like some foul herdbeast, it grazes on the dead.

name: Last Breath
text: "The River flows. My soul returns."

name: Juggernaut
text: Many a besieged city has surrendered upon hearing the distinctive rumble of the juggernaut.

name: Greed
text: "There is no calamity greater than lavish desires./ There is no greater guilt than discontentment./ And there is no greater disaster than greed." —*Tao Tê Ching 46*

name: Puncturing Light
text:
"The vampires knew what was coming. I know it. And they did nothing. They deserve to feel the same agony they've caused all of us."
—Anitan, Ondu cleric

name: Woodland Sleuth
text: "Whatever did this is near. Death reversion has not yet occurred. Be alert!"

name: Disruption Protocol
text: "Let's just turn that off, shall we?"

name: Jester's Cap
text: The crowd laughed heartily at the fool's performance, until his hat laughed back.

name: Reave Soul
text:
"I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself."
—Liliana Vess

name: Nezumi Cutthroat
text:
"The nezumi will do things for money no other thinking creature would consider. This, of course, makes them useful beyond words."
—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

name: Aven Skirmisher
text: "We do not hide from the dragons that pretend to rule the skies. If we did, the dragons would become our rulers, and our way of life would be lost."

name: Sky-Blessed Samurai
text: Imperial samurai who show exceptional honor and dexterity are invited to train as mothriders, elite guards charged with protecting the skies of Eiganjo.

name: Phyrexian Infiltrator
text:
"It is Yawgmoth's will incarnate: an efficient machine that replaces inefficient flesh."
—Tsabo Tavoc

name: Alpine Moon
text:
"A rare and fascinating phenomenon."
—Tamiyo

name: Serum Visions
text: She drank, and in the depths of the Blind Eternities, an ancient eye opened.

name: Ardent Militia
text:
"While the rest of us got paid to serve the Benalish army, the militia didn't. I used to say they stood for freedom—free *and* dumb."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Overwhelming Intellect
text: "My brain hurts."

name: Courier Griffin
text:
"Sea Gate has fallen. Survivors are on the move. Will send another griffin when we find refuge. Stay hidden. Stay safe."
—Message from Tars Olan, kor world-gift

name: Dust Corona
text:
"They infiltrated deep into the enemy camp under cover of darkness . . . and dirt."
—Corus, viashino warrior

name: Vampire Scrivener
text: No one remains on her list for long.

name: Eidolon of Philosophy
text: "And what did Erekastos teach us is the nature of the soul?"

name: Stonefare Crocodile
text: The Izzet's plans to exploit the undercity ran into a few stubborn obstacles.

name: Morkrut Banshee
text: She wails for those who have died, and for those who are about to.

name: Gnarled Professor
text: "Class is in season."

name: Exiled Boggart
text: Among the boggarts, there is only one real rule: all new treasures and experiences must be shared. Those who hoard their gifts commit the one truly unforgivable sin.

name: Hero of the Nyxborn
text: Heroic deeds inspire new heroes.

name: Force of Virtue
text:
"Where divinity leads, victory follows."
—Silverblade motto

name: Bastion Enforcer
text: Headquartered at the Bastion of the Honorable, the soldiers of Ghirapur are charged with the task of keeping peace in the city.

name: Makindi Ox
text:
"May bloodflies empty your veins and turn you into a dried leather sack, cow!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Shock Troops
text: War is a conflict that determines not who is right—but who is left.

name: Inferno Trap
text: "Do you smell something burning?"

name: Angelic Sleuth
text: Some crime scenes' secrets can only be discerned from an angel's-eye view.

name: Noxious Vapors
text: Urborg would just as soon steal your memories as your life.

name: Fa'adiyah Seer
text: She nurtures each flower from seed to blossom, and in return, they whisper secrets only she can hear.

name: Makindi Griffin
text: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.

name: Bladebrand
text: Skirsdag cultists believe that the right poison "purifies" a tainted soul before it makes its way to Ormendahl.

name: Savage Silhouette
text: Some elves believe that their survival instincts are born of many cycles of reincarnation.

name: Full Flowering
text: A swirl of light, a whisper through the leaves, and all at once the forest came to life.

name: Sol Ring
text: In the Second Age, Sauron was not yet evil to behold, and the Elven-smiths of Eregion received his aid and grew mighty in craft, whereas he learned all their secrets, and betrayed them, and forged secretly in the Mountain of Fire One Ring to be their master.

name: Viridian Betrayers
text: To secure a place in Phyrexia's ranks, they hunted their surviving kin.

name: Skyshroud Falcon
text: The earliest mystics believed that the falcon slit the sky to let the light break through.

name: Disperse
text: Gryffid scowled at the sky. A perfect day for the hunt tainted by clouds. He wished them gone. High above, the clouds looked down, scowled, and made a wish of their own.

name: Skyrider Elf
text: "It may be unconventional, but I'll take any steady mount in a storm."

name: Plague Spores
text:
"Breathe deep, Dominaria. Breathe deep and die."
—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

name: Lesser Gargadon
text:
"In some cultures, elephants are ridden by those in power. I don't think a mere elephant would even be noticed in Keld."
—Onean sergeant

name: Phyrexia's Core
text:
"So even the heart of our world has succumbed."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Decoy Gambit
text:
"We'll distract them. The rest of you, get out of here!"
—Alux, Skysail defender

name: Thicket Basilisk
text: Moss-covered statues littered the area, a macabre monument to the basilisk's terrible power.

name: Deathmask Nezumi
text:
"We had him cornered, we did . . . and, well, you know what they say about rats."
—Araba patrol survivor

name: Skatewing Spy
text:
"A better Ravnica begins with a better Simic."
—Vannifar

name: Valleymaker
text: Their home uprooted by a giant, the gang of boggarts mourned their old stomping ground.

name: Serenity
text:
"Just think of me as the storm before the calm."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

name: Inspiration
text:
"Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Slayer of the Wicked
text: You don't want to see his trophy room.

name: Swan Song
text: The gracefulness of their flight makes one wonder whether Nature or, indeed, a rare sort of Magic lifts their wings.

name: Emrakul, the Promised End
text: An enigma as vexing as life itself.

name: Dwarven Vigilantes
text: Some dwarves can only be pushed so far.

name: Thoughtpicker Witch
text: "Once the brew gets the brains nice and pickled, they're a lot easier to pick through."

name: Tideshaper Mystic
text: He paints with drop and shimmer a world that exists only in the wistful heart.

name: Glacial Wall
text:
Like arguing with ice
—Vodalian expression meaning "wasting your time"

name: Loyal Warhound
text: A paladin's steed is a celestial spirit in animal form.

name: Lattice-Blade Mantis
text:
"Urabrask doesn't think big enough."
—Glissa Sunslayer

name: Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage
text: "Preachers of freedom forget that conformity can be beautiful."

name: Devouring Tendrils
text: Witherbloom spells often take on the appearance—and personality—of their components.

name: Reckless Handling
text: The relic shattered, and something in Nahiri broke as well.

name: Horned Kavu
text: "That didn't happen naturally," said Multani. "Rath's overlay is interfering with the Æther itself."

name: Dream Thrush
text: Whether for good or ill, their arrival always means change.

name: Dark Ritual
text:
"If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."
—Volrath

name: Soulherder
text: It watches over every absence.

name: Conscripted Infantry
text: "Funny," remarked Laga to his squad. "Mishra's lackeys wear luxurious silks in their gilded palaces, while we toil in the trenches eating stale bread."

name: Umbra Stalker
