text: Beneath the waves, lost gods stir in their slumber.

name: Monastery Mentor
text: "Speak little. Do much."

name: Shu Elite Companions
text: Throughout the three kingdoms, important generals were often guarded by small groups of expert soldiers known as "elite companions."

name: Conduit of Storms // Conduit of Emrakul
text: It strikes with the fury of a tempest.

name: Rat in the Hat
text: While the gremlin, beeble, and squirrel infestations wreaked havoc on the park, Roxi was able to spin the numerous rat colonies as a "robust recycling program."

name: Branchloft Pathway // Boulderloft Pathway
text:
"Not for the bumble-footed nor wobble-stomached."
—Kreq of Sunder Bay

name: Neurok Invisimancer
text: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."

name: Harvester of Souls
text:
"He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all."
—Bishop Cawle of Elgaud

name: Unstable Obelisk
text:
"It's a lifeless ruin of some long-lost race. What is there to fear?"
—Commissar Gadholm

name: Duress
text:
「魔法は大界に平和をもたらしたが、すぐに腐敗した。」
——神秘の時代：呪文物語

name: Dwarven Strike Force
text: Any given foothill may hide dozens of dwarves waiting to spill from their tunnels like fire ants.

name: Doom Foretold
text: In the end, death usually has its way.

name: Bind
text:
"The battlefield is cluttered enough. Be still."
—Multani, maro-sorcerer

name: Unifying Theory
text: Scribbles of a lunatic and formulas of a genius are often indistinguishable.

name: Urborg Mindsucker
text:
"My pet will pick the ripe fruit from your tortured brain as if it were hanging from a vine."
—Kaervek

name: Triumphant Surge
text: Not even death can quench a hero's inner fire.

name: Angel's Mercy
text:
"She rose above me, and in that moment Varrik the Bloody died and I was born."
—Varrik the Just

name: Portent Tracker
text: In the days before the invasion, the symbol of its perpetrator appeared in strange places all across the Multiverse.

name: Dragonsguard Elite
text: "The Founder Dragons brought the Blood Age to an end. It is an honor to serve them."

name: Mox Jet
text: 2007 Vintage Championship Winner

name: Cabal Ritual
text:
"Each syllable chills your veins. Each word rattles your mind."
—Cabal Patriarch

name: Stone Rain
text:
"The land shall beg for drink and curse the rain that follows."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

name: Skyshaper
text:
"It'll get us to the portal, but I can't guarantee what it'll do to the ship."
—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

name: Ray of Erasure
text:
"What is real can be unreal."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Chain to Memory
text: Those who do not learn from their mistakes are bound to relive them.

name: Big Score
text: "Unimaginable riches? I assure you, I have a *vivid* imagination."

name: Paradise Plume
text: A last wisp of paradise in a fallen world.

name: Glowing Anemone
text: Beautiful to behold, terrible to be held.

name: Sphere of Duty
text: Duty subdues instinct.

name: Farrel's Zealot
text: Farrel and his followers became a formidable band of vigilantes, battling Icatians and followers of Tourach.

name: Aegis of the Gods
text: Athreos cares little for the other gods' conflict with mortals. He is concerned only with safe passage for the dead.

name: Foreboding Statue // Forsaken Thresher
text: As the sand eroded, a faint sound could be heard whirling under the ground.

name: Queen's Bay Soldier
text: The soldiers of the Legion of Dusk have come to the colonies at Queen's Bay in search of glory and riches. They are veterans of centuries of warfare, and they thirst for conquest.

name: Ravenous Squirrel
text: Action: This is a squirrel who eats everything.

name: Drudge Skeletons
text:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
—Nevinyrral,
*Necromancer's Handbook*

name: Determined Iteration
text: "Only a fool believes they have nothing left to learn."

name: Psychic Symbiont
text: "I turn around and see nothing, yet I know it is behind me. Its fingers rummage in my mind, crafting new ideas."

name: Splendid Reclamation
text:
"These seeds waited faithfully for the sun to rise again. Now, their patience is rewarded."
—Wrenn

name: Time Warp
text:
「時間術士は、刹那に生きるということに関して特殊な定義を持っています。」
—-千年秘本

name: Midnight Ritual
text: Bury old friends deeply, lest they return bearing worms.

name: Kjeldoran Royal Guard
text:
"Honorable in battle, generous in death."
—Motto of the Kjeldoran Royal Guard

name: Oggyar Battle-Seer
text: "May Ganathog bless us with bloody visions of glory restored!"

name: Phyrexian Denouncer
text:
"The first stage of the illness: rash and nausea."
—Phyrexian progress notes

name: Goblin General
text: Lead, follow, or run like crazy.

name: Star Pupil
text: "When I'm done here, they'll name entire buildings after me."

name: Ashenmoor Gouger
text: After his hands had crumbled away, leaving only wickedly sharp points, he decided his only purpose was war.

name: Goblin Lore
text: "The coronation of King Numsgil, no . . . adventures of Tuktuk, no . . . the saga of Morpo the bard, no! Where's *my* story?"

name: Hammer of Purphoros
text: All the world is Purphoros's anvil.

name: Char-Rumbler
text: Elementals flourished as Dominaria healed and new forms of life adapted to the land's reinfusion with mana.

name: Bar the Door
text:
"It may not look like much, but it's a good old door with strong wards. It'll hold."
—Olgard of the Skiltfolk

name: Altar of the Brood
text: Supplicants offer flesh and silver, flowers and blood. The altar takes what it will, eyes gleaming with unspoken promises.

name: Rogue Kavu
text: Every litter of kavu yields one cub that refuses to hunt with the pack.

name: Price of Progress
text: Man versus nature is not a fair fight.

name: Hive Mind
text:
"All consciousness is one, separated only by a thin veil of the physical."
—Jace Beleren

name: Unhinge
text:
"Don't let your mind wander—it might not come back."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Sunbeam Spellbomb
text:
"Cure that which was never ill."
—Spellbomb inscription

name: Castle
text:
"Hang out our banners on the outward walls; / The cry is still, 'They come'; our castle's strength / Will laugh a siege to scorn."
—William Shakespeare, *Macbeth*

name: Dying Wail
text: This is a world of spiteful wasps that sting and kill even as they die.

name: Firebolt
text: "There's more where that came from!"

name: Ethereal Absolution
text:
"Time to let the dead be dead."
—Kaya, to Teysa

name: Goblin Cadets
text: "If you kids don't stop that racket, I'm turning this expedition around *right now!*"

name: Fracturing Gust
text: Elvish dawnhands test a relic's worthiness before collecting it for the safehold. If it can't stand up to a stiff breeze, it's left behind.

name: Gods' Eye, Gate to the Reikai
text: Listen at its walls and you will hear the whispers of gods.

name: Parasitic Bond
text:
"All bonds are parasitic. Only rulership is pure."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

name: Spiraling Duelist
text: "I never move the same way twice. Those rotters can't grasp chaos."

name: Scorched Rusalka
text: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

name: Doubling Cube
text: The cube's surface is pockmarked with jagged runes that seem to shift when unobserved.

name: Flooded Strand
text: Where dragons once slept, their bones now rest.

name: Dark Tutelage
text:
"It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness."
—Seneca, *Epistles*, trans. Gummere

name: Dive Bomber
text: "Your graves will lie beneath my final nest."

name: Ray of Revelation
text:
"May angels carry him into the Blessed Sleep with dreams of sunlit days and moonless nights."
—Tomb inscription of Saint Raban

name: Brokers Hideout
text: Once the witness was inside, the safe house vanished first from sight, then from memory.

name: Arenson's Aura
text:
"I have my faith, and I have my prayers. But if push comes to shove, I've also got a little something extra."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Cinder Barrens
text:
"Burn their fleet to the waterline, and sink whatever's left."
—Angrath

name: Aeromunculus
text:
"The absence of binocular vision imposes certain challenges for a flying creature, which are overcome via echolocation."
—Simic research notes

name: Boggart Shenanigans
text: Boggarts revel in discovering new sensations, from the texture of an otter pellet to the squeak of a dying warren mate.

name: Mana Severance
text:
"And when this land is wasted, where will we go?"
—Thalakos lament

name: Tattermunge Maniac
text: It shows up at one meal wearing the carcass of the last.

name: Overeager Apprentice
text: Slow and steady may not always win the race, but at least it doesn't end up splattered on the walls.
